[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]{D4089}]@#/_/chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa/[ # ]
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_a b+hi d+harma ko ShA kA ri kA/_bod skad du/_chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/_
[\[1b.2\]]gang zhig kun la mun pa gtan bcom zhing /_/'khor ba'i 'dam las 'gro ba drangs mdzad pa/_/don bzhin ston pa de la phyag 'tshal nas/_/chos mngon mdzod kyi bstan bcos rab
[\[1b.3\]]bshad bya/_/chos mngon shes rab dri med rjes 'brang bcas/_/de thob bya phyir gang dang bstan bcos gang /_/'dir de don du yang dag chud phyir ram/_/'di yi gnas de yin pas
[\[1b.4\]]chos mngon mdzod/_/chos rnams rab tu rnam 'byed med par nyon mongs rnams/_/gang phyir nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i thabs med la/_/nyon mongs pas kyang 'jig rten srid mtsho 'dir
[\[1b.5\]]'khyams te/_/de bas de phyir 'di ni ston pas gsungs so lo/_/zag bcas zag pa med chos rnams/_/lam ma gtogs pa'i 'dus byas rnams/_/zag bcas gang phyir de dag la/_/_
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]zag rnams kun tu rgyas par 'gyur/_/zag med lam gyi bden pa dang /_/'dus ma byas rnam gsum yang ste/_/nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis/_/de la nam mkha' mi sgrib pa'o[#]/_/so sor brtags [#]pas
[\[2a.2\]]'gog pa gang /_/bral ba'o [#]so so so so yin/_/skye la gtan du gegs byed pa/_/'gog gzhan so sor brtags min pas/_/'dus byas chos rnams de dag kyang /_/gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga/_/de dag nyid dus
[\[2a.3\]]gtam gzhi dang /_/nges par 'byung bcas gzhi dang bcas/_/gang dag zag bcas nyer len pa'i/_/phung po'ang de dag 'thab bcas kyang /_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'jig rten dang /_/lta gnas srid pa'ang de dag yin/_/_
[\[2a.4\]]gzugs ni dbang po lnga dang don/_/lnga dang rnam rig byed min nyid/_/de dag rnams kyi rnam shes rten/_/mig la sogs gzugs dang ba rnams/_/gzugs rnam gnyis dang rnam nyi shu/_/sgra ni rnam pa brgyad yod de/_/ro ni
[\[2a.5\]]rnam drug dri rnam bzhi/_/reg bya bcu gcig bdag nyid do/_/g.yengs dang sems med pa yi yang /_/dge dang mi dge rjes 'brel gang /_/'byung ba che rnams rgyur byas pa/_/de ni rnam rig byed min brjod/_/'byung ba dag ni sa
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]khams dang /_/chu dang me dang rlung khams rnams/_/'dzin pa la sogs las su grub/_/sra gsher dro nyid g.yo ba rnams/_/'jig rten gyi ni tha snyad du/_/kha dog dbyibs la sa zhes brjod/_/chu me yang ngo rlung tshogs khams/_/nyid yin de dang 'dra ba'ang yin/_/_
[\[2b.2\]]dbang don de dag kho na la/_/skye mched dang ni khams bcur 'dod/_/tshor ba myong ba'o 'du shes ni/_/mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid do/_/'du byed phung po bzhi las gzhan/_/de gsum rnam rig byed min dang /_/'dus ma byas rnams bcas pa ni/_/chos kyi skye
[\[2b.3\]]mched khams zhes bya/_/rnam shes so sor rnam rig pa/_/yid kyi skye mched kyang de yin/_/khams bdun dag tu 'ang 'dod pa ste/_/rnam par shes pa drug dang yid/_/drug po 'das ma thag pa yi/_/rnam shes gang yin de yid do/_/drug pa'i rten ni rab bsgrub [# ]
[\[2b.4\]]phyir/_/khams ni bco brgyad dag tu 'dod/_/phung po dang ni skye mched dang /_/khams gcig gis ni thams cad bsdus/_/rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis te/_/gzhan gyi dngos dang mi ldan phyir/_/mig la sogs pa gnyis mod kyi/_/rigs dang spyod yul rnam par
[\[2b.5\]]shes/_/'dra ba'i phyir na khams gcig nyid/_/mdzes bya'i phyir na gnyis byung [#]ngo /_/spungs dang skye sgo rigs kyi don/_/phung po skye mched khams rnams yin/_/rmongs dbang 'dod rnam gsum gyi phyir/_/phung po la sogs gsum bstan to/_/rtsod pa'i rtsa bar
[\[2b.6\]]gyur pa dang /_/'khor ba'i rgyu phyir rim rgyu'i phyir/_/sems byung rnams las tshor ba dang /_/'du shes logs shig phung por gzhag[# ]/phung po dag tu 'dus ma byas/_/don du mi rung phyir ma bshad/_/rim ni rags dang kun nyon mongs/_/snod sogs don khams
[\[2b.7\]]ji bzhin no/_/da lta'i don phyir dang po lnga/_/'byung ba las gyur don phyir bzhi/_/gzhan mi ches [#]ring myur 'jug phyir/_/yang na ji ltar gnas bzhin rim/_/bye brag don dang gtso bo'i phyir/_/chos mang ba dang mchog bsdus phyir/_/gcig ni gzugs kyi skye mched
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]dang /_/gcig ni chos zhes bya bar brjod/_/chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dag_/gang rnams thub pas gsungs de dag_/tshig gam ming yin de dag [#]ni/_/gzugs dang 'du byed dag tu 'dus/_/kha cig bstan bcos tshad ces zer/_/phung
[\[3a.2\]]po la sogs gtam re yin/_/spyod pa rnams kyi gnyen por ni/_/chos kyi phung po mthun par gsungs/_/de bzhin gzhan yang ci rigs par/_/phung po skye mched khams rnams ni/_/rang gi mtshan nyid legs dpyad de/_/ji skad bshad par bsdu bar bya/_/bu
[\[3a.3\]]ga nam mkha'i khams shes bya/_/snang dang mun pa dag yin lo/_/zag dang bcas pa'i rnam shes ni/_/rnam shes khams yin skye ba'i rten/_/bstan yod 'dir ni gzugs gcig pu/_/thogs dang bcas pa gzugs can bcu/_/lung ma bstan brgyad de
[\[3a.4\]]dag nyid/_/gzugs sgra ma gtogs gzhan rnam gsum/_/'dod khams gtogs pa thams cad do/_/gzugs kyi khams na bcu bzhi'o/_/dri dang ro dang sna dang ni/_/lce yi rnam shes khams ma gtogs/_/gzugs med gtogs pa yid dang ni/_/chos dang
[\[3a.5\]]yid kyi rnam shes khams/_/de gsum zag bcas zag pa med/_/lhag ma rnams ni zag bcas so/_/rtog dang dpyod dang bcas pa ni/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga yin/_/tha ma gsum ni rnam gsum mo/_/lhag ma rnams ni gnyis ka spangs/_/nges par rtog
[\[3a.6\]]dang rjes dran pa'i/_/rnam par rtog pas rnam mi rtog_/de dag yid kyi shes rab g.yeng [#]/_/yid kyi dran pa thams cad nyid/_/dmigs bcas sems kyi khams bdun no/_/chos kyi phyed [#]kyang ma zin dgu/_/brgyad po de dag rnams dang sgra/_/dgu po gzhan ni rnam pa
[\[3a.7\]]gnyis/_/reg bya rnam pa gnyis yin te/_/lhag ma gzugs can dgu po ni/_/'byung gyur chos khams phyogs gcig kyang /_/gzugs can bcu ni bsags pa'o/_/gcod byed gcad par bya ba nyid/_/phyi rol gyi ni khams bzhi yin/_/de bzhin bsreg bya 'jal
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]byed pa'o/_/sreg dang gzhal la mi mthun smra/_/rnam par smin las byung ba dang /_/rgyas las byung ba nang gi lnga/_/sgra ni rnam smin las skyes min/_/rgyu mthun las byung rnam smin skyes/_/thogs pa med brgyad gzhan rnam gsum/_/rdzas dang ldan [#]gcig tha ma gsum/_/_
[\[3b.2\]]skad cig ma ste mig dang ni/_/rnam shes khams dag so so dang /_/lhan cig tu yang 'thob pa yod/_/nang gi bcu gnyis gzugs la sogs/_/ma gtogs chos zhes bya ba ni/_/sten [#]pa dang bcas lhag ma [#]ni/_/de dang mtshungs pa dag kyang yin/_/gang zhig rang gi [# ]
[\[3b.3\]]las mi byed/_/bcu ni bsgom pas spang bya yin/_/lnga yang tha ma gsum rnam gsum/_/nyon mongs can min mthong spang min/_/gzugs min drug pa min skyes min/_/mig dang chos kyi khams phyogs ni/_/lta ba yin te rnam pa brgyad/_/rnam shes lnga dang
[\[3b.4\]]mtshungs skyes blo/_/nges rtog med phyir lta ma yin/_/mig gis gzugs rnams mthong sten [#]bcas/_/de la brten pa'i rnam shes min/_/gang phyir bar du chod pa yi[#]/_/gzugs ni mthong ba min phyir lo/_/mig ni gnyis ka dag gis kyang /_/mthong ste gsal bar
[\[3b.5\]]mthong phyir ro/_/mig dang yid dang rna ba ni/_/yul dang ma phrad gsum gzhan du/_/sna la sogs pa gsum gyis ni/_/yul ni mnyam pa 'dzin par 'dod/_/tha ma'i rten 'das lnga rnams kyi/_/de dag lhan cig skyes pa'ang yin/_/de dag gyur pas 'gyur nyid phyir/_/_
[\[3b.6\]]rten ni mig la sogs pa yin/_/de phyir thun mong ma yin phyir/_/de dag gis ni rnam shes bstan/_/lus la 'og ma'i mig ma yin/_/mig gi gong ma'i gzugs ma yin/_/rnam par shes pa'ang [#]de yi gzugs/_/lus kyi'ang gnyis ka thams cad du/_/rna ba'ang
[\[3b.7\]]de bzhin gsum dag ni/_/thams cad rang gi sa pa nyid/_/lus kyi rnam shes 'og dang ni/_/rang gi sa yid ma nges te/_/gnyis kyis rnam shes phyi yi lnga/_/'dus ma byas chos rtag pa'o/_/chos kyi phyed dang gang dag ni/_/bcu gnyis nang gir bshad dbang po/_/chos
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las/_khams bstan pa zhes bya ba [#]ste gnas dang po'o//_//lnga po rnams ni don bzhi la/_/dbang byed bzhi rnams gnyis la lo[#]/_/lnga dang brgyad po de rnams ni/_/kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang
[\[4a.2\]]la/_/rang gi don dang thams cad la/_/dmigs par dbang byed phyir dbang drug_/mo nyid pho nyid la dbang phyir/_/lus las mo dang pho [#]dbang dag_/rigs [#]gnas kun nas nyon mongs dang /_/rnam par byang la dbang byed phyir/_/srog dang tshor ba rnams dang ni/_/dad
[\[4a.3\]]sogs dbang po lngar 'dod do/_/mya ngan 'das sogs gong nas gong /_/'thob pa la ni dbang byed phyir/_/kun shes byed dang kun shes dang /_/de bzhin kun shes ldan dbang po/_/sems kyi rten dang de'i bye brag_/gnas dang kun nas nyon mongs nyid/_/tshogs
[\[4a.4\]]dang rnam byang ji snyed pa/_/dbang po dag kyang de snyed du/_/yang na 'jug pa'i rten dang ni/_/skye dang gnas dang nyer spyod las/_/bcu bzhi de bzhin ldog pa la/_/dbang po rnams ni gzhan yin no/_/lus tshor sim pa ma yin gang /_/sdug bsngal dbang po'o sim pa ni/_/_
[\[4a.5\]]bde ba'o bsam gtan gsum pa na/_/sems kyi de ni bde dbang po/_/gzhan na de yid bde ba yin/_/sems kyi sim pa ma yin pa/_/yid mi [#]bde ba'o btang snyoms ni/_/bar ma'o gnyis ka'i mi rtog phyir/_/mthong bsgom mi slob lam la dgu/_/gsum yin
[\[4a.6\]]gsum ni dri ma med/_/gzugs can srog dang sdug bsngal dag_/zag dang bcas pa dgu rnam gnyis/_/srog ni rnam smin bcu gnyis gnyis/_/tha ma brgyad dang yid mi bde/_/ma gtogs pa ste de gcig ni/_/rnam par smin bcas bcu rnam gnyis/_/yid dang
[\[4a.7\]]tshor gzhan dad la sogs/_/dge ba brgyad yid mi bde ba/_/rnam gnyis yid dang tshor gzhan ni/_/rnam gsum gzhan ni rnam pa gcig_/dri med ma gtogs 'dod par gtogs/_/pho mo'i dbang dang sdug bsngal dag_/ma gtogs gzugs gtogs gzugs can
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]dang /_/bde ba'ang ma gtogs gzugs med gtogs/_/yid dang [#]tshor ba gsum rnam gsum/_/gnyis kyis [#]spang bya yid mi bde/_/dgu ni bsgom pas lnga po ni/_/spang bar bya min yang gsum min/_/'dod par [#]dang por rnam smin gnyis/_/rnyed de rdzus [#]te skye
[\[4b.2\]]bas min/_/de yis drug gam bdun nam brgyad/_/gzugs na drug go gong mar gcig_/gzugs med dag tu 'chi ba ni[#]/_/srog dang yid dang btang snyoms nyid/_/'gag par 'gyur ro gzugs na brgyad/_/'dod par bcu'am dgu'am brgyad/_/rim gyis
[\[4b.3\]]'chi ba dag la bzhi/_/dge la thams cad dag tu lnga/_/'bras bu tha ma gnyis dgus 'thob/_/gnyis ni bdun dang brgyad dang dgus/_/bcu gcig dag gis dgra bcom nyid/_/'ga' zhig srid phyir bshad pa yin/_/btang snyoms dang ni srog dang ni/_/yid
[\[4b.4\]]dang ldan la nges gsum ldan/_/bde lus ldan la bzhi dag dang /_/mig sogs ldan la lnga dang ldan/_/yid bde ldan yang sdug bsngal ldan/_/bdun dang mo yi dbang sogs ldan/_/brgyad dang kun shes ldan pa yi/_/dbang po ldan la bcu gcig ldan/_/_
[\[4b.5\]]kun shes byed pa'i dbang ldan la/_/bcu gsum dag dang ldan pa yin/_/dge med nang na nyung ldan pa/_/lus tshor srog yid brgyad dang ldan/_/gzugs med byis pa'ang de bzhin te/_/btang snyoms srog yid dge rnams dang /_/mang por ldan la bcu dgu ste/_/dri
[\[4b.6\]]ma med rnams ma gtogs so/_/mtshan gnyis 'phags pa chags bcas te/_/mtshan gcig dri med gnyis ma gtogs/_/'dod na dbang po med pa dang /_/sgra med phra rab rdul rdzas brgyad/_/lus dbang ldan la rdzas dgu'o/_/dbang po gzhan ldan rdzas bcu'o/_/_
[\[4b.7\]]sems dang sems byung nges lhan cig_/thams cad 'dus byas mtshan nyid dang /_/thob pa'am sems byung rnam lnga ste/_/sa mang la sogs tha dad phyir/_/tshor dang sems pa 'du shes dang /_/'dun dang reg dang blo gros dran[#]/_/yid la byed dang mos pa dang /_/ting nge 'dzin
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]sems thams cad la/_/dad dang bag yod shin tu sbyangs/_/btang snyoms ngo tsha shes khrel yod/_/rtsa ba gnyis rnam mi 'tshe dang /_/brtson 'grus rtag tu dge la 'byung /_/rmongs dang bag med le lo dang /_/ma dad pa dang rmugs dang rgod/_/nyon mongs
[\[5a.2\]]can la rtag tu 'byung /_/mi dge la ni khrel med dang /_/ngo tsha med pa'o khro ba dang /_/khon du 'dzin dang g.yo dang ni/_/phrag dog 'tshig 'chab ser sna dang /_/sgyu [#]dang rgyags dang rnam 'tshe ni/_/nyon mongs chung ngu'i sa pa rnams/_/'dod pa'i dge ba'i sems la ni/_/rtog
[\[5a.3\]]dang dpyod [#]dang bcas pa'i phyir/_/sems las byung ba nyi shu gnyis/_/la la dag tu 'gyod pa [#]bsnan/_/mi dge ba ni ma 'dres dang /_/lta dang ldan la'ang nyi shu 'byung /_/nyon mongs bzhi dang khro sogs dang /_/'gyod pa dang ni nyi shu gcig_/bsgribs la bco brgyad lung
[\[5a.4\]]ma bstan/_/gzhan la bcu gnyis dag tu 'dod/_/gnyid ni kun la mi 'gal phyir/_/gang la yod pa de bsnan no/_/de las [#]'gyod gnyid mi dge rnams/_/bsam gtan dang po dag na med/_/rtog pa'ang bsam gtan khyad par can/_/de yi gong na dpyod pa yang /_/ma
[\[5a.5\]]gus ngo tsha med khrel med/_/kha na ma tho 'jigs mi lta/_/dga' dang gus nyid ngo tsha shes/_/de gnyis 'dod dang gzugs dag na/_/rtog dang dpyod pa rtsing zhib nyid/_/nga rgyal khengs pa rgyags pa ni/_/rang gi chos la chags pa yi/_/sems ni yongs su gtugs pa'o/_/_
[\[5a.6\]]sems dang yid dang rnam shes ni/_/don gcig sems dang sems byung dang /_/rten dang dmigs dang rnam bcas dang /_/mtshungs par ldan pa'ang rnam pa lnga/_/mi ldan pa yi 'du byed rnams/_/thob dang ma thob skal mnyam dang /_/'du shes med snyoms 'jug pa [# ]
[\[5a.7\]]dang /_/srog dang mtshan nyid rnams dang ni/_/ming gi tshogs la sogs pa yang /_/thob pa rnyed dang [#]ldan pa'o/_/thob dang ma thob rang rgyud du/_/gtogs pa rnams kyi'o 'gog gnyis kyi/_/dus gsum pa yi rnam pa gsum/_/dge la sogs kyi dge la sogs/_/der
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]gtogs rnams kyi rang khams pa/_/ma gtogs rnams kyi rnam pa [#]bzhi/_/slob dang mi slob min gyi gsum/_/spang bya min pa'i rnam gnyis 'dod/_/lung bstan min thob lhan cig skye/_/mngon shes sprul pa ma gtogs pa/_/bsgribs pa'i gzugs kyi'ang 'dod
[\[5b.2\]]pa na/_/gzugs kyi sngar ni skye ba med/_/ma thob ma bsgribs lung ma bstan/_/'das ma skyes kyi de rnam [#]gsum/_/'dod sogs gtogs dang dri med kyi'ang /_/lam ma thob pa so so yi/_/skye bor 'dod do de thob dang /_/sa 'phos nas ni rnam nyams 'gyur/_/_
[\[5b.3\]]skal mnyam sems can 'dra ba'o/_/'du shes med pa pa 'du shes/_/med par sems dang sems byung rnams/_/'gog pa'o rnam smin de 'bras che/_/de bzhin 'du shes med snyoms 'jug_/bsam gtan tha mar 'byung 'dod pas/_/dge ba'o skyes nas myong
[\[5b.4\]]'gyur nyid/_/'phags pa'i ma yin dus gcig 'thob[#]/_/'gog pa zhes pa'ang de bzhin nyid/_/'di gnas don du srid rtse skyes/_/dge ba'o gnyis su myong 'gyur dang /_/ma nges 'phags pa'i sbyor bas 'thob/_/thub pa'i byang chub kyis thob bya[#]/_/dang por ma
[\[5b.5\]]yin skad cig ma/_/sum cu rtsa bzhis thob [#]phyir ro/_/gnyis ka 'dod dang gzugs rten can/_/'gog pa dang por mi'i nang du/_/srog ni tshe yin drod dang ni/_/rnam shes rten gang yin pa'o/_/mtshan nyid dag ni skye ba dang /_/rga dang gnas dang mi rtag nyid/_/de
[\[5b.6\]]dag skye ba'i skyes [#]la sogs/_/de chos brgyad dang gcig la 'jug_/rgyu dang rkyen dag med par ni/_/skye bas bskyed bya skyed byed min/_/ming gi tshogs la sogs pa ni/_/ming dang ngag dang yi ge'i tshogs/_/'dod dang gzugs gtogs sems can ston/_/rgyu mthun
[\[5b.7\]]lung bstan min de bzhin/_/skal mnyam rnam par smin pa'ang yin/_/khams gsum pa ste [#]thob rnam gnyis/_/mtshan nyid rnams kyang snyoms 'jug dang /_/mi ldan pa dag rgyu mthun pa/_/byed rgyu lhan cig 'byung ba dang /_/skal mnyam mtshungs par ldan pa dang /_/_
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]kun tu 'gro dang rnam smin dang /_/rgyu ni rnam pa drug tu 'dod/_/rang las gzhan pa byed rgyu'i rgyu/_/lhan cig 'byung gang phan tshun 'bras/_/'byung bzhin sems kyi rjes 'jug dang /_/sems dang mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi bzhin/_/sems las byung dang sdom
[\[6a.2\]]gnyis dang /_/sems dang de dag gi mtshan nyid/_/sems kyi rjes 'jug dus dang ni/_/'bras sogs dge la sogs pas so/_/skal mnyam rgyu ni 'dra ba'o/_/rang rigs [#]sa pa'o sngar skyes rnams/_/sa dgu'i lam ni phan tshun du/_/mnyam dang khyad par can gyi
[\[6a.3\]]yin/_/sbyor byung de gnyis [#]kho na'i yin/_/thos dang bsams [#]byung la sogs pa/_/mtshungs ldan rgyu ni sems dag dang /_/sems byung rten mtshungs can rnams so/_/kun 'gro zhes bya nyon mongs can/_/rnams kyi rang sa [#]kun 'gro snga[#]/_/rnam smin rgyu ni mi dge dang /_/_
[\[6a.4\]]dge ba zag bcas rnams kho na/_/kun 'gro skal mnyam dus gnyis pa/_/gsum po dag ni dus gsum pa/_/'dus byas bral bcas 'bras bu yin/_/'dus ma byas la de dag med/_/rnam smin 'bras bu tha ma'i yin/_/bdag po'i 'bras bu dang po'i yin/_/rgyu mthun
[\[6a.5\]]skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i/_/skyes bu pa ni gnyis kyi yin/_/rnam smin lung du ma bstan chos/_/sems can brjod lung bstan phyis 'byung /_/rgyu mthun rgyu dang 'dra ba'o/_/bral ba blo yis zad pa'o/_/gang gi stobs kyis gang skyes pa'i/_/'bras de skyes bu byed las skyes/_/_
[\[6a.6\]]sngon byung ma yin 'dus byas ni/_/'dus byas kho na'i bdag po'i 'bras/_/lnga po da ltar 'bras bu 'dzin/_/gnyis ni rab tu 'byin par byed/_/da ltar gyi dang 'das pa dag_/gcig ni 'das pas 'byin par 'gyur/_/nyon mongs can dang rnam smin skyes/_/lhag dang dang
[\[6a.7\]]po [#]'phags rim bzhin/_/rnam smin kun 'gro de gnyis dang /_/skal mnyam ma gtogs lhag las skyes[#]/_/sems dang sems las byung ba yin/_/mtshungs ldan ma gtogs gzhan de bzhin/_/rkyen ni bzhi po dag tu gsungs/_/rgyu zhes bya ba rgyu lnga yin/_/sems
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]dang sems byung skyes pa rnams/_/tha ma min mtshungs de ma thag_/dmigs pa chos rnams thams cad do/_/byed rgyu zhes bya [#]bdag por bshad/_/rgyu gnyis po dag 'gag pa la[#]/_/bya ba byed do gsum po ni/_/skye la'o de las gzhan pa yi/_/rkyen dag de las
[\[6b.2\]]bzlog pa yin/_/bzhi yis [#]sems dang sems byung rnams/_/gsum gyis snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis/_/gzhan ni gnyis po dag las skye[#]/_/dbang phyug sogs min rim sogs phyir/_/de'i rgyu 'byung ba rnam pa gnyis/_/'byung las gyur pa'i rnam pa lnga/_/'byung
[\[6b.3\]]gyur rnam gsum phan tshun du/_/'byung ba rnams kyi de rnam [#]gcig_/'dod yid dge dang mi dge dang /_/bsgribs [#]pa dang ni ma bsgribs pa/_/gzugs dang gzugs med pa dag na/_/mi dge las gzhan zag med gnyis/_/'dod sems dge ba las sems dgu/_/_
[\[6b.4\]]de ni brgyad po kho na las/_/mi dge ba ni bcu dag las/_/de las bzhi ste bsgribs de bzhin/_/ma bsgribs pa ni lnga dag las/_/de las mjug [#]thogs sems bdun no/_/gzugs na dge las bcu gcig go/_/de ni dgu yi mjug [#]thogs su/_/bsgribs pa brgyad
[\[6b.5\]]las de [#]las drug_/ma bsgribs pa ni gsum las so/_/de las drug ste gzugs med pa'ang /_/de yi tshul lo [#]dge ba las/_/sems dgu dag go de drug gi/_/bsgribs pa las bdun de de bzhin/_/slob pa bzhi las de las lnga/_/mi slob pa ni lnga las so/_/de las
[\[6b.6\]]sems ni bzhi dag go/_/bcu gnyis de dag nyi shur yang /_/gsum du skyes nas thob pa dang /_/sbyor byung dge rnam gnyis phye nas/_/rnam smin skyes dang spyod lam pa/_/bzo yi gnas dang sprul pa dang /_/'dod na lung bstan min rnam bzhir/_/gzugs na bzo ma
[\[6b.7\]]gtogs pa'o/_/khams gsum pa yi nyon mongs can/_/drug dang drug dang gnyis rnyed do/_/gzugs skyes dge la gsum dag go/_/slob pa la bzhi lhag la de/_/chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las/_/dbang po bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas gnyis pa'o//_//_
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]dmyal ba yi dgas dud 'gro dang /_/mi rnams dang ni lha drug dag_/'dod pa'i khams yin dmyal ba dang /_/gling dbye ba las de nyi shu/_/gong ma'i gnas dag bcu bdun ni/_/gzugs khams yin der so so yi/_/bsam gtan sa ni gsum pa yin/_/_
[\[7a.2\]]bzhi pa sa ni brgyad pa yin/_/gzugs med khams na gnas med do/_/skye ba las ni rnam pa bzhi/_/der ni ris dang srog la yang /_/sems kyi rgyud ni rten [#]pa yin/_/der ni dmyal sogs 'gro ba lnga/_/rang gi ming gis bstan de dag_/nyon mongs can min lung bstan
[\[7a.3\]]min/_/sems can zhes bya bar srid min/_/lus dang 'du shes tha dad dang /_/lus tha dad cing 'du shes gcig_/bzlog dang lus dang 'du shes gcig_/gzugs can ma yin gsum po dag_/rnam shes gnas pa bdun lhag ma/_/de 'joms byed ldan srid rtse
[\[7a.4\]]dang /_/'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams/_/sems can gyi ni gnas dgur bshad/_/mi 'dod bzhin gnas phyir gzhan min/_/gnas pa dag ni yang bzhi ste/_/zag dang bcas pa'i phung po bzhi/_/rang gi sa pa nyid rnam shes/_/'ba' zhig gnas par ma
[\[7a.5\]]bshad do/_/bsdu na mu ni bzhi yin no/_/der ni sgo nga las skyes sogs/_/sems can skye gnas bzhi dag tu/_/mi dang dud 'gro rnam pa bzhi/_/dmyal ba rnams dang lha rnams dang /_/srid pa bar ma rdzus te skye/_/yi dgas mngal nas [#]skye ba'ang yin/_/'dir gang
[\[7a.6\]]'chi dang skye ba yi/_/srid pa'i bar du 'byung ba'o/_/bgrod pa'i yul du ma phyin phyir/_/srid pa bar ma byung ba min/_/'bru yi rgyun dang chos mthun phyir/_/srid pa chad las byung [#]ba min/_/gzugs brnyan ma grub phyir pa dang /_/mi 'dra'i phyir na dpe ma yin/_/gcig na [# ]
[\[7a.7\]]lhan cig gnyis med phyir/_/rgyun min phyir gnyis las byung [#]phyir/_/mgur nas gsungs phyir yod dri za/_/lngar gsungs [#]'gro mdo las kyang grub/_/de ni 'phen pa gcig pa'i phyir/_/sngon dus srid 'byung sha tshugs can/_/de ni 'chi ba'i sngon rol te/_/skye ba'i skad cig
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]phan chad do/_/rigs mthun lha mig dag pas mthong /_/las kyi rdzu 'phrul shugs dang ldan/_/dbang po kun tshang thogs med ldan/_/mi zlog de ni dri za'o/_/blo ni phyin ci log gyur pas/_/rtse dgas 'gro ba'i yul du 'gro/_/dri dang gnas la mngon 'dod gzhan/_/_
[\[7b.2\]]dmyal ba yi ni spyi'u tshugs yin/_/gcig ni shes bzhin du 'jug go/_/gzhan ni gnas pa yang gzhan ni/_/'byung ba 'ang gzhan ni thams cad rmongs/_/sgo nga las skyes rtag tu'o/_/mngal du 'jug pa gsum dag ste/_/'khor los sgyur dang rang byung gnyis/_/_
[\[7b.3\]]las sam ye shes sam gnyis ka_/rgya che'i phyir na go rims bzhin/_/bdag med phung po tsam nyid do/_/nyon mongs las kyis mngon 'dus byas/_/srid pa bar ma'i rgyun gyis na/_/mar me bzhin du mngal du 'gro/_/ji ltar 'phangs [#]bzhin rim gyis [#]rgyun/_/skyes
[\[7b.4\]]nas las dang nyon mongs kyis/_/'jig rten pha rol dag tu 'gro/_/srid pa'i 'khor lo thog ma med/_/de ni rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i/_/yan lag bcu gnyis cha gsum mo/_/sngon dang phyi mthar gnyis gnyis dang /_/bar du brgyad yongs rdzogs ldan la/_/ma
[\[7b.5\]]rig nyon mongs mngon [#]gnas skabs/_/'du byed dag ni sngon las kyi/_/rnam shes mtshams sbyor phung po yin/_/ming dang gzugs ni de phan chad/_/skye mched drug dod tshun chad do/_/de ni gsum 'dus tshun chad do/_/reg pa bde sdug la sogs kyi/_/rgyu shes nus pa
[\[7b.6\]]tshun chad do/_/tshor 'khrig tshun chad sred pa ni/_/longs spyod 'khrig pa chags can gyi/_/nye bar len pa longs spyod rnams/_/thob par bya phyir yongs rgyug pa'i/_/de srid 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur ba'i/_/las byed de ni srid pa yin/_/nying mtshams sbyor ba skye ba yin/_/tshor
[\[7b.7\]]ba'i bar ni rga shi yin/_/'di ni gnas skabs par 'dod lo[#]/_/gtso bo'i phyir na yan lag bsgrags/_/sngon dang phyi mtha' bar dag la/_/rmongs pa rnam par bzlog phyir ro/_/nyon mongs gsum mo las gnyis so/_/gzhi [#]bdun de bzhin 'bras bu yin/_/gnyis kyi rgyu
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]'bras mdor bsdus pa/_/bar ma'i rjes su dpag pa las/_/nyon mongs pa las nyon mongs dang /_/bya ba nyid do de las gzhi/_/de las gzhi dang nyon mongs skye/_/'di ni srid pa'i yan lag lugs/_/'dir ni 'byung ba rgyu yin te/_/byung ba 'bras bu yin par
[\[8a.2\]]'dod/_/rig pa'i mi mthun phyogs chos gzhan/_/ma rig mi mdza' rdzun [#]sogs bzhin/_/kun sbyor sogs tshig phyir gal te/_/shes rab ngan pa'o min lta phyir/_/lta ba de dang [#]mtshungs ldan phyir/_/shes rab nyon mongs bstan phyir ro/_/ming ni gzugs can min [#]phung po/_/_
[\[8a.3\]]reg drug 'dus te byung ba yin/_/lnga ni thogs pa'i reg pa yin/_/drug pa bla dgas tshig ces bya/_/rig dang ma rig dang gzhan reg_/dri med nyon mongs can lhag ma/_/gnod sems rjes su chags pa'i reg_/bde ba myong 'gyur [#]la sogs gsum/_/de las byung ba'i tshor ba
[\[8a.4\]]drug_/lnga ni lus kyi'o sems kyi gzhan/_/de yid [#]nye bar rgyu ba las/_/rnam pa dag ni yang bco brgyad/_/'dod na thams cad rang dmigs can/_/spyod yul gzugs can bcu gnyis so/_/gong ma gsum gyi bsam gtan ni/_/gnyis na bcu gnyis 'dod 'gro rnams/_/_
[\[8a.5\]]rang la dmigs brgyad gzugs med pa/_/gnyis kyi'o bsam gtan gnyis na drug_/drug gi 'dod pa'o rang ni bzhi'i/_/gong ma gcig gi dmigs pa yin/_/gzugs med nye bar bsdogs na bzhi/_/gzugs 'gro gong mar 'gro ba gcig_/dngos gzhi na gcig rang yul
[\[8a.6\]]can/_/bco brgyad thams cad zag dang bcas/_/bshad dang 'chad par 'gyur ba gzhan/_/'dir ni nyon mongs sa bon bzhin/_/klu bzhin rtswa [#]bzhin ljon shing bzhin/_/de bzhin shun pa bzhin du 'dod/_/las ni shun bcas 'bras dang 'dra/_/de bzhin sman dang me tog
[\[8a.7\]]bzhin/_/gzhi [#]ni bza' btung grub pa bzhin/_/srid pa bzhi po de dag las/_/skye ba'i srid pa nyon mongs can/_/rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kun/_/gzhan rnam gsum po [#]gzugs med gsum/_/'gro ba zas kyis gnas pa yin/_/kham gyi zas ni 'dod pa na/_/skye mched gsum
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]gyi bdag nyid do/_/gzugs kyi skye mched ma yin des/_/rang dbang grol la mi phan phyir/_/reg dang sems pa [#]rnam shes ni/_/zag bcas zas yin gsum dag na/_/yid las [#]byung dang srid tshol dang /_/dri za srid pa bar ma dang /_/'grub pa'o 'di la gnas dang ni/_/_
[\[8b.2\]]rten [#]pa rgyas pa'i don du gnyis/_/srid gzhan 'phen dang 'grub pa yi/_/don du gnyis te go rims bzhin/_/'chad [#]dang mtshams sbyor 'dod chags 'bral/_/nyams dang 'chi 'pho skye ba rnams/_/yid kyi rnam shes kho nar 'dod/_/'chi 'pho skye ba btang snyoms la/_/_
[\[8b.3\]]rtse gcig sems med la de med/_/mya ngan 'da' lung bstan min gnyis/_/'og mi [#]lhar 'gro mi skye rnams/_/rim gyis 'chi na rkang pa dang /_/lte ba snying gar yid 'chi 'pho/_/gnad gcod pa ni chu sogs kyis/_/'phags dang mtshams med byed pa dag/_/yang
[\[8b.4\]]dag log pa nyid du nges/_/de la snod kyi 'jig rten gyi/_/gnas par 'dod pa'i 'og dag gi/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor rngams su ni/_/sa ya drug 'bum grangs med do/_/chu rngams 'bum phrag bcu gcig dang /_/stong phrag dag ni nyi shu'o/_/phyis ni rngams su 'bum phrag
[\[8b.5\]]brgyad/_/lhag ma dag ni gser du 'gyur/_/chu dang gser gyi dkyil 'khor gyi/_/thad kar 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang /_/stong phrag gsum dang brgya phrag ni/_/phyed dang lnga rnams kho na'o/_/khor yug tu ni sum 'gyur ro/_/de la lhun po gnya' shing 'dzin/_/gshol
[\[8b.6\]]mda' 'dzin dang seng ldeng can/_/de bzhin blta [#]na sdug ri dang /_/rta rna dang ni rnam 'dud dang /_/mu khyud 'dzin ri'o de nas ni/_/gling rnams yin no de dag gi/_/phyi rol na ni khor yug ste/_/bdun ni gser yin de lcags so/_/lhun po rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin/_/chu yi nang
[\[8b.7\]]du brgyad khri dag_/nub bo de bzhin steng du yang /_/dpag tshad dag ni brgyad khri'o/_/brgyad po [#]'phang du phyed phyed dbri/_/de dag rngams su'ang 'phang dang mnyam/_/de dag bar bdun rol mtsho yin/_/dang po stong phrag brgyad cu'o/_/de ni nang gi rgya mtsho yin/_/de yi ngos la
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]sum 'gyur ro/_/rol mtsho gzhan ni phyed phyed do[#]/_/lhag ma phyi yi mtsho chen yin/_/'bum phrag gsum dang stong phrag ni/_/nyi shu gnyis so [#]de la ni/_/'dzam bu'i gling ste ngos gsum la/_/stong phrag gnyis so shing rta'i dbyibs/_/gcig la dpag tshad
[\[9a.2\]]phyed dang bzhi/_/shar gyi lus 'phags zla kham [#]'dra/_/ngos gsum 'di dang [#]'dra gcig la/_/dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu'o/_/ba lang spyod gling zlum po ste/_/stong phrag phyed dang brgyad yin no/_/de'i dbus stong phrag phyed dang gsum/_/sgra mi snyan brgyad gru bzhir mnyam/_/_
[\[9a.3\]]de yi bar gyi gling brgyad ni/_/lus dang lus 'phags sgra mi snyan/_/sgra mi snyan gyi zla dang ni/_/rnga yab dang ni rnga yab gzhan/_/g.yo ldan dang ni lam mchog 'gro/_/'di nas byang du ri nag po/_/dgu 'das gangs ri'o de nas ni/_/spos ngad ldang ba'i [#]tshu rol na/_/chu zheng lnga
[\[9a.4\]]bcu yod pa'i mtsho/_/'di 'og stong phrag nyi shu na/_/mnar med pa'o de tsam mo/_/de yi steng na dmyal ba bdun/_/brgyad po kun las [#]lhag bcu drug_/de dag gi ni ngos bzhi na/_/me ma [#]mur dang ro myags dang /_/spu gri'i [#]lam sogs chu bo yin/_/chu bur can sogs grang
[\[9a.5\]]brgyad gzhan/_/nyi zla lhun po'i phyed na'o/_/dpag tshad lnga bcu gcig dang bcas/_/nam phyed nyi ma nub pa dang /_/nyi ma phyed dang 'char dus gcig_/dbyar gyi zla ba gnyis pa yi/_/tha ma'i tshes dgu nas mtshan ring /_/dgun rnams kyi ni bzhi pa la/_/thung ngur [#]'gyur
[\[9a.6\]]ro nyin mo bzlog[# ]/nyin mtshan ring ba thang cig go/_/nyi ma lho byang 'gro tshe'o/_/nyi ma dang ni nye ba las/_/rang gi grib mas 'grib par snang /_/'di la bang rim bzhi yod de/_/bar gyi thag ni stong phrag bcu/_/stong phrag dag ni bcu drug dang /_/brgyad dang bzhi dang gnyis
[\[9a.7\]]'phags so/_/de la lag na gzhong thogs dang /_/phreng thogs dang ni rtag myos dang /_/rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams gnas/_/ri ni bdun po dag la yang /_/lhun po'i rtse na sum cu gsum/_/de yi ngos la brgyad khri'o/_/phyogs mtshams brtsegs pa bzhi la ni/_/lag na
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]rdo rje gnas dbus na/_/grong khyer blta [#]na sdug ces pa/_/ngos la nyis stong lnga brgya pa/_/dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis gser gyi/_/rang bzhin gzhi [#]bkra mnyen pa yod/_/de na rnam par rgyal byed de/_/ngos la nyis brgya lnga bcu'o/_/phyi rol shing rta sna tshogs dang /_/rtsub
[\[9b.2\]]'gyur 'dres tshal dga' bas brgyan/_/de dag gi ni phyogs bzhi na/_/nyi shus bcad [#]na sa gzhi bzang /_/byang shar mtshams na yongs 'du ste/_/lho nub mtshams na chos bzang ngo /_/de steng lha rnams gzhal med khang /_/'dod pa spyod pa drug yin no/_/gnyis gnyis
[\[9b.3\]]'khyud dang lag bcangs dang /_/dgod dang bltas pas 'khrig pa yin/_/byis pa lo lnga lon pa nas/_/lo bcu lon pa lta bu'i bar/_/de dag tu skye gzugs can rnams/_/kun rdzogs gos dang bcas pa nyid/_/'dod pa skye ba gsum po [#]ni/_/'dod pa'i lha dang mir bcas
[\[9b.4\]]rnams/_/bde ba skye ba gsum po ni/_/bsam gtan gsum la sa dgu yin/_gnas nas gnas 'og ji srid [#]pa/_/de nas de yi gong de srid/_/rdzu 'phrul gzhan rten ma gtogs pa/_/de dag gong ma mthong ba med/_/gling bzhi pa dang nyi zla dang /_/ri rab dang ni 'dod lha
[\[9b.5\]]dang /_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni/_/stong ni spyi phud yin par 'dod/_/de stong la ni stong gnyis pa/_/bar ma'i 'jig rten khams yin no/_/de stong la ni stong gsum mo/_/mnyam du 'jig cing 'byung ba yin/_/'dzam bu [#]gling pa rnams kyi tshad/_/khru bzhi pa dang phyed
[\[9b.6\]]dang bzhi/_/shar dang ba lang spyod dang ni/_/byang zhes bya ba nyis 'gyur bskyed/_/'dod dang ldan pa'i lha yi lus/_/bzhi cha nas ni rgyang grags dag_/phyed dang gnyis kyi bar du bskyed/_/gzugs can dang po dpag tshad phyed/_/de yi gong ma phyed phyed bskyed/_/'od chung rnams
[\[9b.7\]]kyi ltag yan chad/_/lus ni nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur te/_/sprin med dpag tshad gsum dor [#]ro/_/sgra mi snyan na tshe stong ste/_/gnyis na phyed phyed spangs pa'o/_/'di na ma nges tha mar ni/_/lo bcu dang po dpag tu med/_/mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu la/_/'dod pa dag gi lha rnams [# ]
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]las/_/'og ma dag gi nyin zhag gcig_/des na tshe lo lnga brgya'o/_/gong ma gnyis ka nyis 'gyur ro/_/gzugs can nyin mtshan med tshe ni/_/rang lus gzhal ba'i bskal pa yis/_/gzugs med bskal pa stong phrag ni/_/nyi shu [#]lhag pas lhag pa [# ]
[\[10a.2\]]yin/_/'od chung nas bzung bskal chen te/_/de yi 'og ma phyed yin no/_/yang sos la sogs drug rim bzhin/_/'dod lha'i tshe dang nyin zhag mnyam/_/des na de dag rnams kyi tshe/_/'dod pa'i lha dang 'dra ba yin/_/rab tu tsha phyed mnar med ni/_/bar gyi bskal
[\[10a.3\]]pa'o dud 'gro rnams/_/mchog ring bskal pa'o yi dgas rnams/_/zla ba nyin zhag gi lnga brgya/_/til sbyangs [#]nang nas lo brgya zhing /_/til gcig phyung bas zad gyur pa/_/chu bur can gyi tshe yin te/_/gzhan gyi tshe ni nyi shus bsgyur/_/sgra mi snyan ma gtogs par
[\[10a.4\]]'chi/_/gzugs ming dus mtha' rdul yig dang /_/skad cig phra rab [#]rdul dang ni/_/rdul phran dang ni de bzhin du/_/lcags chu ri bong lug dang glang /_/nyi zer rdul dang sro [#]ma dang /_/de las byung dang de bzhin du/_/sor tshigs zhes bya gong bdun bsgyur[#]/_/sor mo
[\[10a.5\]]nyi shu bzhi la khru/_/khru bzhi la ni gzhu gang ngo /_de dag lnga brgya rnams la ni/_/rgyang grags de la dgon par 'dod/_/de brgyad dpag tshad ces bya'o/_/skad cig ma brgya nyi shu la/_/de yi skad cig de dag kyang /_/drug cu la ni thang cig go/_/yud tsam nyin zhag
[\[10a.6\]]zla gsum ni/_/gong nas gong du sum cu 'gyur/_/zhag mi thub dang bcas pa yi[#]/_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig_/bskal pa rnam pa mang bshad pa/_/'jig pa'i bskal pa dmyal ba yi/_/srid pa med nas snod zad pa/_/'chags pa dang po'i rlung nas ni/_/dmyal
[\[10a.7\]]ba'i srid pa'i bar du'o/_/bar gyi bskal pa dpag med nas/_/tshe lo bcu pa'i bar du'o/_/de nas yar skye mar 'bri ba'i/_/bskal pa gzhan ni [#]bco brgyad dang /_/yar skye ba ni gcig yin te/_/de dag tshe ni brgyad khri'i bar/_/de ltar 'jig rten chags [#]pa 'di/_/bar gyi
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]bskal pa nyi shur gnas/_/'chags pa dang ni 'jig pa dang /_/zhig nas 'dug pa dag mnyam mo/_/de dag brgyad cu la bskal chen/_/de grangs med gsum la sangs rgyas/_/'byung ngo mar ni 'grib pa yi/_/brgya yi bar la de dag 'byung /_/rang sangs rgyas rnams
[\[10b.2\]]gnyis ka la/_/bse ru bskal pa brgya yi [#]rgyus/_/'khor los sgyur ba 'byung ba ni/_/stong phrag brgyad cu las mi 'phyi[#]/_/gser dngul zangs lcags 'khor lo can/_/de dag gling gcig gling gnyis dang /_/gsum dang bzhi las [#]mas rim bzhin/_/lhan cig gnyis min
[\[10b.3\]]sangs rgyas bzhin/_/phas bsu rang 'gro g.yul bshams dang /_/mtshon brtsams [#]pas rgyal gnod pa med/_/thub mtshan yul na gnas pa dang /_/gsal la rdzogs pas 'phags pa yin/_/sngar byung sems can gzugs can bzhin/_/de nas rim gyis ro la chags/_/_
[\[10b.4\]]le los sog [#]'jog byas nas ni/_/'dzin bcas rnams kyis zhing dpon bstabs/_/de nas las kyi lam lhag pas/_/tshe thung lo ni bcu yin no/_/bskal pa mtshon dang nad dang ni/_/mu ge dag gis tshar phyin to/_/zhag rnams [#]dang ni zla ba dang /_/lo bdun dag tu go
[\[10b.5\]]rims [#]bzhin/_/me dang chu dang rlung dag gis/_/'jig pa dag ni yang gsum yin/_/bsam gtan gnyis sogs gsum po ni/_/de dag gi rtse go rims bzhin/_/de yi skyon dang chos mthun phyir/_/bzhi pa na med mi g.yo'i phyir/_/mi rtag de yi gzhal med khang /_/_
[\[10b.6\]]sems can bcas te 'byung 'jig phyir/_/me yis bdun no chu yis gcig_/de ltar chu bdun thal nas kyang /_/me yis bdun no de nas ni[#]/_/mjug tu rlung gis 'jig pa yin/_/chos mngon pa'i [#]mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las/_/'jig rten [#]bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas
[\[10b.7\]]gsum pa'o//_//las las 'jig rten sna tshogs skyes/_/de ni sems pa dang des byas/_/sems pa yid kyi las yin no/_/des bskyed [#]lus dang ngag gi las/_/de dag rnam rig rnam rig min/_/lus rnam rig byed dbyibs su 'dod/_/'gro min gang phyir 'dus
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]byas ni/_/skad cig ma [#]yin 'jig phyir ro/_/rgyu med pa las 'ga' mi 'byung /_/rgyu yang 'jig pa por 'gyur ro/_/gnyis gzung 'gyur te [#]rdul la med/_/ngag rnams [#]rig byed ni ngag sgra/_/rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs dang /_/'phel dang
[\[11a.2\]]ma byas lam sogs phyir/_/'dod gtogs rnam rig min skad cig_/phyin chad 'das pa'i 'byung las skye/_/zag bcas lus dang ngag gi las/_/rang gi 'byung ba dag rgyur byas/_/zag med gang du skyes pa'i [#]yin/_/rnam rig byed min ma zin dang /_/rgyu mthun las
[\[11a.3\]]byung sems can ston/_/rgyu mthun zin pa'i 'byung las skye/_/ting 'dzin skyes 'byung ma zin dang /_/rgyas byung tha dad min las skyes[#]/_/rnam rig min lung bstan min med/_/gzhan ni rnam gsum mi dge ni/_/'dod na'o [#]gzugs na'ang rnam rig min/_/rnam rig
[\[11a.4\]]dpyod dang bcas dag na/_/'dod pa na yang bsgribs pa med/_/gang phyir kun slong med [#]thar pa/_/dam pa'i don du dge rtsa ba/_/ngo tsha khrel yod bdag nyid kyis/_/de dag dang ldan mtshungs ldan gyis/_/bya ba [#]la sogs kun slong bas/_/bzlog pa mi dge don dam par/_/_
[\[11a.5\]]lung ma bstan pa bstan pa dag_/kun slong rnam gnyis rgyu dang ni/_/de yi dus kyi slong zhes bya/_/gnyis las dang po rab 'jug byed/_/gnyis pa rjes su 'jug byed yin/_/mthong bas spang bya'i rnam shes ni/_/rab tu 'jug byed yin yid ni/_/bsgom pas spang bya
[\[11a.6\]]gnyis ka yin/_/lnga ni rjes su 'jug byed yin/_/rab tu 'jug byed dge sogs las/_/rjes 'jug byed kyang rnam gsum 'gyur/_/thub pa'i 'dra ba'am de dge ba/_/rnam smin las skyes gnyis ka min/_/rnam rig min rnam gsum shes [#]bya/_/sdom dang sdom pa min
[\[11a.7\]]dang gzhan/_/sdom pa so sor thar zhes bya/_/de bzhin zag med bsam gtan skyes/_/so sor thar zhes bya rnam brgyad/_/rdzas su rnam pa bzhi yin no/_/mtshan las ming ni 'pho ba'i phyir/_/tha dad de dag 'gal ba med/_/spang bya lnga brgyad bcu dang ni/_/thams cad spong
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]ba mnos pa las/_/dge bsnyen dang ni bsnyen gnas dang /_/dge tshul ched dang dge slong nyid/_/tshul khrims dang ni legs spyad dang /_/las dang sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/dang po'i rnam rig rnam rig min/_/so sor thar dang bya ba'i lam/_/so sor thar dang ldan pa brgyad/_/_
[\[11b.2\]]bsam gtan skyes [#]dang de ldan pa/_/zag med 'phags pa'i sems can dang /_/tha ma gnyis ni sems rjes 'brang /_/bar chad med lam skyes de gnyis/_/mi lcogs med la spong zhes bya/_/shes bzhin dang ni dran dag gnyis/_/yid dang dbang po'i [#]sdom pa yin/_/so
[\[11b.3\]]sor thar gnas ji srid du/_/ma btang bar dag [#]da ltar gyi/_/rnam rig min [#]ldan skad cig ma/_/dang po phyin chad 'das pa dang /_/sdom min gnas pa'ang de dang 'dra/_/bsam gtan sdom dang ldan pa ni/_/rtag tu 'das dang ma 'ongs dang /_/'phags ni dang po 'das dang
[\[11b.4\]]min/_/mnyam gzhag 'phags lam gnas de gnyis/_/da ltar dang ldan bar gnas la/_/yod na dang po bar gyi dang /_/phyin chad dus ni gnyis dang ngo /_/sdom min gnas pa dge ba dang /_/sdom la gnas pa mi dge ba'i/_/rnam rig min ldan ji srid du/_/rab dang
[\[11b.5\]]nyon mongs shugs ldan par/_/rnam rig byed ni thams cad la/_/byed pa dag la da ltar ldan/_/ma btang bar du skad cig ma/_/phyin chad 'das ldan ma 'ongs med/_/bsgribs [#]pa dang ni ma bsgribs pa/_/'das pa dag dang ldan pa'ang med/_/sdom pa min dang nyes spyad
[\[11b.6\]]dang /_/'chal pa'i tshul khrims las de'i lam/_/bar ma dor gnas sems zhan [#]pas/_/byed na rnam rig nyid dang ldan/_/rnam rig btang dang ma skyes pa'i/_/'phags pa'i gang zag rnam rig min/_/bsam gtan las skyes bsam gtan gyi/_/sa nyid kyis 'thob [#]zag
[\[11b.7\]]med ni[#]/_/'phags des so sor thar zhes pa/_/gzhan gyi rnam rig byed stsogs kyis[#]/_/ji srid 'tsho dang nyin zhag tu/_/sdom pa yang dag blang bar bya/_/nyin zhag pa yi sdom min med/_/de de ltar nod med ces grag_/dma' bar 'dug smras bzlas pa yis/_/mi brgyan nam ni
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]nang [#]par du/_/bsnyen gnas yan lag tshang bar ni/_/nang par gzhan las nod par bya/_/tshul khrims yan lag bag yod pa'i/_/yan lag brtul zhugs yan lag ste/_/bzhi gcig de bzhin gsum rim bzhin/_/de yis dran nyams dregs par
[\[12a.2\]]'gyur/_/gzhan la'ang bsnyen gnas yod mod kyi/_/skyabs su ma song ba la med/_/dge bsnyen nyid du khas blangs pas/_/sdom pa bstan pa dge slong bzhin/_/gal te thams cad bsdams yin na/_/sna gcig spyod sogs ji lta bu/_/de srung [#]ba la gsungs zhes grag_/_
[\[12a.3\]]chung ngu la sogs yid ji bzhin/_/gang zhig gsum la skyabs 'gro de/_/sangs rgyas dge 'dun byed pa'i chos/_/mi slob pa dang gnyis ka dang /_/mya ngan 'das la skyabs su 'gro/_/log g.yem shin tu smad phyir dang /_/sla phyir mi byed thob phyir ro/_/sdom pa ji ltar
[\[12a.4\]]khas blangs bzhin/_/'thob kyi rgyud las ma yin no/_/bslab pa thams cad 'das gyur na/_/rdzun du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/_/bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba/_/myos 'gyur las gzhan bsrung phyir ro/_/'dod gtogs thams cad gnyis ka dang /_/da ltar dag las 'thob
[\[12a.5\]]par 'gyur/_/bsam gtan zag med sdom pa ni/_/dngos dang dus ni thams cad las/_/sdom pa sems can thams cad las/_/yan lag rgyu la dbye ba yod/_/sdom pa min pa thams cad dang /_/yan lag kun las rgyus min no/_/sdom pa min pa bya ba'am/_/khas
[\[12a.6\]]len pa las 'thob [#]par 'gyur/_/lhag ma'i rnam rig min zhing dang /_/len dang gus par byed pas 'thob/_/bslab pa phul dang shi 'phos dang /_/mtshan gnyis dag ni byung ba dang /_/rtsa ba chad dam [#]mtshan 'das las/_/so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba gtong /_/kha cig ltung bar
[\[12a.7\]]'gyur las smra/_/gzhan dag dam chos nub pa las/_/kha che rnams ni byung ba la/_/bu lon nor bzhin gnyis su 'dod/_/bsam gtan gtogs pa'i dge ba ni/_/sa 'phos nyams pa dag gis gtong /_/de bzhin gzugs med gtogs 'phags pa/_/'bras bu thob
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]sbyangs nyams pa las/_/sdom min sdom pa thob pa dang /_/shi dang mtshan gnyis byung ba las/_/bar ma shugs blangs bya ba dang /_/don tshe rtsa ba chad pa las/_/'dod gtogs dge ba gzugs min ni/_/rtsa chad gong du skyes pa las/_/nyon mongs pa can gzugs min ni/_/_
[\[12b.2\]]gnyen po skyes pas rnam nyams 'gyur/_/za ma ma ning sgra mi snyan/_/mtshan gnyis ma gtogs mi rnams la/_/sdom min sdom pa'ang de bzhin no[#]/_/lha la'ang mi rnams la gsum mo[#]/_/'dod dang gzugs skyes lha rnams la/_/bsam gtan skyes yod zag med ni/_/bsam
[\[12b.3\]]gtan khyad par 'du shes med/_/sems can ma gtogs gzugs med na'ang /_/las bde mi bde dang gzhan ni/_/dge dang mi dge dang gzhan yin/_/bsod nams bsod nams min mi g.yo/_/bde ba myong 'gyur la sogs gsum/_/bsod nams 'dod khams
[\[12b.4\]]dge ba'i las/_/mi g.yo gong ma las skyes pa'i/_/gang phyir sa ni de dag tu/_/las rnams [#]smin phyir mi g.yo'i phyir/_/bsam gtan gsum pa'i bar dge ba/_/bde ba myong 'gyur de yan chad/_/sdug min bde min myong 'gyur ba/_/sdug bsngal myong 'gyur 'di'i [#]mi dge/_/_
[\[12b.5\]]'og na'ang bar ma yod do zhes/_/kha cig zer te gang gi phyir/_/bsam gtan khyad par rnam smin las/_/snga phyi med gsum smin 'dod phyir/_/ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs ldan dang /_/dmigs pa dang ni rnam smin dang /_/mngon sum du ni gyur pa las/_/myong 'gyur [#]rnam pa lnga
[\[12b.6\]]yin no/_/de yang nges dang ma nges dang [#]/_/mthong ba'i chos la sogs pa la/_/myong 'gyur phyir na nges rnam gsum/_/kha cig las rnam [#]lnga zhes zer/_/gzhan dag mu ni bzhi zhes zer/_/gsum gyis rigs [#]ni 'phen par byed/_/thams cad na ni 'phen pa bzhi/_/dmyal
[\[12b.7\]]ba na ni dge ba'i gsum/_/gang las 'dod chags bral brten [#]pa'i/_/byis pa der skyes myong mi byed/_/'phags pa gzhan du'ang myong mi byed/_/'dod rtse'i mi brtan pa yang min/_/srid pa bar ma 'dod khams su/_/'phen pa rnam pa nyi shu gnyis/_/de ni mthong chos
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]'bras bu yin/_/de ni rigs [#]gcig kho na yin/_/nyon mongs rab dang drag po dang /_/yon tan zhing dang rgyun chags su/_/byas pa gang zhig yin pa dang /_/pha ma gsod gang [#]de nges so/_/mthong chos 'bras bu can gyi las/_/zhing dang bsam pa'i khyad par
[\[13a.2\]]las/_/sa de'i 'dod chags gtan bral phyir/_/rnam smin nges pa [#]gang yin pa'o/_/gang dag 'gog byams nyon mongs med/_/mthong dang dgra bcom 'bras langs pa/_/de la phan gnod byas pa yi/_/'bras bu 'phral du myong bar 'gyur/_/rnam par rtog pa med pa yi/_/_
[\[13a.3\]]dge ba'i las kyi [#]rnam smin ni/_/sems kyi tshor ba kho nar 'dod/_/mi dge ba'i [#]ni lus kyi yin/_/g.yengs pa'i sems ni yid sems la[#]/_/de ni las kyi rnam smin skyes/_/skrag gnod ma mnyam mya ngan gyis/_/sgra mi snyan min 'dod ldan rnams/_/yon skyon snyigs mar
[\[13a.4\]]gsungs pa ni/_/g.yo dang zhe sdang 'dod chags skyes/_/dkar nag la sogs bye brag gis/_/las ni rnam pa bzhi yin no/_/mi dge gzugs dang 'dod gtogs pa'i/_/dge ba nyid ni rim bzhin du/_/gnag dang dkar dang gnyis ka'i las/_/de zad byed pa zag med
[\[13a.5\]]yin/_/chos bzod 'dod chags bral ba yi[#]/_/bar chad med lam brgyad kyi gang /_/sems pa rnam pa bcu gnyis de/_/nag po zad par byed pa'i las/_/dgu pa'i sems pa gang yin pa/_/de ni dkar nag zad byed yin/_/dkar po bsam gtan chags bral [#]ba'i/_/bar
[\[13a.6\]]chad med lam skyes tha mas/_/gzhan ni dmyal ba myong 'gyur dang /_/'dod gzhan myong 'gyur gnyis su rig_/gzhan ni mthong bas spang bya gnag_/'dod pa las skyes gzhan dkar gnag_/mi slob lus ngag las yid nyid/_/thub pa'i gsum ste go rims bzhin/_/legs
[\[13a.7\]]spyad [#]gsum po thams cad ni/_/gtsang byed rnam pa gsum yin no/_/lus kyi la sogs mi dge ba/_/nyes par spyad pa gsum du 'dod/_/brnab sems la sogs las min yang /_/yid kyi nyes spyad rnam gsum mo/_/bzlog pa legs par spyad pa yin/_/de las che long
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]bsdus nas ni/_/dge dang mi dge ci rigs par/_/las kyi lam ni bcur gsungs so/_/mi dge drug ni rnam rig min/_/gcig rnam gnyis so de dag kyang /_/byed na dge ba bdun rnam [#]gyis/_/ting 'dzin las skyes rnam rig min[#]/_/nyer bsdogs rnams ni rnam rig
[\[13b.2\]]byed/_/rnam rig byed min 'gyur ba'am/_/ma yin bzlog pa mjug [#]yin no/_/sbyor ba rtsa ba gsum las skyes/_/de yi mjug thogs las byung phyir/_/brnab sems sogs rtsa gsum las skyes/_/dge ba sbyor dang mjug [#]bcas rnams/_/chags sdang gti mug med
[\[13b.3\]]las skyes[#]/_/gsod dang gnod sems tshig rtsub po/_/zhe sdang gis ni mthar phyin byed/_/log g.yem brnab sems ma byin len/_/chags pa yis ni rdzogs par byed/_/log par lta ba gti mug gis/_/lhag ma gsum gyis rdzogs par 'dod/_/gzhi ni sems can
[\[13b.4\]]longs spyod dang /_/ming dang gzugs ni [#]ming yin no/_/snga dang mnyam du shi ba la/_/dngos med lus gzhan skyes phyir ro/_/dmag la sogs par don gcig phyir/_/thams cad byed pa po bzhin ldan/_/srog gcod pa ni bsams bzhin du/_/ma nor bar ni gzhan gsad [# ]
[\[13b.5\]]pa'o/_/ma byin len pa gzhan gyi nor/_/mthu dang 'jab bus bdag gir byed/_/bgrod min 'gro ba [#]'dod pa yis/_/log par g.yem pa rnam pa bzhi/_/rdzun tshig 'du shes gzhan sgyur ba'i/_/tshig don mngon par go ba'o/_/mig rna yid kyi rnam shes dang /_/gsum
[\[13b.6\]]gyis nyams su myong gang de/_/mthong thos rnam par shes pa dang /_/rtogs pa yin te rim bzhin bshad/_/phra ma pha rol dbye ba'i phyir/_/nyon mongs can gyi sems kyi tshig/_/tshig rtsub po ni mi snyan pa/_/nyon mongs can kun kyal [#]pa nyid/_/gzhan ni de las gzhan nyon
[\[13b.7\]]mongs/_/kha gsag [#]glu dang zlos gar bzhin/_/bstan bcos ngan bzhin brnab sems ni/_/log pas [#]gzhan gyi nor la chags/_/gnod sems sems can la sdang [#]ba/_/dge dang mi dge med lta ba/_/log par lta ba yin 'di la/_/gsum lam [#]bdun ni las kyang yin/_/_
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]med par lta bas rtsa ba gcod/_/'dod gtogs skyes nas thob pa rnams/_/rgyu dang 'bras la skur 'debs pas/_/kun gyis rim gyis mi'i nang du/_/skyes pa bud med kyis gcod do/_/lta spyad de ni mi ldan pa'o/_/mtshams ni the tshom yod lta bas/_
[\[14a.2\]]mtshams med byed pa'i 'di la min/_/mi dge brgyad kyi bar dag dang /_/sems pa cig car lhan cig 'byung /_/dge ba bcu yi bar dag dang /_/gcig dang brgyad dang lnga dang min/_/dmyal ba na ni kyal [#]pa dang /_/tshig rtsub gnod sems rnam gnyis so/_/brnab
[\[14a.3\]]sems log lta ldan pas so/_/sgra mi snyan na gsum yod de[#]/_/de na bdun pa dngos su yang /_/'dod pa gzhan na mi dge bcu/_/dge ba gsum ni thams cad na/_/rnyed dang mngon du gyur sgo nas/_/gzugs med 'du shes med sems can/_/rnyed pas bdun yod
[\[14a.4\]]lhag byas na/_/mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas kyang /_/dmyal bcas sgra mi snyan ma gtogs/_/thams cad bdag po rgyu mthun dang /_/rnam smin 'bras bu 'byin par 'dod/_/sdug bsngal phyir dang bsad phyir dang /_/gzi byin med phyir 'bras rnam [#]gsum/_/lus dang
[\[14a.5\]]ngag las chags las skyes/_/log 'tsho sbyang dka'i phyir logs shig_/bstan to gal te yo byad la/_/chags bslang [#]mdo dang 'gal phyir min/_/drir bcas spong ba'i lam dag gi[#]/_/las ni lnga yi [#]'bras bur bcas/_/dri med bzhi yi [#]zag bcas gzhan/_/dge dang
[\[14a.6\]]mi dge gang yin pa'ang /_/zag pa med pa lhag ma dang /_/lung bstan min gang gsum gyis so/_/dge ba'i dge la sogs pa ni/_/bzhi dang gnyis dang de bzhin gsum/_/mi dge'i dge sogs gnyis dang ni/_/gsum dang bzhi ste rim pa bzhin/_/lung bstan min
[\[14a.7\]]gyi dge la sogs/_/de dag gnyis dang gsum dang gsum/_/'das pa'i thams cad bzhi yin no/_/bar ma yi ni ma 'ongs pa'ang /_/bar ma gnyis so ma skyes pa'i/_/'bras bu ma 'ongs gsum yin no/_/rang gi sa pa bzhi yin no/_/gzhan gyi sa pa gsum dang gnyis/_/_
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]slob pa'i slob la sogs pa gsum/_/mi slob las kyi 'bras bu ni/_/slob pa yi ni chos la sogs/_/gcig dang gsum dang gnyis [#]yin no/_/de las gzhan pa'i 'bras bu ni/_/slob sogs gnyis dang gnyis dang lnga/_/mthong bas spang bya'i de la sogs/_/gsum
[\[14b.2\]]dang bzhi dang gcig yin no/_/bsgom pas spang bar bya las kyi/_/de dag gnyis dang bzhi dang gsum/_/spang bya min pa'i de dag gcig_/gnyis dang bzhi ste go rims bzhin/_/rigs [#]min bskyed pa nyon mongs can/_/kha cig cho ga nyams pa'ang zhe'o[#]/_/gcig
[\[14b.3\]]gis skye ba gcig 'phen to/_/yongs rdzogs byed [#]pa du ma yin/_/sems med snyoms par 'jug pa dag_/'phen byed ma yin thob pa'ang min/_/mtshams med pa yi las rnams dang /_/nyon mongs shas chen ngan 'gro dang /_/'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_/_
[\[14b.4\]]sgra mi snyan sgrib gsum du 'dod/_/mtshams med gling gsum dag na yod[#]/_/za ma [#]sogs la mi 'dod do/_/phan dang ngo tsha chung ba'i phyir/_/lhag ma 'gro ba lnga dag na/_/dge 'dun dbyen ni mi 'phrod pa'i/_/rang bzhin ldan pa ma yin chos/_/nyon mongs can min
[\[14b.5\]]lung bstan min/_/de dag dge 'dun yang dag ldan/_/de yi kha na ma tho rdzun/_/de dang [#]'byed po yang dag ldan/_/bskal par mnar med par smin 'gyur/_/lhag pas gnod pa lhag par 'gyur/_/dge slong lta spyad tshul ldan pas/_/'byed do gzhan du'o byis pa rnams/_/_
[\[14b.6\]]ston dang lam gzhan la bzod pa/_/bye ba'o [#]de ni mi gnas so/_/de ni 'khor lo'i dbyen [#]du 'dod/_/'dzam bu'i gling na'o dgu sogs kyi[#]/_/las kyi dbyen ni gling gsum na/_/de ni brgyad dag yan chad kyis/_/dang po mtha' [#]skyon zung gcig gi/_/snga rol thub pa nongs pa
[\[14b.7\]]dang /_/mtshams ma bcad pa dag tu yang /_/'khor lo'i dbyen ni mi 'byung ngo /_/phan 'dogs pa dang yon tan zhing /_/spangs dang med par byas phyir ro/_/mtshan ni gzhan du gyur kyang [#]'gyur/_/gang gi [#]zla mtshan las byung ma[#]/_/sangs rgyas brdeg par sems la
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]min/_/bsnun 'og dgra bcom pa la min/_/mtshams med sbyor ba byas pa la/_/'dod chags bral 'bras mi srid do/_/dge 'dun dbye phyir rdzun smra ba/_/kha na ma tho rab cher 'dod/_/'jig rten pa yi dge ba la/_/srid rtse'i sems pa 'bras rab che/_/_
[\[15a.2\]]ma dgra bcom ma sun byas dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' nges gnas dang /_/slob pa gsod dang dge 'dun gyi/_/'du ba'i sgo ni 'phrog pa dag_/mtshams med pa dang cha 'dra ste/_/lnga pa mchod rten 'jig pa yin/_/bzod dang phyir mi 'ong dgra bcom/_/'thob la
[\[15a.3\]]las gegs [#]shin tu byed/_/gang nas byang chub sems dpa' yin/_/gang nas mtshan gyi las byed pa/_/bde 'gro rigs mthor skye dbang tshang /_/phor [#]'gyur tshe rabs dran mi ldog_/de ni 'dzam gling pho gyur [#]nyid/_/mngon sum sangs rgyas la sems pa/_/bsams
[\[15a.4\]]pa las byung bskal pa brgya/_/lus pa dag tu 'phen par byed/_/re re'ang bsod nams brgya las skye[#]/_/rnam gzigs mar me rin chen gtsug_/grangs med gsum gyi tha mar byung /_/dang po shAkya thub pa yin/_/kun la thams cad snying rje yis[#]/_/sbyin par byed pas
[\[15a.5\]]sbyin pa rdzogs/_/chags bcas yan lag bcad kyang ni/_/mi 'khrugs [#]bzod dang tshul khrims kyi/_/skar [#]rgyal bstod pas brtson 'grus kyi/_/de ma thag la ting 'dzin blo'i/_/gsum po bsod nams bya ba dang /_/de'i gzhi dper na las lam bzhin/_/gang gis
[\[15a.6\]]sbyin byed de sbyin pa/_/mchod dang phan gdags 'dod pa yis/_/lus dang ngag las slong dang bcas/_/de [#]'bras longs spyod chen po can/_/bdag gzhan don phyir gnyis don phyir/_/gnyis ka'i don du min phyir sbyin/_/de yi khyad par sbyin bdag dang /_/dngos dang zhing
[\[15a.7\]]gi khyad par las/_/sbyin bdag khyad 'phags dad sogs kyis/_/gus la sogs pas sbyin par byed/_/de phyir bkur sti rgya chen dang /_/dus dang bar chad med par rnyed/_/kha dog la sogs phun sum dngos/_/de las gzugs bzang grags ldan dang /_/dga'
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]dang shin tu gzhon sha dang [#]/_/dus su reg na bde lus 'gyur/_/'gro dang sdug bsngal phan 'dogs dang /_/yon tan rnams kyis zhing khyad 'phags/_/mchog ni [#]grol bas grol ba'am[#]/_/byang chub sems dpa' yis brgyad pa/_/'phags pa min yang pha ma dang /_/nad
[\[15b.2\]]pa dang ni chos smra dang /_/skye mtha'i byang chub sems dpa' la/_/yon ni gzhal du med pa yin/_/mjug dang zhing dang gzhi [#]dang ni/_/sbyor dang sems pa bsam pa ste/_/de dag chung dang che ba las/_/las kyang chung dang che ba nyid/_/bsams bzhin pa dang rdzogs pa
[\[15b.3\]]dang /_/mi 'gyod gnyen po med pa dang /_/'khor dang rnam par smin pa las/_/bsags pa'i las shes bya ba yin/_/mchod rten la btang rgyus byung ba'i/_/bsod nams len med byams sogs bzhin/_/rgyu las 'bras bu mi 'khrul phyir/_/ngan pa'i zhing la'ang
[\[15b.4\]]'bras yid 'ong /_/'chal pa'i tshul khrims mi dge'i gzugs/_/de spong tshul khrims rnam gnyis so/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni bcad pa yang /_/rnam dag yon tan bzhi ldan no/_/'chal khrims de'i rgyus 'phen [#]ma byung /_/de [#]gnyen po dang zhi la rten[#]/_/mnyam par
[\[15b.5\]]bzhag pa'i dge ba ni/_/bsgom pa'o sems la sgo [#]phyir ro/_/mtho ris don du tshul khrims dang /_/'bral ba'i don du bsgom gtso'i [#]phyir/_/bskal par mtho ris dga' gnas [#]phyir/_/bzhi yi tshangs pa'i bsod nams yin/_/chos sbyin nyon mongs can min pas/_/mdo
[\[15b.6\]]sogs yang dag ji bzhin ston/_/bsod nams mya ngan 'das pa dang /_/nges 'byed cha mthun dge rnam gsum/_/rigs pas rab tu bcug pa'i las/_/rnam gsum kun slong [#]bcas pa ni/_/yig 'bru brgya dang bgrang bcas pa'i/_/snyan ngag grangs ti go rims [#]bzhin/_/_
[\[15b.7\]]bsgribs ngan kha na ma tho bcas/_/nyan mongs can chos dri med dge/_/gya nom 'dus byas dge bsten [#]bya/_/thar pa bla na med pa yin/_/chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las/_las bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas bzhi pa'o//_//srid pa'i rtsa ba phra rgyas
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]drug_/'dod chags de bzhin khong khro dang /_nga rgyal ma rig lta ba dang /_/the tshom yin te de drug kyang /_/'dod chags dbye bas bdun du bshad/_/khams gnyis las skyes srid 'dod chags/_/kha ni nang du bltas [#]phyir der/_/thar pa'i 'du shes bzlog
[\[16a.2\]]phyir bshad/_/lta ba lnga ste 'jig tshogs dang /_/log dang mthar 'dzin lta ba dang /_/lta ba dang ni tshul khrims dang /_/brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin dang bcu/_/de dag bcu dang bdun bdun brgyad/_/lta ba gsum gnyis ma gtogs pa/_/'dod na sdug bsngal la sogs pa/_/_
[\[16a.3\]]mthong bas rim bzhin spong bar byed/_/bzhi ni bsgom pas spang bya yin/_/khong khro ma gtogs de dag nyid/_/gzugs khams gzugs med de dang 'dra/_/de ltar dgu bcu brgyad du 'dod/_/srid rtse las skyes bzod pa yis/_/gzhom bya mthong bas spang bya nyid/_/_
[\[16a.4\]]lhag skyes mthong dang bsgom gnyis kyis/_/bzod pas gzhom min bsgom kho nas/_/bdag dang bdag gi rtag chad dang /_/med dang dman [#]la mchog lta dang /_/rgyu min lam min der [#]lta ba/_/de dag lta ba lnga yin no/_/dbang phyug sogs rgyur mngon zhen pa/_/rtag bdag
[\[16a.5\]]phyin ci log pa yis/_/rab tu 'jug pas de phyir de/_/sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bya nyid/_/lta ba gsum las phyin ci log_/bzhi tshan phyin ci log phyir [#]dang /_/nges rtog phyir dang sgro 'dogs phyir/_/sems dang 'du shes de'i dbang gis/_/nga rgyal bdun rnam dgu gsum
[\[16a.6\]]po/_/mthong dang bsgom pas zad bya ba/_/bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni/_/gsod [#]stsogs kun nas dkris [#]pa'o/_/de bzhin 'jig sred 'phags pa la/_/rnam sogs nga'o snyam mi 'byung /_/lta bas rgyas par 'gyur phyir ro/_/mi dge'i 'gyod pa'ang ma yin no/_/sdug bsngal rgyu
[\[16a.7\]]mthong spang bya ba/_/lta dang de bzhin the tshom dang /_/gang de lhan cig ma 'dres pa'i/_/ma rig gang yin kun tu 'gro/_/de dag las dgu gong du dmigs/_/lta ba gnyis po ma gtogs so/_/de dag dang ni lhan cig gang /_/'byung de'ang kun 'gro thob ma gtogs/_/'gog dang
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]lam mthong spang bya ba/_/log lta the tshom de dag dang /_/ldan dang [#]'ba' zhig ma rig dang /_/drug ni zag med spyod yul can/_/rang gi sa pa'i 'gog pa dang /_/lam ni phan tshun rgyu yin pas/_/sa drug sa dgu'i lam ni de'i/_/spyod yul [#]can gyi yul yin no/_/'dod chags
[\[16b.2\]]min te spang bya'i phyir/_/gnod mi byed phyir zhe sdang min/_/zhi dang dag dang mchog gyur phyir/_/nga rgyal ma yin mchog 'dzin min/_/phra rgyas kun tu 'gro rnams ni/_/dmigs pa'i sgo nas rang gi sa/_/thams cad du ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/kun 'gro ma yin rang ris su/_/_
[\[16b.3\]]zag med gong ma'i yul can min/_/bdag gir ma byas gnyen po'i phyir/_/gang zhig gang dang mtshungs ldan pa/_/de ni der mtshungs ldan sgo nas/_/gong ma thams cad lung ma bstan/_/'dod na 'jig tshogs lta ba dang /_/mthar 'dzin lhan cig ma rig pa[#]/_/lhag ma
[\[16b.4\]]rnams 'dir mi dge ba'o/_/'dod na 'dod chags khong khro dang /_/rmongs rnams mi dge'i rtsa ba yin/_/lung ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba gsum/_/de ni sred dang ma rig blo/_/rnam gnyis mthor [#]'jug phyir de las/_/gzhan min bzhi zhes nyi 'og pa/_/de dag sred lta nga rgyal
[\[16b.5\]]rmongs/_/bsam gtan pa gsum ma rig las/_/mgo gcig dang ni rnam phye dang /_/dri dang gzhag [#]par lung bstan pa/_/'chi dang skye dang [#]khyad par 'phags/_/bdag gzhan la sogs lta bu yin/_/'das dang nyer gnas 'dod chags dang /_/khong khro nga rgyal dag gis
[\[16b.6\]]ni/_/gang la de skyes ma spangs pa'i/_/dngos po de dang ldan pa yin/_yid kyi de dag ma 'ongs pas/_/kun dang gzhan gyis rang dus pa/_/mi skye rnams kyis thams cad dang /_/lhag ma kun gyis kun dang ldan/_/dus rnams kun tu yod gsungs phyir/_/gnyis phyir yul
[\[16b.7\]]yod phyir 'bras phyir/_/de yod smra ba'i phyir thams cad/_/yod par smra bar 'dod de dag_/rnam bzhi dngos dang mtshan nyid dang /_/gnas skabs gzhan gzhan 'gyur zhes bya/_gsum pa bzang ste bya ba yis/_/dus rnams rnam gzhag gegs su byed/_/de yang ji ltar
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]gzhan ma yin/_/dus su mi rung de bzhin du/_/yod na ci phyir ma skyes zhig_/chos nyid dag ni zab pa yin/_/sdug bsngal mthong spang bya spangs kyang /_/kun 'gro lhag ma rnams kyis [#]ldan/_/dang po'i rnam pa spangs kyang de'i/_/yul can dri ma lhag rnams
[\[17a.2\]]kyis/_/sdug bsngal rgyu mthong goms pa yis/_/spang bya 'dod khams las skyes pa/_/rang gi gsum dang gzugs gtogs gcig_/dri med rnam shes spyod yul lo/_/gzugs khams las skyes rang gi dang /_/'og gsum gong gcig dri med kyi'ang /_/gzugs med
[\[17a.3\]]las skyes [#]khams gsum gtogs/_/gsum dang zag med spyod yul lo/_/'gog dang lam mthong spang bya kun/_/rang gis glags [#]pa'i spyod yul lo/_/zag med khams gsum mtha' gsum dang /_/zag pa med pa'i spyod yul lo/_/nyon mongs phra rgyas bcas rnam [# ]
[\[17a.4\]]gnyis/_/nyon mongs can min rgyas 'gyur gyis/_/rmongs las the tshom de nas ni/_/log lta de nas 'jig tshogs lta/_/de nas mthar 'dzin de nas ni/_/tshul khrims mchog 'dzin de nas lta/_/rang gi lta la nga rgyal chags/_/gzhan la zhe sdang de ltar rim/_/phra rgyas
[\[17a.5\]]spangs pa ma yin dang /_/yul ni nye bar gnas pa dang /_/tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed las/_/nyon mongs rgyu ni tshang ba yin/_/'dod na gti mug ma gtogs pa'i/_/nyon mongs kun nas dkris bcas zag_/gzugs dang gzugs ni med pa na/_/phra rgyas kho na srid
[\[17a.6\]]pa'i zag_/de lung ma bstan kha nang bltas/_/mnyam gzhag sa pa'i phyir gcig byas/_/rtsa ba ma rig yin pas na/_/logs shig tu ni zag par bstan/_/chu bo sbyor ba'ang de bzhin du/_/lha rnams gsal phyir logs shig bstan/_/zag par ma yin grogs med
[\[17a.7\]]rnams/_/'jog pa'i rjes su mi mthun lo/_/ji skad bshad nyid ma rig bcas/_/nyer len rnams te lta rnam [#]gnyis/_/phye ba'i phyir ro ma rig pa/_/'dzin par byed pa min phyir bsres/_/gang phyir de dag phra ba dang /_/rjes 'brel rnam gnyis rgyas 'gyur dang /_/rjes
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]su 'brang bas [#]de yi phyir/_/phra rgyas dag tu bshad pa yin/_/de dag 'jog byed zag byed dang /_/'khyer bar byed dang 'byar [#]byed dang /_/nye bar 'dzin phyir zag la sogs/_/de dag gi ni nges tshig yin/_/de dag kun tu sbyor sogs kyi[#]/_/dbye bas yang rnam lngar bshad
[\[17b.2\]]do/_/rdzas dang mchog 'dzin 'dra ba'i phyir/_/lta gnyis kun tu sbyor gzhan no/_/gang phyir gnyis ka'ang gcig tu ni/_/mi dge rang dbang de yi phyir/_/phrag dog ser sna de dag las/_/logs shig kun sbyor gnyis su bshad/_/tha ma'i cha dang mthun rnam lnga/_/_
[\[17b.3\]]gnyis kyis 'dod las mi 'da' la/_/gsum po yis ni phyir zlog byed/_/sgo dang rtsa bas [#]bsdus phyir gsum/_/'gro mi 'dod dang lam nor dang /_/lam la the tshom de snyed cig_/thar pa bgrod la gegs byed pa/_/de yi phyir na gsum bstan to/_/gong ma'i cha dang
[\[17b.4\]]mthun lnga nyid/_/gzugs dang gzugs med las skyes pa'i/_/'dod chags gnyis rgod nga rgyal rmongs/_/tshor ba'i dbang gis 'ching ba gsum/_/nyon mongs las gzhan nyon mongs can/_/sems byung 'du byed phung zhes pa/_/gang de'ang nye ba'i nyon mongs te/_/de
[\[17b.5\]]dag nyon mongs zhes mi bya/_/ngo tsha med dang khrel med dang /_/phrag dog ser sna rgod pa dang /_/'gyod dang rmugs dang gnyid dang ni/_/kun nas dkris pa rnam pa brgyad/_/khro dang 'chab pa'o 'dod chags kyis/_/ngo tsha med rgod ser sna bslang /_/'chab pa rtsod do ma rig
[\[17b.6\]]las/_/rmugs dang gnyid dang khrel med do/_/the tshom las 'gyod khro ba dang /_/phrag dog khong khro'i rgyu las byung /_/gzhan yang nyon mongs dri ma drug_/sgyu dang g.yo dang rgyags pa dang /_/de bzhin 'tshig dang khon 'dzin dang /_/rnam 'tshe rgyu dang rgyags pa ni/_/'dod
[\[17b.7\]]chags las skyes khon 'dzin dang /_/rnam 'tshe khong khro las skyes so/_/'tshig pa lta ba mchog 'dzin las/_/g.yo ni lta bas kun nas bslang /_/de las ngo tsha med pa dang /_/khrel med rmugs gnyid rgod rnam gnyis/_/de las gzhan ni bsgom spang bya/_/rang dbang de bzhin
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]dri ma rnams/_/'dod na mi dge gsum rnam gnyis/_/de yan chad ni lung ma bstan/_/'dod dang [#]bsam gtan dang po na/_/g.yo sgyu tshangs pas [#]'drid phyir ro/_/rmugs rgod rgyags pa khams gsum na/_/gzhan dag 'dod khams las skyes pa/_/mthong
[\[18a.2\]]spang bya gnyid [#]nga rgyal bcas/_/yid kyi rnam shes sa pa yin/_/nye ba'i nyon mongs rang dbang yang /_/gzhan ni rnam shes drug rten can/_/bde ba dag dang 'dod chags su/_/mtshungs ldan zhe sdang bzlog pa'o/_/ma rig pa dag thams cad dang /_/med lta yid bde
[\[18a.3\]]sdug bsngal dang /_/yid mi bde dang the tshom mo/_/gzhan yid bde dang 'dod las skyes/_/btang snyoms dad kun sa gong ma/_/sa ji bzhin du rang rang dang /_/'gyod dang phrag dog khro ba dang /_/rnam 'tshe khon du 'dzin pa dang /_/'tshig pa yid mi bde ba dang /_/ser
[\[18a.4\]]sna dag ni bzlog pa yin/_/g.yo dang sgyu dang 'chab dang gnyis[#]/_/gnyis ka dang ldan bde dag dang [#]/_/rgyags pa btang snyoms kun tu 'gro/_/bzhi po gzhan ni lnga dag dang /_/'dod na sgrib rnams mi mthun dang /_/zas dang bya ba gcig pa'i phyir/_/gnyis gcig phung
[\[18a.5\]]po gnod byed dang /_/the tshom phyir na lnga nyid do/_/dmigs pa yongs su shes pa dang /_/de la dmigs pa yang dag par/_/zad dang dmigs pa spangs pas so/_/gnyen po skyes pas zad par 'gyur/_/gnyen po rnam bzhi spong ba dang /_/gzhi dang srid nyid rnam par
[\[18a.6\]]ni/_/sun 'byin zhes bya dmigs pa las/_/nyon mongs pa ni spang byar 'dod/_/mtshan nyid mi mthun mi mthun phyogs/_/yul rnam [#]chad dang dus kyis te/_/'byung dang tshul khrims phyogs dang ni/_/dus gnyis ring ba nyid lta bu'o/_/lan cig tu zad de dag gi_/bral
[\[18a.7\]]ba'i thob pa yang dang yang /_/gnyen po skyes dang 'bras thob dang /_/dbang po rnam par 'phel rnams su/_/yongs su shes dgu 'dod pa na/_/dang po rnam gnyis zad la gcig_/gnyis zad pa ni de gnyis so/_/de bzhin gong ma'i de gsum nyid/_/yongs su shes pa
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]gzhan gsum ste/_/tha ma'i cha dang mthun gzugs dang /_/zag pa kun zad drug bzod 'bras/_/lhag ma rnams ni shes pa'i yin/_/mi lcogs med 'bras thams cad do/_/bsam gtan rnams kyi lnga'am brgyad/_/nye bar bsdogs pa'i gcig yin te/_/gzugs
[\[18b.2\]]med dngos gzhi gsum gyi yang /_/thams cad 'phags pa'i lam gyi yin/_/'jig rten pa'i gnyis rjes kyi yang /_/chos shes pa'i ni gsum yin no/_/de'i phyogs mthun gyi drug dang lnga/_/bral ba'i thob pa zag med dang /_/srid rtse nyams par byas pa dang /_/rgyu
[\[18b.3\]]gnyis kun tu bcom pa'i phyir/_/yongs shes khams las 'das pa las[#]/_/gcig min mthong la gnas pa ni/_/lnga yi bar dang yang dag ldan/_/bsgom la gnas pa drug gam ni/_/gcig gam yang na gnyis dang ngo /_/khams las 'dod chags bral ba
[\[18b.4\]]dang /_/'bras bu thob phyir de dag bsdoms/_/la la gcig gnyis lnga dang drug_/gtong ste 'thob pa lnga min no/_/chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las/_/phra rgyas bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas lnga pa'o//_//bden pa mthong dang bsgoms [#]pa
[\[18b.5\]]las/_/nyon mongs spangs pa zhes bshad pa/_/bsgom pa'i lam ni rnam gnyis te[#]/_/mthong ba zhes bya zag pa med/_/bden pa dag ni bzhir bshad do/_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung de bzhin du/_/'gog dang lam ste de ltar na/_/de dag ji ltar mngon rtogs
[\[18b.6\]]rim/_/yid 'ong yid du mi 'ong dang /_/de las gzhan zag bcas rnams nyid/_/sdug bsngal nyid gsum ldan pa'i phyir/_/ci rigs ma lus sdug bsngal lo/_/gang la bcom dang blo yis [#]gzhan/_/bsal na de blo mi 'jug pa/_/bum chu bzhin du kun rdzob tu/_/_
[\[18b.7\]]yod de don dam yod gzhan no/_/tshul gnas thos dang bsam ldan pas/_/bsgom pa la ni rab tu sbyor/_/thos stsogs las byung blo rnams ni/_/ming dang gnyis ka don yul can/_/bsring [#]gnyis ldan chog mi shes dang /_/'dod chen can la ma yin no/_/rnyed la yang
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]sred chog mi shes/_/ma rnyed la 'dod 'dod chen can/_/bzlog pa de yi gnyen po dag_/de gnyis khams [#]gsum gtogs dri med/_/ma chags 'phags rigs de dag las/_/gsum ni chog shes bdag nyid do/_/gsum gyis tshul bstan tha
[\[19a.2\]]mas las/_/sred pa skye ba'i gnyen po'i phyir/_/bdag gir bdag 'dzin dngos 'dod pa/_/de yi dus dang gtan zhi'i phyir/_/de la 'jug pa mi sdug pa[#]/_/dbugs rngub 'byung ba dran pa yis/_/'dod chags rnam rtog lhag [#]rnams so/_/keng rus chags bcas
[\[19a.3\]]thams cad la/_/rus pa rgya mtsho'i bar du ni/_/spro zhing sdud pas las dang po/_/rkang rus nas ni thod phyed bar/_/btang bas sbyang ba byas par bshad/_/smin ma'i bar du sems 'dzin pas/_/yid la byed pa rdzogs pa yin/_/mi sdug ma chags sa bcu dang /_/dmigs
[\[19a.4\]]pa 'dod snang mis skyed [#]do/_/dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung dran pa ni/_/shes rab sa lnga spyod yul rlung /_/'dod rten phyi ba'i [#]ma yin no/_/bgrang la sogs pa rnam pa drug_/dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung gang las lus/_/sems can zhes bya ma zin pa'o/_/rgyu mthun
[\[19a.5\]]las byung 'og ma yi/_/yid kyis de gnyis ma rtogs [#]so/_/zhi gnas grub par gyur pa yis/_/dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom par bya/_/lus tshor sems dang chos rnams la/_/mtshan nyid gnyis su yongs brtags pas/_/shes rab thos sogs las byung ba'o/_/_
[\[19a.6\]]gzhan ni 'brel dang dmigs pa las/_/rim ni ji ltar skye ba bzhin/_/phyin ci log gi gnyen por bzhi/_/de ni chos dran nyer gzhag pa/_/spyi la dmigs pa la gnas te/_/de dag la ni mi rtag dang /_/sdug bsngal stong bdag med par lta[#]/_/de las dro bar gyur pa
[\[19a.7\]]'byung /_/de ni bden bzhi'i spyod yul can/_/rnam pa bcu drug dro ba las/_/rtse mo de yang de dang 'dra/_/gnyis ka chos kyis rnam pa gtod/_/gzhan dag gis kyang 'phel bar byed/_/de las bzod pa gnyis de bzhin/_/thams cad chos kyis [#]'phel bar byed/_/_
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]chen po 'dod gtogs sdug bsngal yul/_/de ni skad cig gcig de bzhin/_/chos mchog thams cad phung po lnga/_/thob pa ma gtogs de ltar na/_/nges 'byed cha mthun rnam pa bzhi/_/bsgoms byung mi lcogs med pa dang /_/khyad par bsam gtan sa pa'o/_/gnyis ni 'og
[\[19b.2\]]na'ang yod pa'am/_/'dod rten chos mchog bud med kyis/_/gnyis ka'i rten can 'thob par 'gyur/_/'phags pas de dag sa bor nas/_/gtong ngo 'phags min 'chi bas so/_/dang po gnyis yongs [#]nyams pas kyang /_/dngos gzhis de nyid la bden mthong /_/rnam par
[\[19b.3\]]nyams tshe [#]sngon med 'thob/_/nyams pa gnyis ni mi ldan pa/_/rtse mo thob pa rtsa mi 'chad/_/bzod thob ngan song mi 'gro'o/_/gnyis slob rigs las bzlog nas ni/_/sangs rgyas su 'gyur gzhan gsum yang /_/ston dang bse ru byang chub bar/_/bsam gtan mtha'
[\[19b.4\]]rten gcig la kun/_/de yi sngon du thar cha mthun/_/myur ba srid pa gsum gyis thar/_/thos bsams las byung las gsum mo/_/mi yi nang nas 'phen par byed/_/'jig rten pa yi chos mchog las/_/chos kyi bzod pa zag pa med/_/'dod sdug bsngal la de nas
[\[19b.5\]]ni/_/de nyid la chos shes de bzhin/_/sdug bsngal lhag la rjes bzod shes/_/bden pa gsum la'ang de bzhin no/_/de ltar bden pa mngon rtogs 'di/_/sems bcu drug go rnam gsum ste/_/mthong dmigs bya ba zhes bya'o/_/de ni chos mchog dang sa gcig_/_
[\[19b.6\]]bzod dang shes pa go rims bzhin/_/bar chad med dang rnam grol lam/_/de la [#]skad cig bco lnga ni/_/ma mthong mthong phyir mthong ba'i lam/_/dbang po rno rtul de dag tu/_/dad dang chos kyi rjes 'brang ba/_/bsgoms pas spang bya ma spangs na/_/'bras bu dang po la zhugs pa/_/_
[\[19b.7\]]rnam lnga'i bar bcom gnyis pa la/_/dgu pa tshun chad zad pa yin/_/'dod pa'am yang na gong ma las/_/chags bral gsum pa la zhugs pa/_/gang zhig gang la zhugs pa ni/_/bcu drug pa la de 'bras gnas/_/de tshe dbang po rno rtul dag_/dad pas mos dang mthong bas
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]thob/_/'bras thob 'bras bu khyad par gyi/_/lam thob med pas de yi phyir/_/'bras gnas khyad par bya ba'i phyir/_/mi brtson pa ni zhugs ma yin/_/sa dang sa na nyes rnam dgu/_/de bzhin du ni yon tan rnams/_/chung dang 'bring dang che rnams kyi/_/chung ngu la
[\[20a.2\]]sogs tha dad phyir/_/'bras gnas bsgom spang bya [#]ma zad/_/re [#]ltar thogs na lan bdun pa/_/rnam gsum rnam bzhi las grol ba/_/tshe gnyis gsum du rigs nas rigs/_/rnam pa lnga yi bar bcom pa/_/gnyis pa la ni zhugs pa'ang yin/_/rnam pa drug pa zad gyur pa/_/de
[\[20a.3\]]ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba/_/nyes cha bdun dang brgyad zad pa/_/tshe gcig bar chad gcig pa dang /_/gsum pa la ni zhugs pa'ang yin/_/de dgu zad pas phyir mi 'ong /_/de ni bar skyes 'du byed dang /_/'du byed med yongs mya ngan 'da'/_/gong du 'pho ba rnams de ni/_/bsam
[\[20a.4\]]gtan spel na 'og min 'gro/_/de 'phar phyed 'phar [#]thams cad du/_/'chi 'pho gzhan srid rtse mor 'gro/_/gzhan ni gzugs med 'gro rnam bzhi/_/gzhan ni 'di la mya ngan 'da'/_/gsum la yang rnam gsum phye nas/_/gzugs su nye [#]'gro dgur bshad do/_/de dag gi ni
[\[20a.5\]]khyad par rnams/_/las dbang nyon mongs bye brag las/_/gong du 'pho ba ma phye bar/_/dam pa'i 'gro ba bdun du 'dod/_/dam pa dam min 'jug mi 'jug_/son pa phyir mi 'ong phyir de[#]/_/'dod par tshe yongs gyur pa'i 'phags/_/khams gzhan du ni 'gro ba med/_/de dang [# ]
[\[20a.6\]]gong mar skyes pa ni/_/yongs nyams dbang po 'pho mi sten[#]/_/dang po bzhi pa spel bar byed/_/skad cig ma ni bsres pas grub[#]/_/skye dang gnas par bya phyir dang /_/nyon mongs pas ni 'jigs phyir yang /_/de ni rnam pa lnga yi phyir/_/gnas gtsang skye ba lnga kho na/_/'gog pa
[\[20a.7\]]thob pa'i phyir mi 'ong [#]/_/lus kyis mngon sum byed par 'dod/_/srid rtse'i bar cha [#]brgyad zad pa/_/dgra bcom nyid la zhugs pa yin/_/dgu pa'i bar chad med lam yang /_/de ni rdo rje lta bu yin/_/de zad thob dang zad pa shes/_/de tshe de mi slob dgra bcom/_/'jig rten
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]'das kyis [#]srid rtse las/_/chags 'bral [#]gzhan las rnam pa gnyis/_/'jig rten pa yis chags bral ba'i/_/'phags la bral ba'i thob rnam gnyis/_/kha cig 'jig rten 'das kyis kyang /_/btang la nyon mongs mi ldan phyir/_/srid rtse'i phyed las rnam grol dang /_/_
[\[20b.2\]]gong du skyes pa bzhin mi ldan/_/zag med mi lcogs med pa yis/_/thams cad las ni 'dod chags 'bral/_/sa gsum rgyal la bsam [#]gtan nam/_/nyer bsdogs [#]las mtha'i rnam grol lam/_/gong ma'i nyer bsdogs [#]las min 'phags/_/brgyad kyis rang gong sa
[\[20b.3\]]las rgyal/_/'jig rten pa yi rnam grol dang /_/bar chad med lam go rims bzhin/_/zhi sogs rags sogs rnam pa can/_/gong dang 'og ma'i spyod yul can/_/gal te mi g.yo'i zad shes las/_/mi skye'i blo gros gal te min/_/zad pa shes sam mi slob [#]lta/_/_
[\[20b.4\]]de ni dgra bcom thams cad la/_/dge sbyong tshul ni dri med lam/_/'bras bu 'dus byas 'dus ma byas/_/de dag brgyad cu rtsa dgu'o/_/grol lam zad pa rnams [#]dang bcas/_/'bras bu bzhir rnam gzhag pa ni/_/rgyu lnga dag ni srid phyir ro/_/'bras la sngon lam btang ba dang /_/_
[\[20b.5\]]gzhan thob pa dang zad bsdoms dang /_/shes pa brgyad tshan thob pa dang /_/rnam pa bcu drug thob pa'o/_/'jig rten pa yis thob 'bras ni/_/bsres dang zag med thob 'dzin phyir/_/de nyid tshangs tshul tshangs pa yi/_/'khor lo tshangs pas bskor phyir ro/_/chos kyi 'khor lo
[\[20b.6\]]mthong ba'i lam/_/myur bar 'gro sogs rtsibs sogs kyis/_/'dod par gsum 'thob tha ma ni/_/gsum du'o gong na mthong lam med/_/mi skyo lung las 'dir [#]rtsom zhing /_/der mthar phyin ces 'byung phyir ro/_/dgra bcom drug 'dod de dag las/_/lnga ni dad pas mos
[\[20b.7\]]las skyes/_/de dag rnam grol dus dang sbyor/_/mi g.yo'i chos can mi g.yo ba/_/de phyir de dus mi sbyor grol/_/de ni mthong thob rgyu las byung /_/kha cig dang po nas de'i rigs/_/kha cig sbyangs pa las gyur to/_/bzhi ni rigs las lnga 'bras la[#]/_/nyams 'gyur [#]dang po las ma
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]yin/_/slob dang 'phags min rigs drug ldan/_/mthong ba la ni 'pho ba med/_/thob dang ma thob nyer spyad las/_/yongs nyams rnam pa gsum shes [#]bya/_/ston la tha ma mi g.yo la/_/bar ma'ang gzhan la rnam gsum mo/_/'bras las nyams pa 'chi ba med/_/bya ba
[\[21a.2\]]ma yin de mi byed/_/mi g.yo rnam grol bar chad med/_/lam dgu'o shin tu bsten phyir ro/_/mthong bas thob la re re'o/_/zag med mi yi nang du 'phel/_/mi slob sa dgu la bsten [#]te/_/slob pa drug la gang gi phyir/_/'phel ba [#]'bras bu khyad par can/_/btang ste 'bras bu thob
[\[21a.3\]]par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas gnyis dang nyan thos bdun/_/de dgu dbang po rnam dgu can/_/gang zag bdun po sbyor ba dang /_/dbang po snyoms 'jug rnam grol dang /_/gnyis kas byas pa'o de dag drug_/'di ltar lam gsum la gnyis gnyis/_/'gog thob gnyis ka las
[\[21a.4\]]rnam grol/_/shes rab kyis ni cig shos so/_/snyoms 'jug [#]dbang po 'bras rnams kyis/_/slob pa yongs rdzogs zhes bya'o/_/gnyis kyis mi slob yongs su rdzogs/_/mdor na lam ni rnam bzhi ste/_/khyad par can dang rnam grol dang /_/bar chad med dang sbyor zhes bya/_/bsam
[\[21a.5\]]gtan dag gi [#]lam rnams sla[#]/_/sa gzhan dag gi dka' ba yin/_/blo rtul mngon shes bul ba ste/_/cig shos kyi [#]ni mngon shes myur/_/zad dang mi skye shes pa ni/_/byang chub de dang mthun nyid phyir/_/sum cu rtsa bdun de'i phyogs mthun/_/ming gi sgo nas rdzas su bcu/_/dad dang brtson
[\[21a.6\]]'grus dran pa dang /_/shes rab ting 'dzin btang snyoms dga'/_/rtog dang tshul khrims shin tu sbyangs/_/dran pa nyer gzhag shes rab ste/_/brtson 'grus yang dag 'jog ces bya/_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa ting 'dzin to/_/gtso bo smos pa de dag ni/_/sbyor byung yon tan kun kyang yin/_/sde tshan
[\[21a.7\]]bdun ni go rims [#]bzhin/_/las ni dang po [#]pa dag dang /_/nges 'byed cha mthun rnams dang ni/_/bsgom dang mthong la rab tu phye/_/byang chub yan lag lam yan lag_/zag pa med gzhan rnam gnyis so/_/bsam gtan dang po na thams cad/_/mi lcogs med na dga' ma gtogs/_/gnyis pa na
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]ni rtog ma gtogs/_/gnyis na de gnyis ma gtogs pa/_/bsam gtan bar na'ang gzugs med pa/_/gsum na'ang de dang tshul yan lag_/byang chub dang ni lam yan lag_/ma gtogs 'dod khams srid rtse na[#]/_/bden gsum mthong na tshul khrims dang /_/chos la shes nas dad pa
[\[21b.2\]]'thob[#]/_/lam mngon rtogs na sangs rgyas dang /_/de yi dge 'dun dag la yang /_/chos bden gsum dang rang sangs rgyas/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin no/_/rdzas su gnyis te dad pa dang /_/tshul khrims dri ma med pa yin/_/bcings phyir slob pa'i yan lag tu/_/rnam grol ma
[\[21b.3\]]bshad de rnam gnyis/_/nyon mongs bcom pa 'dus ma byas/_/mos pa 'dus byas yan lag ni/_/de yin de nyid rnam grol gnyis/_/byang chub ji skad bshad ces [#]pa/_/mi slob sems ni skye 'gyur ba/_/sgrib pa las ni rnam grol 'gyur/_/'gag par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis ni/_/de yi
[\[21b.4\]]sgrib pa rab tu spong /_/'dus ma byas nyid khams zhes bya/_/'dod chags kun zad 'dod chags bral/_/spangs pa'i khams ni [#]gzhan dag go/_/'gog pa'i khams zhes bya ba gzhi[#]/_/sdug bsngal rgyu bzod shes rnams kyis/_/yid 'byung gang gis spong 'gyur ba/_/kun gyi [#]'dod
[\[21b.5\]]chags 'bral bar 'gyur/_/de ltar [#]na ni mu bzhi srid/_/chos mngon pa'i mdzod [#]kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las/_/lam dang gang zag bstan pa zhes bya ba [#]ste gnas drug pa'o//_//dri med bzod rnams shes pa min[#]/_/zad dang mi skye'i blo lta min/_/de las gzhan 'phags blo gnyis
[\[21b.6\]]ka/_/gzhan shes drug ni lta ba'ang yin/_/shes pa zag bcas zag pa med/_/dang po kun rdzob ces bya'o/_/zag med rnam gnyis chos dang ni/_/rjes su shes pa kho na yin/_/kun rdzob yul ni thams cad do/_/chos zhes bya ba'i spyod yul ni/_/'dod sdug bsngal sogs rjes shes pa'i/_/_
[\[21b.7\]]spyod yul gong ma'i sdug bsngal sogs/_/de dag nyid bden bye brag gis/_/bzhi ste rnam bzhi de dag ni/_/mi skye ba dang zad pa shes/_/de gnyis dang po skyes pa ni/_/sdug bsngal rgyu rjes shes pa yin/_/bzhi las pha rol sems rig pa/_/des ni sa dbang gang zag 'das/_/zhig dang ma skyes
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]mi [#]rig go/_/chos rjes blo phyogs phan tshun min/_/nyan thos mthong ba'i skad cig gnyis/_/rig ste bse ru lta bus gsum/_/sangs rgyas sbyor ba med par [#]kun/_/zad par [#]shes pa bden rnams la/_/yongs shes la sogs pa [#]nges pa'o/_/yongs shes byar med ces [# ]
[\[22a.2\]]la sogs/_/mi skye ba yi blo [#]'dod do/_/rang bzhin dang ni gnyen po dang /_/rnam pa rnam pa spyod yul dang /_/sbyor dang bya ba byas nyid dang /_/rgyu rgyas pa las bcu yin no/_/bsgom pa'i lam la 'gog pa'am/_/lam la chos shes gang yin de/_/khams gsum gyi ni gnyen po yin/_/'dod
[\[22a.3\]]pa'i khams kyi rjes ma yin/_/chos shes pa dang rjes su shes/_/rnam pa bcu drug kun rdzob ni/_/de bzhin gzhan du'ang rang rang gi_/bden pa'i rnam pas bzhi yin no/_/pha rol yid shes dri med kyang /_/de bzhin dri ma dang bcas ni/_/[#]shes bya [#]rang gi mtshan nyid rnam[#]/_/rdzas re re zhig
[\[22a.4\]]spyod yul lo/_/lhag ma rnam pa bcu bzhi can/_/stong dang bdag med ma gtogs so/_/dri med bcu drug gzhan rnam [#]med/_/gzhan yod ces pa bstan bcos las/_/rdzas su rnam pa bcu drug go/_/rnam pa shes rab dang bcas pa'i/_/dmigs dang bcas pas 'dzin par byed/_/yod
[\[22a.5\]]pa thams cad gzung bya yin/_/dang po [#]rnam gsum gzhan rnams dge_/dang po sa rnams thams cad na/_/drug na chos shes bya bar dgu[#]/_/rjes shes bya ba de bzhin drug_/gzhan yid shes pa bsam gtan bzhi[#]/_/de ni 'dod dang gzugs rten can/_/chos shes bya ba 'dod rten can/_/_
[\[22a.6\]]khams gsum pa yi rten can gzhan/_/'gog blo dran pa nyer gzhag pa/_/gcig ste pha rol sems blo ni/_/gsum mo lhag ma bzhi yin no/_/chos blo'i spyod yul dgu yin no/_/lam rjes blo yi dgu yin no/_/sdug bsngal rgyu blo'i [#]gnyis yin no/_/bzhi yi bcu yin gcig gi min/_/_
[\[22a.7\]]chos bcu dag ni sbyar bar bya/_/khams gsum pa dang dri med chos/_/'dus ma byas rnams gnyis gnyis so/_/kun rdzob gcig pus rang tshogs las/_/gzhan ni bdag med nyid rig 'gyur/_/zag med skad cig dang po la/_/chags can shes pa gcig dang ldan/_/gnyis pa la gsum
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]yan chad ni/_/bzhi la re re 'phel dang ldan/_/mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa dang /_/shes pa ji ltar skyes pa rnams/_/ma 'ongs pa 'thob de nyid la/_/rjes gsum la ni kun rdzob kyang /_/de phyir mngon rtogs mtha' zhes bya/_/de ni mi skye'i chos can yin/_/rang dang 'og sa 'gog pa'i
[\[22b.2\]]mtha'/_/rang bden rnam can 'bad las byung /_/chags bcas bcu drug pa la drug_/'dod las chags dang bral bas bdun/_/de yi gong ma chags bcas kyi/_/bsgom pa'i lam la bdun 'thob bo[#]/_/sa bdun las rgyal mngon shes dang /_/mi g.yo 'thob dang spel bsgom pa'i[#]/_
[\[22b.3\]]bar chad med pa'i lam dag dang /_/gong ma'i grol ba'i lam brgyad la'ang /_/slob pa sbyong ba'i grol ba la/_/shes pa drug dang bdun 'thob bam/_/bar chad med pa'i lam la drug_/de bzhin srid rtse [#]rnam rgyal la'ang /_/zad pa [#]shes pa la dgu'o/_/mi g.yo bas ni bcu 'thob bo/_/der
[\[22b.4\]]'pho grol ba'i tha ma la'ang /_/bshad pa'i lhag ma la brgyad 'thob/_/gang las chags bral bya phyir gang /_/thob pa der yang 'og ma'ang 'thob/_/zad pa shes la zag bcas kyang /_/sa kun sngon rnyed mi 'thob bo/_/rnyed dang bsten ces [#]bya ba ni/_/dge ba 'dus byas thob pa'o/_/gnyen
[\[22b.5\]]po dang ni thag bsring [#]pa'i/_/thob pa zag dang bcas pa'i yin/_/sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa/_/stobs la sogs pa bco brgyad do/_/gnas dang gnas min shes pa bcu/_/las 'bras la brgyad bsam gtan sogs/_/dbang po mos dang khams la ni/_/dgu'o lam dag la bcu
[\[22b.6\]]'am/_/gnyis ni kun rdzob shes pa yin/_/zad pa drug gam bcu yin no/_/sngon gnas 'chi 'pho skye ba'i stobs/_/bsam gtan dag na lhag ma [#]ni/_/sa rnams kun na ci yi phyir/_/'di'i stobs gang phyir thogs mi mnga'/_/sku la sred med bu yi stobs/_/gzhan dag tshigs [#]na glang
[\[22b.7\]]chen sogs/_/bdun cus blags [#]pa'i stobs yin no/_/de ni reg bya'i skye mched do/_/mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi/_/ji ltar stobs ni dang po dang /_/bcu pa gnyis pa bdun pa bzhin/_/dran dang shes bzhin bdag nyid gsum/_/thugs rje chen po kun rdzob blo/_/tshogs dang rnam pa spyod yul
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]dang /_/mnyam pa'i phyir dang ches [#]che'i phyir/_/tha dad bya ba rnam pa brgyad/_/sangs rgyas thams cad tshogs dang ni/_/chos sku 'gro ba'i don spyod pas/_/mnyam pa nyid de sku tshe dang /_/rigs dang sku bong tshod kyis min/_/chos gzhan slob dang thun mong yin[#]/_/kha cig so so'i
[\[23a.2\]]skye bo dang /_/nyon mongs med dang smon nas shes/_/so so yang dag rig [#]mngon sogs/_/nyon mongs med pa kun rdzob shes/_/bsam gtan mtha' na mi g.yo'i chos/_/mis skyes [#]nyon mongs 'dod gtogs pa/_/ma skyes gzhir [#]bcas spyod yul can/_/smon nas shes pa'ang de bzhin no/_/_
[\[23a.3\]]de yi dmigs pa thams cad do/_/de bzhin chos don nges tshig dang /_/spobs pa so so yang dag rig_/gsum ni go rims bzhin ming dang /_/don dang ngag la thogs [#]med shes/_/bzhi pa rigs pa thags thogs med/_/mngon brjod lam la dbang nyid la/_/de yi dmigs pa dag dang
[\[23a.4\]]lam/_/shes pa dgu'o sa thams cad/_/yang dag don rig bcu'am drug_/de ni kun na gzhan kun rdzob/_/chos rig 'dod dang bsam gtan na/_/ngag ni 'dod dang dang po na/_/ma tshang bar ni de thob med/_/drug po de dag rab mtha' bas/_/de ni rnam drug bsam gtan mtha'/_/de
[\[23a.5\]]ni sa kun gyis mthun byas/_/'phel pa'i rab tu phyin pa yin/_/sangs rgyas las gzhan sbyor las skyes/_/rdzu 'phrul rna ba [#]yid dang ni/_/sngon tshe 'chi 'pho skye ba dang /_/zad shes mngon du bya ba yi/_/mngon shes rnam drug rnam grol blo/_/bzhi ni kun rdzob shes pa ste/_/sems la shes pa lnga
