[\[23a.6\]]yin no/_/zad pa'i mngon shes stobs bzhin no/_/lnga ni bsam gtan bzhi dag na/_/rang dang 'og sa'i yul [#]can yin/_/thob bya 'dris pa chags bral bas/_/gsum pa dran pa nyer gzhag gsum/_/dang po rdzu 'phrul rna ba mig_/mig dang rna ba'i mngon shes ni/_/lung du ma bstan lhag rnams
[\[23a.7\]]dge_/gsum ni rig pa sngon [#]mtha' sogs/_/ma rig pa ni bzlog phyir ro/_/mi slob tha ma gnyis ni de'i/_/rgyud la [#]skyes phyir de zhes bya/_/slob la 'dod de ma rig dang /_/bcas rgyud phyir na rig ma [#]bshad/_/dang po gsum pa drug pa ni/_/cho 'phrul rnams yin bstan pa mchog_/mi 'khrul
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]phyir [#]dang phan pa dang /_/yid 'ong 'bras la sbyor byed phyir/_/rdzu 'phrul ting 'dzin de las ni/_/sprul dang 'gro ba ston pa la/_/yid mgyogs 'gro ba gzhan dag la/_/phyin byed mos pa las byung yang /_/'dod par gtogs pa'i sprul pa ni/_/phyi yi skye mched bzhi rnam gnyis/_/gzugs gtogs
[\[23b.2\]]gnyis sprul sems dag gis/_/de dag kyang ni bcu bzhi'o/_/bsam gtan 'bras gnyis nas lnga'i bar/_/rim bzhin gong ma las skyes min/_/de rnyed [#]bsam gtan bzhin de ni/_/dag dang rang las de las gnyis/_/rang gi sa pas sprul par byed/_/smrar 'jug pa ni 'og mas kyang /_/ston min
[\[23b.3\]]sprul pa po dang bcas/_/byin gyis brlabs nas gzhan 'jug phyir/_/shi ba la yang byin brlabs [#]yod/_/mi brtan la med gzhan dag min/_/dang po [#]du mas gcig yin te/_/byang bar gyur nas bzlog pa'o/_/bsgoms [#]las skyes pa lung ma bstan/_/skye ba las skyes rnam gsum mo/_/rdzu
[\[23b.4\]]'phrul gsang sngags sman dag dang /_/las las skyes dang rnam pa lnga/_/lha yi mig dang rna ba yin/_/bsam gtan sa pa'i gzugs dang ba/_/rtag tu rten [#]bcas ma tshang med/_/thag ring phra sogs spyod yul can/_/dgra bcom bse ru ston rnams kyis/_/stong gnyis gsum dang grangs med
[\[23b.5\]]mthong /_/gzhan yang skye bas thob des ni/_/srid pa bar ma mi mthong ngo /_/sems shes de ni rnam gsum gang [#]/_/rtog dang rig sngags kyis byas pa'ang /_/dmyal ba pas ni dang po shes/_/mi la skye bas thob pa med/_/chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las/_ye shes bstan pa zhes
[\[23b.6\]]bya ba ste gnas bdun pa'o//_//bsam gtan dag ni rnam gnyis bzhi/_/der skye ba dag rab tu bshad/_/snyoms 'jug dge ba rtse gcig pa/_/rjes 'brang bcas na phung po lnga/_/dpyod dang dga' dang bde dang ldan/_/yan lag snga snga spangs pa yi[#]/_/de bzhin gzugs med phung po bzhi/_/'og
[\[23b.7\]]ma'i sa las dben las skyes/_/nyer bsdogs [#]gsum dang bcas par ni/_/gzugs kyi 'du shes bshig ces bya/_/gzugs med pa na gzugs med do/_/gzugs ni sems las skye bar 'gyur/_/rnam shes mtha' yas mkha' mtha' yas/_/ci yang med ces bya de ltar/_/sbyor phyir dman
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]phyir 'du shes med/_/'du shes med pa'ang ma yin no/_/de ltar snyoms 'jug dngos gzhi'i rdzas/_/rnam pa brgyad bdun rnam pa gsum/_/ro myang ldan dang dag pa dang /_/zag med brgyad pa rnam pa gnyis/_/ro myang mtshungs ldan sred bcas so/_/'jig rten pa yi dge ba ni/_/dag pa de ni
[\[24a.2\]]des myang bya/_/zag med 'jig rten 'das pa'o/_/dang po la lnga rtog dpyod dang /_/dga' dang bde dang ting 'dzin rnams/_/gnyis pa la ni yan lag bzhi/_/rab dang dang ni dga' la sogs/_/gsum pa la lnga btang snyoms dang /_/dran dang shes bzhin bde dang gnas/_/mtha' na bzhi dran btang snyoms
[\[24a.3\]]dang /_/bde min sdug min ting 'dzin rnams[#]/_/rdzas su bcu gcig dang po na/_/shin tu sbyangs pa bde ba yin/_/rab tu dang ba dad pa yin/_/lung rnam gnyis phyir dga' yid bde/_/nyon mongs can la dga' bde dang /_/rab dang shes bzhin dran pa dang /_/btang snyoms dran pa dag pa med/_/kha cig
[\[24a.4\]]shin tu sbyangs btang snyoms/_/skyon brgyad las ni grol ba'i phyir/_/bzhi pa g.yo ba med pa yin/_/rtog dang dpyod dang dbugs dag dang /_/bde ba la sogs bzhi yin no/_/skye ba'i bsam gtan dag na ni/_/yid bde bde dang btang snyoms dang /_/btang snyoms yid bde bde ba dang /_/btang snyoms
[\[24a.5\]]btang snyoms tshor ba yod[#]/_/gnyis pa sogs na lus mig dang /_/rna ba'i rnam shes rnam rig slong /_/gang yin de ni dang por gtogs/_/de lung ma bstan nyon mongs min/_/de dang mi ldan 'dod chags bral/_/skye ba las ni dag pa 'thob[#]/_/zag med 'dod chags bral ba yis/_/nyon mongs can nyams skye ba
[\[24a.6\]]yis/_/zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su/_/ltag 'og gsum pa'i bar dge ba/_/skye'o [#]dag pa las de bzhin/_/rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kyang /_/nyon mongs can las rang dag dang /_/nyon mongs 'og ma'i dag gcig kyang /_/'chi 'pho'i [#]dag las nyon mongs kun/_/nyon mongs can las gong ma min/_/dag pa
[\[24a.7\]]nyams pa'i cha mthun sogs/_/rnam bzhi de ni go rims bzhin/_/nyon mongs skye dang rang sa dang /_/gong dang zag med rjes mthun pa[#]/_/nyams cha mthun sogs mjug thogs su/_/gnyis dang gsum dang gsum dang gcig_/sa brgyad rnam gnyis 'brel pa dang /_/gcig rgal [#]song zhing 'ongs nas ni/_/rigs [#]mi
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]mthun pa gsum par 'gro/_/thod rgal [#]gyi ni snyoms 'jug yin/_/bsam gtan gzugs med rang dang ni/_/'og sa'i rten can 'og dgos med/_/srid rtser 'phags pa'i [#]ci yang med/_/mngon sum byas nas zag pa zad/_/sred bcas rang gi sred [#]la dmigs/_/bsam gtan dge yul yod dgu
[\[24b.2\]]yin/_/gzugs med dngos gzhi dge rnams kyi/_/spyod yul zag bcas 'og ma min/_/zag pa med pas nyon mongs rnams/_/spong ngo nyer bzlog [#]dag pas kyang /_/de dag la ni nyer bzlog [#]brgyad/_/dag pa bde min sdug bsngal min/_/dang po 'phags pa'ang kha cig gsum/_/rtog med bsam gtan
[\[24b.3\]]khyad par can/_/rnam gsum bde min sdug bsngal [#]min/_/de ni tshangs chen 'bras bu can/_/man chad rtog dpyod bcas pa yi/_/ting 'dzin yan chad gnyis ka med/_/mtshan med zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_/stong nyid bdag med stong nyid du/_/'jug pa'o smon pa med pa ni/_/de las gzhan bden rnam pa dang /_/_
[\[24b.4\]]dag dang dri ma med de dag_/dri med rnam thar sgo gsum mo/_/stong nyid stong nyid ces la sogs/_/gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin gsum mo/_/gnyis ni stong dang mi rtag par/_/mi slob pa'i la dmigs pa yin/_/mtshan ma med pa mtshan med ni/_/zhi bar ma brtags [#]zad pa la/_/zag bcas mi nang mi g.yo
[\[24b.5\]]la/_/nyer bsdogs [#]bdun ni ma gtogs so/_/dge ba'i bsam gtan dang po ni/_/bde 'gyur ting 'dzin sgom [#]pa yin/_/mig gi mngon shes mthong 'gyur 'dod/_/sbyor ba las byung blo dbyer 'gyur/_/rdo rje lta bu'i bsam gtan mtha'i/_/gang yin de zag zad 'gyur bsgom[#]/_/tshad med pa ni bzhi yin
[\[24b.6\]]no/_/gnod sems la sogs gnyen po'i phyir/_/zhe sdang med byams snying rje yang /_/yid bde ba ni dga' ba yin/_/btang snyoms ma chags rnam pa ni/_/kye ma bder gyur sdug bsngal dang /_/dgar gyur sems can rnams snyam [#]pa/_/spyod yul 'dod pa'i sems can rnams/_/dga' ba bsam gtan
[\[24b.7\]]gnyis na yod/_/gzhan ni drug na kha cig lnga/_/de yis mi spong mi dag gi_/nang du skyed de [#]nges gsum ldan/_/rnam par thar brgyad dang po gnyis/_/mi sdug bsam gtan gnyis na yod/_/gsum pa mtha' na de ma chags/_/gzugs med mnyam gzhag dge rnams so/_/'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o/_/_
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]phra ba [#]phra ba'i mjug thogs su/_/rang gi dag dang 'og ma yi/_/'phags pa'i sems kyis de las ldang /_/dang po 'dod gtogs [#]snang yul can/_/gang dag gzugs can min de dag_/spyod yul gong dang rang gi sa'i/_/sdug bsngal sogs dang rjes shes phyogs/_/zil gyis gnon pa'i skye
[\[25a.2\]]mched brgyad/_/gnyis ni rnam thar dang po bzhin[#]/_/gnyis ni gnyis pa bzhin de [#]gzhan/_/sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa bzhin/_/zad par bcu'o brgyad ma chags/_/bsam gtan mtha' na spyod yul ni/_/'dod pa gnyis ni gzugs med dag_/spyod yul rang gi phung po bzhi/_/'gog pa bshad zin lhag ma ni/_/_
[\[25a.3\]]'dod chags bral dang sbyor bas 'thob/_/gzugs med ces bya khams gsum gyi/_/rten can lhag ma mi las skye/_/khams gnyis dag tu gzugs med pa/_/rgyu dang las kyi stobs kyis skye[#]/_/gzugs kyi khams su bsam gtan rnams/_/de dag dang chos nyid kyis kyang /_/ston pa'i dam chos rnam gnyis te/_/_
[\[25a.4\]]lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid do/_/de 'dzin byed pa smra byed dang /_/sgrub par byed pa kho na yin/_/bdag gis mngon pa'i chos 'di phal cher ni/_/kha che bye brag smra ba'i tshul grub bshad/_/nyes par zin gang de 'dir bdag gis nyes/_/dam chos tshul la tshad ma thub rnams yin/_/chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas
[\[25a.5\]]pa las/_snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas brgyad pa'o//_//ston pa 'jig rten mig ni zum gyur cing /_/dbang gyur skye bo phal cher zad pa na/_/de nyid ma mthong rang dgar gyur pa yi/_/ngan rtog [#]rnams kyis bstan pa 'di dkrugs so/_/rang byung rang byung bstan pa gces 'dzin rnams/_/mchog
[\[25a.6\]]tu zhir gshegs 'gro mgon med pa na/_/'doms med yon tan 'joms par byed pa yi/_/dri mas dga' mgur deng sang 'di na spyod/_/de ltar thub pa dag gi bstan pa ni/_/lkog mar srog phyin 'dra dang dri ma rnams/_/stobs dang ldan pa'i dus su rig nas ni/_/thar pa 'dod pa dag gis bag yod gyis/_/chos
[\[25a.7\]]mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon shAkya'i dge slong dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi [#]na mi tra dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//_//_
[\[25b\]]
[\[26a\]]
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]{D4090}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_a b+hi d+har+m+mako ShaM b+hA Sh+yaM[#]/_bod skad du/_chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang zhig kun la mun pa gtan bcom zhing /_/'khor ba'i 'dam las 'gro ba drangs mdzad pa/_/_
[\[26b.2\]]don bzhin ston pa de la phyag 'tshal nas/_/chos mngon mdzod kyi bstan bcos rab bshad bya/_/bstan bcos byed par 'dod pas rang gi ston pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir de la yon tan brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyag 'tshal ba rtsom [#]mo/_/gang zhig ces bya ba ni/_
[\[26b.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das [#]kyi dbang du byas nas smras pa'o/_/'di'i 'am 'dis [#]mun pa bcom pas mun pa bcom pa'o/_/thams cad la mun pa rnam pa thams cad du bcom pas kun la mun pa gtan bcom pa'o/_/mi shes pa ni yang dag pa'i don mthong ba la
[\[26b.4\]]bgegs su gyur pa'i phyir mun pa ste/_de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das [#]kyis gnyen po brnyes nas shes bya thams cad la phyis mi skye ba'i chos can du gyur pa'i phyir gtan nas ye bcom pa ste/_de'i phyir 'di'i [#]ni kun la mun pa gtan bcom pa'o/_/de [#]rang
[\[26b.5\]]sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams kyang nyon mongs pa can gyi rmongs [#]pa dang bral ba'i phyir kun la mun pa bcom par ni 'dod mod kyi gtan nas ni ma yin te 'di ltar de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_yul dang /_dus shin tu bskal pa dang /_don rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas
[\[26b.6\]]pa rnams la nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi [#]shes pa yod pa nyid do/_/de ltar bdag la phan pa sgrub pa phun sum tshogs pas yang dag par bstod nas/_yang bcom ldan 'das de nyid la gzhan la phan pa sgrub [#]pa phun sum tshogs pas yang dag par bstod pa ni/_'khor
[\[26b.7\]]ba'i 'dam las 'gro ba drangs [#]mdzad pa/_/zhes bya ba ste/_'khor ba ni 'gro ba kun tu chags [#]pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir dang /_brgal [#]bar dka' ba'i phyir 'dam lta bu yin te/_'gro ba der bying ba skyabs med pa la bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba dang ldan pas
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]dam pa'i chos ston pa'i phyag brkyang ba dag gis skal ba [#]ji lta ba bzhin du drangs so/_/don ji lta ba bzhin phyin ci ma log par ston pas na don bzhin ston pa'o/_/'dis ni 'di'i gzhan la phan pa sgrub [#]pa'i thabs ston te/_de ni ston pa na [#]yang dag pa
[\[27a.2\]]ji lta ba bzhin du ston pas 'khor ba'i 'dam las 'gro ba drangs kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /_dam pa sbyin pa'i mthus ni ma yin no/_/de ltar bdag dang gzhan la phan pa sgrub pa phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba ni mgos btud nas so/_/_
[\[27a.3\]]don bzhin ston pa de la phyag 'tshal nas ci zhig bya zhe na/_bstan bcos rab bshad bya zhes bya ba smos te[#]/_slob ma 'chos pas na bstan bcos so/_/bstan bcos gang zhe na/_chos mngon mdzod ces bya ba smos so/_/chos mngon pa zhes bya ba 'di gang zhe na/_
[\[27a.4\]]chos mngon shes rab dri med rjes 'brang bcas/_/zhes bya ba ste/_de la shes rab ces bya ba ni/_chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'o/_/dri med ces bya ba ni gang zag pa med pa'o/_/rjes 'brang bcas [#]zhes bya ba ni 'khor dang bcas pa ste/_de ltar na zag pa med pa'i
[\[27a.5\]]phung po lnga po la chos mngon pa zhes bstan par 'gyur ro/_/re zhig 'di ni don dam pa'i chos mngon pa'o/_/brdar btags [#]pa ni/_de thob bya'i [#]phyir gang dang bstan bcos gang zhes bya ba [#]ste/_gang dang zhes bya ba ni thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa las
[\[27a.6\]]byung ba'i shes rab gang [#]zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_skyes nas thob pa rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa'o/_/bstan bcos gang zhes bya ba ni de yang zag pa med pa'i [#]shes rab thob par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshogs su gyur pas chos mngon pa zhes bya'o/_/nges pa'i tshig [#]tu
[\[27a.7\]]rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir [#]chos te/_de lta bas na 'di ni don dam pa'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa'am/_chos kyi mtshan nyid la mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir chos mngon pa'o/_/chos mngon pa bshad zin to/_/bstan bcos 'di ji ltar na chos mngon pa'i mdzod
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]yin zhe na/_'dir de don du yang dag chud phyir ram/_'di yi gnas de yin pas chos mngon mdzod ces bya ba [#]smos te/_chos mngon pa'i bstan bcos zhes bya ba de ji ltar gces gces rnams don du 'dir chud de/_de lta bas na bstan bcos 'di ni de'i mdzod lta bu yin
[\[27b.2\]]no/_/yang na de las 'di phyung bas chos mngon pa de bstan bcos 'di'i gnas lta bu yin no/_/de'i phyir chos mngon pa de nyid 'di'i mdzod yin te/_de lta bas na bstan bcos 'di ni chos [#]mngon pa'i mdzod yin no/_/yang ci'i phyir chos mngon pa bstan/_'di dang
[\[27b.3\]]po nyid du sus [#]bstan na/_'di ltar slob dpon chos mngon pa'i mdzod 'chad par gus she na/_chos rnams rab tu rnam 'byed med par nyon mongs rnams/_/gang phyir nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i thabs med la/_/nyon mongs pas kyang 'jig rten srid mtsho 'dir
[\[27b.4\]]'khyams te/_/de bas de phyir 'di ni ston pas gsungs so lo/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_gang gi phyir chos rnams [#]rab tu rnam par 'byed pa med par nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i thabs med la/_nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kyang 'jig rten 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po 'dir
[\[27b.5\]]'khyam par byed pa de'i phyir chos rnams rab tu rnam par 'byed par 'dod pa de'i don du ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos mngon pa gsungs so lo/_/chos mngon pa bstan pa med par ni slob mas chos rab tu rnam par 'byed par [#]mi nus so/_/bye brag tu smra ba
[\[27b.6\]]rnams na re de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sil [#]bur bshad la/_btsun pa kA t+yA'i [#]bu la sogs pas bsdus nas bzhag ste/_btsun pa chos skyob kyis ched du brjod pa'i sde/_sde tshan du byas pa bzhin no zhes zer ro/_/gang dag chos mngon pa bstan pas rab tu rnam par
[\[27b.7\]]dbye bar bya ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_zag bcas zag pa med chos rnams/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_'di ni chos rnams thams cad mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o/_/de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_lam ma gtogs pa 'dus byas
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]rnams/_/zag bcas zhes bya ba [#]ste/_lam gyi bden pa ma gtogs pa 'dus byas kyi chos gzhan rnams [#]ni zag pa dang bcas pa dag go/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang phyir de dag la/_/zag rnams kun tu rgyas par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba [#]ste/_'gog pa
[\[28a.2\]]dang lam gyi bden pa la dmigs pas kyang [#]zag pa skye bar ni 'dod mod kyi/_de gnyis la rgyas par mi 'gyur bas de gnyis zag pa dang bcas pa nyid du thal ba med do/_/ji ltar rgyas par mi 'gyur ba de ni 'og nas phra rgyas bstan pa nyid du bstan par bya'o/_/zag pa dang
[\[28a.3\]]bcas pa dag bshad zin to/_/zag pa med pa rnams gang zhe na/_zag med lam gyi bden pa dang /_/'dus ma byas rnam gsum yang ste/_/zhes bya ba'o[#]/_/rnam gsum gang zhe na/_nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis/_/zhes bya ba ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_so sor
[\[28a.4\]]brtags pas 'gog pa dang /_so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa ste/_de ltar nam mkha' la sogs pa 'dus ma byas rnam pa gsum po de dang /_lam gyi bden pa ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams te/_de dag la zag pa rgyas par 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/_
[\[28a.5\]]'dus ma byas rnam pa gsum po bstan pa gang yin pa de la nam mkha' mi sgrib pa/_nam mkha' ni sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin te gang na gzugs kyi go yod pa'o/_/so sor brtags pas 'gog pa dang [#]bral ba'o/_/gang zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams dang bral ba
[\[28a.6\]]de ni [#]so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'o/_/sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la so sor rtog pa ni so sor brtags pa ste shes rab kyi bye brag go/_/des thob par bya ba'i 'gog pa ni so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'o/_/bar gyi tshig mi mngon par bya
[\[28a.7\]]ba ste/_dper na ba lang dag dang ldan pa'i shing rta la ba lang gi shing rta zhes bya ba lta bu'o/_/ci zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyi so sor brtags pas 'gog pa gcig kho na 'am zhe na/_smras pa/_ma yin no/_/'o na ji lta bu [#]zhe na/_so so so so yin/_ldan
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]pa'i rdzas rnams ji snyed pa bral ba'i rdzas rnams kyang de snyed [#]do/_/de lta ma yin na sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i 'gog pa mngon sum du byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gog pa mngon sum du byed par thal bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta ma yin na lhag
[\[28b.2\]]ma'i gnyen po bsgom pa don med par 'gyur ro/_/'o na 'gog pa ni 'dra ba ma yin no zhes bshad pa 'di'i don ji lta bu yin zhe na/_tshig de'i don ni 'di 'dra ba'i rgyu gang yang ma yin la/_'di yang gang gi 'dra ba'i rgyu yang ma yin no zhes bya'o/_/[#]'di la 'dra ba gang yang med
[\[28b.3\]]do zhes bya ba ni ma yin no/_/so sor brtags pas 'gog pa bshad zin to/_/skye la gtan du bgegs [#]byed pa/_/'gog gzhan so sor brtags min pas/_/chos ma 'ongs pa rnams skye ba la gtan du bgegs [#]su gyur pa bral ba las gzhan pa'i 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni
[\[28b.4\]]so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa ste/_'di so sor brtags pas 'thob pa ni ma yin no/_/'o na ci zhe na/_rkyen ma tshang ba las [#]thob ste/_dper na mig dang yid gzugs gcig la yengs pa'i gzugs gzhan pa [#]rnams dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya gang yin
[\[28b.5\]]pa dag ni 'das par 'gyur la/_de dag la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag ni yang skye bar yang [#]mi nus te/_de dag 'das pa'i yul la dmigs pa'i mthu med pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i phyir de dag gi so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa de ni rkyen
[\[28b.6\]]ma tshang bas 'thob bo/_/'dir mu bzhir 'gyur te/_gang dag gis [#]so sor brtags pas 'gog pa kho na 'thob pa'i chos de dag kyang yod de/_'di lta ste/_zag pa dang bcas pa 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dang 'byung ba'i chos can rnams kyi lta bu'o/_/gang dag gis [#]so sor
[\[28b.7\]]brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa kho na 'thob pa yang yod de/_'di lta ste/_zag pa med pa'i 'dus byas mi [#]skye ba'i chos can rnams kyi lta bu'o/_/gang dag gis [#]gnyi ga 'thob pa yang yod de/_'di lta ste/_zag pa dang bcas pa mi skye ba'i chos can rnams kyi lta bu'o/_/_
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]gang dag gis [#]gnyi ga mi 'thob pa yang yod de/_'di lta ste/_zag pa med pa 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dang 'byung ba'i chos can rnams kyi lta bu'o/_/'dus ma byas rnam pa gsum bshad zin to/_/lam ma gtogs pa 'dus byas rnams/_/zag bcas
[\[29a.2\]]zhes gang smras pa'i 'dus byas de dag gang zhe na/_'dus byas chos rnams de dag kyang /_/gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga/_/gzugs kyi phung po dang /_tshor ba'i phung po dang /_'du shes kyi phung po dang /_'du byed kyi phung po dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya ba de
[\[29a.3\]]dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams so/_/rkyen rnams 'dus shing phrad nas byas pa dag ni 'dus byas rnams te/_rkyen gcig gis bskyed pa ni 'ga' yang med do/_/de dang rigs mthun pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa dag la [#]yang mi 'gal te 'o ma dang shing [#]bzhin no/_/de dag nyid dus gtam
[\[29a.4\]]gzhi dang /_/nges par 'byung ba gzhi [#]dang bcas/_/de dag nyid ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams so/_/song ba dang 'gro ba dang 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ram/_mi rtag pa nyid kyis za ba'i phyir dus rnams so/_/gtam ni ngag go/_/de'i gzhi ni ming ste/_don dang bcas pa'i gzhi smos
[\[29a.5\]]pa'i phyir na 'dus byas ni gtam gyi gzhi zhes bya'o/_/de lta ma yin na rab tu byed pa las/_gtam gyi gzhi rnams ni khams bco brgyad kyis bsdus so zhes 'byung ba'i gzhung dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro/_/gdon mi za bar 'byung ba ni nges par 'byung ba ste/_'dus byas thams
[\[29a.6\]]cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/de 'di dag la yod pas nges par 'byung bcas dag go/_/rgyu dang bcas pa'i phyir gzhi dang bcas pa dag ste/_bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re [#]gzhi zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rgyu'i tshig yin lo[#]/_/de ltar na de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos kyi rnam grangs
[\[29a.7\]]dag yin no/_/yang 'dus byas de dag nyid/_gang dag zag bcas nyer len pa'i/_/phung po'ang de dag_/'dis ci zhig grub par 'gyur zhe na/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga gang dag yin pa de dag ni phung po yang yin no[#]/_/phung po dag kho na yin la nye bar len pa'i phung po
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]ma yin pa dag kyang yod de/_'du byed zag pa med pa rnams so/_/de la nye bar len pa dag ni nyon mongs pa rnams so/_/de dag las byung ba'i phyir nye bar len pa'i phung po dag ste/_dper na rtswa dang sog ma'i me bzhin pa 'am/_de dag la rag lus pa'i phyir rgyal po'i mi
[\[29b.2\]]bzhin no/_/yang na de dag las nye bar len pa rnams 'byung bas nye bar len pa'i phung po rnams te/_me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa bzhin no/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos de dag nyid/_'thab bcas kyang zhes bya'o/_/'thab pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams te/_bdag dang gzhan la gnod
[\[29b.3\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/de dag gis rgyas par byas pa'i phyir 'thab bcas dag ste zag pa dang bcas pa bzhin no/_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'jig rten dang /_/lha [#]gnas srid pa'ang de dag yin/_/'phags pa rnams dang mi mthun pa'i phyir sdug bsngal lo/_/'di las [#]sdug bsngal kun
[\[29b.4\]]'byung bas kun 'byung ba'o/_/'jig pas na [#]'jig rten no/_/'di la lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba'i sgo nas gnas pas na lta ba'i gnas so/_/'byung bas na srid pa ste/_de ltar na 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi rnam grangs don dang mthun pa dag go/_/_
[\[29b.5\]]gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga/_/zhes smras pa de la/_gzugs ni dbang po lnga dang don/_/lnga dang rnam rig byed min nyid/_/dbang po lnga po mig dang rna ba dang /_/sna dang /_lce dang /_lus kyi dbang po rnams dang /_don lnga po mig la sogs pa rnams de dag nyid kyi yul gang dag yin pa
[\[29b.6\]]gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya rnams dang /_rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ste de snyed cig ni gzugs kyi phung po'o/_/de la gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag smos pa gang dag yin pa/_de dag rnams kyi rnam shes rten/_/mig la sogs gzugs dang [#]ba rnams/_/_
[\[29b.7\]]gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya'i rnam par shes pa rnams kyi rten du gyur pa gzugs dang ba'i bdag nyid lnga po gang dag yin pa de dag ni go rims bzhin du mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dag yin par rig par bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]kyis ji skad du dge slong mig ni nang gi skye mched de/_'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa gzugs dang ba'o zhes rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/yang na mig la sogs pa 'di dag smos pa gang dag [#]yin pa/_de dag rnams kyi rnam shes rten/_/mig la
[\[30a.2\]]sogs gzugs dang ba rnams/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i rten yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste/_de ltar bshad na rab tu byed pa las/_/mig gi dbang po gang zhe na/_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gzugs dang ba'o zhes rgyas par 'byung ba'i gzhung dang yang
[\[30a.3\]]mthun par 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lnga dag bshad zin to/_/don lnga bshad par [#]bya ste/_de la re zhig_/gzugs rnam gnyis dang /_/kha dog dang /_dbyibs so/_/de la kha dog ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_sngon po la sogs pa'o/_/gzhan dag ni de'i bye brag go/_/dbyibs ni rnam pa
[\[30a.4\]]brgyad de/_ring po la sogs pa nas phya le ba [#]ma yin pa la thug pa'o/_/yang gzugs kyi skye mched de nyid/_rnam pa nyi shu zhes bya ste/_'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dkar [#]po dang /_dmar [#]po dang /_ring po dang /_thung ngu dang /_lham pa dang /_zlum po dang /_mthon
[\[30a.5\]]po dang /_dma' ba dang /_phya le ba dang /_phya le ba [#]ma yin pa dang /_sprin dang /_du ba dang /_rdul dang /_khug rna dang /_grib ma dang /_nyi ma dang /_snang ba dang /_mun pa'o/_/kha cig ni nam mkha' la [#]kha dog gcig dang rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'don to/_/de la phya le ba ni dbyibs
[\[30a.6\]]mnyam [#]pa'o/_/phya le ba ma yin pa ni dbyibs mi mnyam pa'o/_/[#]khug rna ni lho bur ro/_/nyi ma ni nyi ma'i 'od do/_/snang ba ni zla ba dang skar ma dang me dang sman dang nor bu rnams kyi 'od dag go/_/grib ma ni gang na gzugs rnams snang ba'o/_/de las [#]bzlog pa ni mun pa'o/_/lhag
[\[30a.7\]]ma ni brda phrad par sla bas rnam par ma phye ba'o[#]/_/gzugs kyi skye mched kha dog tu yod la dbyibs su med pa yang yod de/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_grib ma dang /_nyi ma dang /_snang ba dang /_mun pa zhes bya'o[#]/_/dbyibs su yod la kha dog
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]tu med pa yang yod de/_ring po la sogs pa'i phyogs lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/gnyi gar yod pa yang yod de/_gzugs kyi skye mched lhag ma'o/_/gzhan dag na re/_sngon po la sogs pa dang [#]ring po la sogs par yongs su chad par [#]snang bas na nyi ma dang /_
[\[30b.2\]]snang ba kho na kha dog tu yod do zhes zer ro/_/ji ltar na rdzas gcig la gnyi gar yod ce na/_de la gnyi ga mngon pa'i phyir te/_yod pa 'di ni shes pa'i don yin gyi yod pa'i don ni ma yin no/_/'o na ni lus kyi rnam par rig byed la'ang thal bar 'gyur ro/_/gzugs kyi skye
[\[30b.3\]]mched bshad zin to/_/sgra ni rnam pa brgyad yod de[#]/_zin pa dang ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung [#]ba sems can dang /_sems can ma yin par ston pa ste rnam pa bzhi'o/_/de yang yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i bye brag gis [#]rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur ro/_/_
[\[30b.4\]]de la zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_lag pa dang ngag gi sgra lta bu'o/_/ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_rlung dang /_nags tshal dang /_chu'i sgra lta bu'o/_/sems can du ston pa ni [#]ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi sgra'o/_/_
[\[30b.5\]]gzhan ni sems can du ston pa ma yin pa'o/_/gzhan dag na re zin pa dang /_ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba'i sgra yang yod de/_dper na lag pa dang rdza rnga phrad pa las skyes pa lta bu'o zhes zer te[#]/_de ni 'di ltar kha dog gi rdul phra rab gcig las byung ba bzhi
[\[30b.6\]]tshan gnyis rgyur byas par mi 'dod pa de bzhin du mi 'dod par bya'o/_/sgra bshad zin to/_/ro ni rnam pa drug_/mngar ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_tsha ba dang /_kha ba dang /_bska ba'i bye brag gis so/_/dri rnam bzhi/_dri zhim pa dang /_dri nga ba rnam pa gnyis/_dri mnyam pa dang /_
[\[30b.7\]]mi mnyam pa'i phyir ro/_/bstan bcos las ni dri zhim pa dang /_dri nga ba dang /_dri mnyam pa'o zhes rnam pa gsum 'byung ngo /_/reg bya bcu gcig bdag nyid do/_/reg bya [#]rdzas kyi rang bzhin ni bcu gcig ste/_'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang /_'jam pa nyid dang /_
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]rtsub pa nyid dang /_lci ba nyid dang /_yang ba nyid dang /_grang ba dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa'o/_/de la 'byung ba rnams ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o/_/'jam pa nyid ni mnyen pa'o/_/rtsub pa nyid ni rud rud [#]pa'o/_/lci ba nyid ni gang gis na dngos po rnams 'jal bar byed
[\[31a.2\]]pa'o/_/bzlog pa ni yang ba nyid do/_/grang ba ni dro bar 'dod par byed pa'o/_/bkres pa ni zad 'dod par byed pa'o/_/skom pa ni skom 'dod par byed pa'o/_/rgyu la [#]'bras bu btags pa'i phyir te/_dper na/_sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba bde/_/chos bstan pa yang bde ba'o/_/dge 'dun mthun
[\[31a.3\]]pa bde ba yin/_/mthun pa rnams kyi dka' thub bde/_/zhes bya ba bzhin no/_/de la gzugs kyi khams na ni bkres pa dang skom pa med do/_/lhag ma ni yod do/_/gal te de ni gos re re nas mi 'jal yang bsags pa dag ni 'jal lo/_/gnod par byed pa'i grang ba med
[\[31a.4\]]kyi phan par byed pa ni yod do lo/_/gang 'di gzugs rnam pa mang po bshad pa de la res 'ga' ni rdzas gcig gis mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed de/_gang gi tshe de'i rnam pa bye brag tu gcod par 'gyur ba na'o/_/res 'ga' ni mang pos te/_gang gi tshe bye brag tu mi gcod pa na
[\[31a.5\]]ste/_dper na thag ring po nas dmag bshams pa 'am/_nor bu'i tshogs kyi kha dog dang dbyibs du ma la lta ba [#]lta bu'o/_/rna ba la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni kha cig na re shin tu mang na 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag
[\[31a.6\]]dang /_'jam pa nyid la sogs pa gcig dang reg bya lngas skyed do zhes zer ro/_/gzhan dag na re bcu gcig po thams cad kyis kyang skyed [#]do zhes zer ro/_/de lta na spyi la dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag spyi'i yul can du 'gyur gyi/_rang gi mtshan
[\[31a.7\]]nyid kyi yul can ma yin pa ma yin nam [#]zhe na/_'di dag ni skye mched kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can du 'dod kyi/_rdzas kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi ni ma yin pas nyes pa med do/_/'di dpyad par bya ste/_lus dang lce'i dbang po gnyis cig car du yul dang phrad na rnam par
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]shes pa gang sngar skye zhe na/_gang gi yul shas [#]che ba'o/_/yul mnyam pa dang phrad na ni lce'i rnam par shes pa sngar skye ste/_za bar 'dod pas rgyud gtad pa'i phyir ro/_/dbang po lnga dang /_don lnga dang /_de dag la ji ltar 'dzin pa yang bshad zin to/_/da ni rnam par rig byed ma yin
[\[31b.2\]]pa bsnyad par bya ba de brjod par bya ste/_g.yengs dang sems med pa yi yang /_/dge dang mi dge'i [#]rjes 'brel gang /_/'byung ba che rnams rgyur byas pa/_/de ni rnam rig byed min [#]brjod/_/sems g.yengs pa zhes bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i sems kyi yang yin pa'o/_/sems med
[\[31b.3\]]pa'i yang zhes bya ba ni 'du shes med pa dang /_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i yang yin pa'o/_/yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ma g.yengs pa sems dang bcas pa'i yang yin no zhes bya bar mngon no/_/dge dang mi dge zhes bya ba ni dge legs dang dge legs ma yin
[\[31b.4\]]pa'o/_/rjes 'brel gang zhes bya ba ni rgyun to/_/thob pa'i rgyun yang 'di lta bu yod pas bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir/_'byung ba che rnams rgyur byas pa/_/zhes bya ba brjod do/_/bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re rgyur byas pa'i don ni rgyu'i don to/_/[#]skyed pa la sogs pa rgyu'i ngo bo nyid
[\[31b.5\]]yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro/_/de ni rnam rig byed min zhes bya ba la/_de ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de'i ming shes par bya ba'i phyir te/_gzugs dang byed pa'i rang bzhin yin yang rnam par rig byed bzhin du gzhan dag la rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin pas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o/_/_
[\[31b.6\]]brjod ces bya ba ni slob dpon gyi tshig yin par ston pa'o/_/mdor na rnam par rig byed dang ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i gzugs dge ba dang mi dge ba ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o/_/'byung ba che rnams rgyur byas pa/_/zhes smras pa de dag gang zhe na/_'byung ba dag ni sa'i khams
[\[31b.7\]]dang /_chu dang me dang rlung gi [#]khams rnams zhes bya ba ste/_bzhi po de dag ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang rgyur byas pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i phyir khams dag go/_/'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams zhes bya ba ni 'di dag gzugs gzhan thams cad kyi rten nyid du rigs pa'i phyir na chen po nyid do/_/_
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]yang na sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi phung po de dag bya ba la shas [#]che ba de dag la de rnams chen por gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/yang khams de dag gi las ni [#]gang du yang dag par 'grub/_rang bzhin ni ci zhe na/_'dzin pa la sogs las su grub/_/ces bya ba smos te/_
[\[32a.2\]]sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams 'di dag ni go rims bzhin du [#]'dzin pa dang sdud pa dang smin par byed pa dang rgyas par byed pa'i las dag tu grub bo/_/rgyas par byed pa ni 'phel ba dang rgyas par byed par rig par bya ste/_'di dag ni de dag gi las yin no/_/rang bzhin ni
[\[32a.3\]]go rims bzhin du/_sra gsher dro nyid g.yo ba rnams te/_sra ba ni sa'i khams so/_/gsher ba ni chu'i khams so/_/dro ba ni me'i khams so/_/g.yo ba ni rlung gi khams so/_/'dis 'byung ba'i rgyun yul gzhan du skyed [#]pa'i phyir g.yo bar byed de/_sgron me [#]g.yo ba bzhin
[\[32a.4\]]du g.yo bar byed pa yin no/_/rab tu byed pa dag dang mdo sde las rlung gi khams gang zhe na/_yang ba nyid do zhes gsungs la/_rab tu byed pa dag las/_yang ba nyid de rgyur byas pa'i gzugs zhes kyang bshad do/_/de'i phyir g.yo ba'i rang bzhin gyi chos gang yin pa de ni rlung
[\[32a.5\]]gi khams shes pa ste/_'di'i rang bzhin las kyis [#]gsal ba yin no/_/sa la sogs pa dang /_sa'i khams la sogs pa la bye brag ci yod ce na/_'jig rten gyi ni tha snyad do/_/[#]kha dog dbyibs la sa zhes brjod/_/'di ltar sa ston pa na kha dog dang dbyibs ston par
[\[32a.6\]]byed do/_/sa la ji lta ba de bzhin du/_chu me yang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi tha snyad du kha dog dang dbyibs nyid la brjod do/_/rlung tshogs khams nyid yin/_rlung gi khams gang yin pa de nyid la 'jig rten na rlung zhes 'dogs so/_/de dang 'dra ba'ang yin/_ji ltar 'jig rten gyi tha snyad
[\[32a.7\]]du kha dog dang dbyibs la sa zhes brjod pa de bzhin du rlung la yang rlung sngon po rlung zlum po'o zhes brjod do/_/ci'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i bar 'di gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya zhe na/_gzugs su rung ba'i phyir te[ #]/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gzugs su yod cing
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]gzugs su rung bas/_de'i phyir gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o/_/cis [#]gzugs su rung zhe na/_lag pa'i 'dus te reg pas na [#]reg na yang gzugs su rung ngo zhes rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/gzugs su rung zhes bya ba ni gnod par byar rung zhes bya ba'i
[\[32b.2\]]tha tshig ste 'di ltar don gyi sde tshan dag las/_gal te 'dod pa tshol byed cing /_/'dun pa skyes pa'i lus can te/_'dod pa de dag ma 'byor na/_/zug rngus zug bzhin gnod par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/gzugs kyi gnod pa gang zhe na/_yongs su 'gyur ba skyed
[\[32b.3\]]pa'o/_/gzhan dag na re gzugs su rung ba ni thogs pa'o zhes zer ro/_/'o na ni rdul phra rab gzugs ma yin par 'gyur te/_gzugs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rdul phra rab kyi gzugs gcig pu logs shig tu gyur pa ni med pa nyid do/_/'dus pa la gnas pa de la ni gzugs su
[\[32b.4\]]rung ba nyid do/_/'o na ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa gzugs ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/de yang gzugs su yod zin pa dang /_gzugs su yod par 'gyur ba dang /_de dang rigs mthun pa'i phyir gzugs yin te bud shing bzhin no/_/'o na ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa
[\[32b.5\]]gzugs ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/de yang rnam par rig byed la gzugs su yod pa'i phyir gzugs su yod par 'gyur te/_shing ljon pa g.yos pas grib ma g.yo ba bzhin no/_/'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ma yin te/_rnam par rig byed log na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yang
[\[32b.6\]]ldog par 'gyur te/_shing ljon pa med na grib ma med pa bzhin no/_/gzhan dag na re rten gyi 'byung ba la gzugs su yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro/_/de lta na 'o na ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa yang rten gzugs su yod pa'i phyir gzugs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro/_/nye
[\[32b.7\]]bar bkod pa 'di ni mi mthun pa yin te/_rnam par rig byed ma yin pa 'di ni shing ljon pa la grib ma nyid dang /_nor bu la 'od nyid bzhin du 'byung ba rnams la brten nas 'jug go/_/[#]mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa ni de ltar mig la sogs pa la brten nas 'jug
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]pa ma yin te/_de dag ni de dag gi skye ba'i rgyu mtshan tsam yin pa [#]'ba' zhig tsam du zad pas so/_/shing ljon pa la brten nas grib ma dang /_mar me la brten nas 'od 'jug go zhes bya ba 'di ni re zhig bye brag tu smra ba ma yin te/_grib ma la sogs pa kha dog gi rdul
[\[33a.2\]]phra rab rnams so so rang gi 'byung ba bzhi tshan la brten pa nyid du khas len pa'i phyir ro/_/grib ma dang 'od de dag la brten pa nyid yin yang rnam par rig byed [#]ma yin pa'i rten 'byung ba chen po dag 'gags kyang [#]'gag par khas len pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni de ltar
[\[33a.3\]]brten par mi rung ngo /_/de'i phyir de ni lan du mi rung ngo /_/gzhan dag ni 'di la mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i rten ni tha dad du gyur pa ste/_kha cig ni gzugs su rung ba ste mig la sogs pa'o/_/la la ni gzugs su mi rung ba ste yid do/_/rnam par rig byed ma
[\[33a.4\]]yin pa ni de lta ma yin te/_de lta bas na 'dra bar thal ba med do/_/de'i phyir [#]gzugs su yod pas na gzugs so zhes bya ba 'di ni 'thad pa yin no zhes lan 'debs so/_/gzugs kyi phung po'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa gang dag yin pa/_dbang don de dag kho na la/_/skye
[\[33a.5\]]mched dang ni khams bcur 'dod/_/skye mched rnam par gzhag pa [#]ni skye mched bcu ste/_mig gi skye mched dang gzugs kyi skye mched nas/_lus kyi skye mched dang reg bya'i skye mched kyi bar yin no/_/khams rnam par gzhag pa ni de dag nyid khams bcu ste/_mig gi
[\[33a.6\]]khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams nas/_lus kyi khams dang reg bya'i khams kyi bar yin no/_/gzugs kyi phung po dang /_de'i skye mched dang /_khams rnam par gzhag pa bshad zin to/_/tshor ba la logs [#]pa brjod par bya ste/_de la tshor ba myong ba/_myong ba
[\[33a.7\]]rnam pa gsum ni tshor ba'i phung po ste/_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'o/_/de yang dbye na tshor ba'i tshogs drug ste/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]bar ro/_/'du shes ni/_mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid do/_/gang sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_ring po dang /_thung ngu dang /_pho dang /_mo dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_mdza' bshes ma yin pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba [#]la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par la mtshan
[\[33b.2\]]mar 'dzin pa de ni 'du shes kyi phung po'o/_/de yang dbye na 'du shes kyi tshogs drug ste/_tshor ba bzhin no/_/'du byed phung po bzhi las gzhan[#]/_/gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_rnam par shes pa dang phung po bzhi las gzhan pa'i 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed kyi phung
[\[33b.3\]]po'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo las/_sems pa [#]tshogs drug go zhes gsungs pa ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni las kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir mngon par 'du bya ba la gtso bo yin no/_/de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis/_'dus byas mngon par 'du
[\[33b.4\]]byed de/_de lta bas na 'du byed nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes [#]gsungs so/_/de lta ma yin na sems las byung ba lhag ma rnams dang ldan pa ma yin pa rnams phung por [#]'dus pa'i phyir sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba'i bden pa nyid du mi 'gyur bas yongs su shes pa dang spang bar
[\[33b.5\]]yang [#]mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/_chos gcig mngon par ma shes shing yongs su ma shes par yang sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par nga mi smra'o zhes gsungs la/_de bzhin du ma spangs par yang zhes gsungs te/_de lta bas na [#]gdon mi za bar de dag 'du byed
[\[33b.6\]]kyi phung por bsdus par khas blang bar bya'o/_/de gsum/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed kyi phung po dag ste/_skye mched dang /_khams rnam par gzhag pa ni/_rnam rig byed min dang /_'dus ma byas rnams bcas pa ni/_/chos kyi skye mched khams zhes
[\[33b.7\]]bya/_/de ltar na rdzas bdun po de dag ni chos kyi skye mched dang /_chos kyi khams zhes bya'o/_/rnam shes so sor rnam rig pa/_/yul dang yul la so sor rnam par rig cing dmigs pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya'o/_/de yang rnam par shes pa'i
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]tshogs drug ste/_mig gi rnam par shes pa nas/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar ro/_/rnam par shes pa'i phung po bstan pa gang yin pa [#]de skye mched rnam par gzhag pa [#]ni/_yid kyi skye mched kyang de yin/_khams rnam par gzhag pa
[\[34a.2\]]yang de dag nyid/_khams bdun dag tu'ang 'dod pa ste/_bdun gang zhe na/_rnam par shes pa drug dang yid/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams kyi bar ro/_/de ltar na 'dir phung po lnga dang /_skye mched bcu
[\[34a.3\]]gnyis dang /_khams bco brgyad du bstan par 'gyur te/_rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs pa gzugs kyi phung po'i skye mched bcu dang /_khams bcu dag go/_/tshor ba la sogs pa phung po gsum dang /_rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang /_'dus ma byas dag ni chos
[\[34a.4\]]kyi [#]skye mched dang /_chos kyi khams so/_/rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni yid kyi skye mched dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams drug dang /_yid kyi khams so/_/rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ni rnam par shes pa'i phung por bshad pa ma yin nam/_yang de dag las
[\[34a.5\]]gzhan pa yid kyi khams de gang zhe na/_gzhan ni gang yang med do/_/'o na ci zhe na/_drug po de dag_/nyid las 'das ma thag pa yi/_/rnam shes gang yin de yod [#]do/_/rnam par shes pa gang dang gang 'gags ma thag pa de nyid ni yid kyi khams zhes bya ste/_dper
[\[34a.6\]]na bu de nyid gzhan gyi phar 'gyur ba dang /_'bras bu de nyid gzhan gyi sa bon yin pa lta bu'o/_/de lta [#]na 'o na ni rnam par shes pa'i khams drug dang yid kyi khams rnams gcig gi nang du gcig 'dus pa'i phyir rdzas su na khams bcu bdun nam bcu gnyis su 'gyur na ci'i
[\[34a.7\]]phyir khams bco brgyad du rnam par gzhag ce na/_de lta'ang yin mod kyi/_'on kyang /_drug pa'i rten ni rab bsgrub [#]phyir/_/khams ni bco brgyad dag tu 'dod/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga po dag gi rten lnga ni mig gi khams la sogs pa yin na drug po [#]yid kyi rnam
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]par shes pa'i khams kyi rten ni gzhan med de[#]/_de'i phyir de'i rten rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir yid kyi khams bstan to/_/de ltar na rten dang brten pa dang dmigs pa drug tshan rnam par gzhag pas khams bco brgyad dag tu 'gyur ro/_/'o na ni dgra bcom pa'i sems tha ma yid
[\[34b.2\]]ma yin par 'gyur te/_de gang gis mtshungs pa de ma thag pa 'das par 'gyur ba de ni med do zhe na/_de yang yid kyi ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir na ma yin te/_rgyu gzhan ma tshang ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa phyi ma mi skye bar zad do/_/de la phung po dag gis ni 'dus byas thams cad bsdus
[\[34b.3\]]so/_/nye bar len pa'i phung po de [#]dag gis ni zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad bsdus so/_/skye mched dang khams dag gis ni chos thams cad bsdus so/_/mdor bsdu na phung po dang ni skye mched dang /_khams gcig gis ni thams cad bsdus par shes par bya ste/_gzugs
[\[34b.4\]]kyi phung po dang yid kyi skye mched dang chos kyi khams kyis chos rnams [#]thams cad bsdus par rig par bya'o/_/bsdu ba de ni gang dang gang nas 'byung yang rung /_rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis te/_gzhan gyi dngos pos ni ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhan gyi dngos
[\[34b.5\]]dang mi ldan phyir/_/chos ni gzhan gyi dngos po dang mi ldan no/_/de lta bas na gang dang mi ldan pa de nyid kyis bsdus par ni mi rung ste/_dper na mig gi dbang po ni gzugs kyi phung po dang /_mig gi skye mched dang /_khams dag dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba'i bden
[\[34b.6\]]pa dag gis bsdus te/_de dag gi [#]ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de dag gi [#]ngo bo dang mi ldan pa'i phyir phung po la sogs pa gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no/_/dper na bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis 'khor rnams bsdus pa lta bu gzhan gyis [#]gzhan bsdus so zhes bya ba gang
[\[34b.7\]]yin pa de ni res 'ga' ba yin pa'i phyir brdar btags pa yin par bya'o/_/mig dang rna ba dang sna dag gnyis gnyis yod pa'i phyir khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar/_mig la sogs pa gnyis mod kyi/_/rigs dang spyod yul
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]rnam par shes/_/'dra ba'i phyir na khams gcig nyid/_/de la rigs 'dra ba ni gnyi ga mig gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro/_/spyod yul 'dra ba ni gnyi ga'i yul [#]gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rnam par shes pa 'dra ba ni gnyi ga mig gi rnam par shes pa gcig gi
[\[35a.2\]]rten yin pa'i phyir te/_de lta bas na mig gi khams ni gcig pa nyid do/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/mdzes bya'i phyir na gnyis 'byung ngo /_/mig la sogs pa khams gcig pa nyid yin yang rten mdzes par bya ba'i phyir gnyis 'byung ngo /_/_
[\[35a.3\]]de lta ma yin te/_mig dang rna ba'i rten gcig dang /_/sna'i bu ga gcig tu gyur na shin tu mi mdzes par 'gyur ro/_/phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag bshad zin to/_/phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi don gang yin pa 'dir brjod par bya ste/_spungs dang skye dgu [# ]
[\[35a.4\]]rigs kyi don/_/phung po skye mched khams rnams yin/_/mdo las/_gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung 'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am/_da ltar byung ba'am/_nang gi'am/_phyi'i'am/_rags pa'am/_phra ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_gya nom pa'am/_thag ring ba na yod
[\[35a.5\]]pa gang yin pa 'am/_nye ba na yod pa gang yin pa [#]de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir spungs pa'i don ni phung po'i don to zhes bya bar grub bo/_/de la bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gzugs 'das pa ni mi rtag pa
[\[35a.6\]]nyid kyis 'gags pa'o/_/ma 'ongs pa ni ma byung ba'o/_/da ltar byung ba ni byung ba [#]la ma 'gags pa'o/_/nang gi ni rang gi rgyud la yod pa'o/_/gzhan ni phyi'i'o/_/yang skye mched kyi sgo nas so/_/rags pa ni thogs pa dang bcas pa'o/_/phra ba ni thogs pa med pa'o/_/_
[\[35a.7\]]yang na ltos pa pa yin no/_/gal te ltos pa pa yin pa'i phyir ma grub bo zhe na/_ma yin te/_ltos [#]pas tha dad pa'i phyir ro/_/gang la ltos te rags pa yin pa ni nam du yang de la ltos nas phra ba ma yin te/_pha dang bu bzhin no/_/ngan pa ni nyon mongs pa can no/_/gya nom pa ni
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o/_/ring ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'o/_/nye ba ni da ltar byung ba ste/_rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang de dang 'dra'o/_/'di ni khyad par yin te/_rags pa ni dbang po lnga la brtan pa'o/_/phra ba ni yid las byung ba'o/_/yang na sa las rig
[\[35b.2\]]par bya'o zhes so/_/btsun pa na re ni gzugs rags pa ni dbang po lngas gzung bar bya ba'o/_/gzhan ni phra ba'o/_/ngan pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba'o/_/gya nom pa ni yid du 'ong ba'o/_/ring ba ni yul mi snang ba can no/_/nye ba ni yul snang ba can no/_/'das pa la sogs pa ni
[\[35b.3\]]rang gi ming gis bstan pa'i phyir te/_tshor ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/de dag gis ring ba dang nye ba nyid ni de [#]rten gyi dbang gis so/_/rags pa dang phra ba nyid ni snga ma bzhin no zhes zer ro/_/sems dang sems las [#]byung ba rnams skye ba'i sgo'i don ni skye mched kyi
[\[35b.4\]]don te/_nges pa'i tshig tu na sems dang sems las byung ba rnams skye ba mched par byed pas skye mched rnams te/_rgyas par byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/rigs kyi don ni khams kyi don te/_dper na ri [#]'ga' zhig la lcags dang zangs dang dngul dang gser la sogs pa
[\[35b.5\]]rigs mang po dag yod pa la khams zhes brjod pa de bzhin du rten dang rgyud gcig la rigs bco brgyad dag yod pa la khams bco brgyad ces bya'o/_/de la 'byung gnas dag ni rigs zhes bya ba ni [#]mig la sogs pa 'di dag gang gi 'byung gnas yin zhe na/_rang gi rigs kyi yin te/_
[\[35b.6\]]skal ba [#]mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'dus ma byas khams ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na/_'o na ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams [#]yin no/_/gzhan dag na re chos bco brgyad po dag [#]rigs kyi rang bzhin no zhe na[#]/_khams bco brgyad ces bya bas khams zhes bya
[\[35b.7\]]ba'i sgra 'di ni rigs kyi tshig yin [#]zhes zer ro/_/gal te spungs pa'i don phung po'i don yin na [#]phung po rnams btags [#]pa'i yod par 'gyur te/_rdzas su [#]ma 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir spungs pa dang gang zag bzhin no zhe na/_ma yin te/_rdzas kyi rdul phra rab gcig pu yang
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]phung po yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de lta na gcig pu la spungs pa nyid med pas spungs pa'i don ni phung po'i don to zhes brjod par mi bya'o/_/gzhan dag na re/_bya ba'i khur khyer ba'i don nam/_yongs su chad pa'i don ni phung po'i don te/_'di ltar smra ba po dbul
[\[36a.2\]]bar bya ba'i phung po gsum dag tu dbul bar bya'o zhes smra ba bzhin no zhes zer te/_de ni mdo dang 'gal lo/_/mdo las ni spungs pa'i don kho nar gsungs te/_gzugs gang ci yang rung ba 'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am zhes rgyas par gsungs so/_/der ni gzugs
[\[36a.3\]]'das pa la sogs pa [#]so sor phung po nyid yin par shes te/_gzugs 'das pa la sogs pa 'di thams cad re re zhing gzugs kyi phung po yin no zhe na/_de ltar ni shes par mi nus te/_de thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de lta bas na gzugs
[\[36a.4\]]kyi phung po dag ni spungs pa bzhin du btags pa'i yod pa yin no/_/de lta na skye mched gzugs can rnams kyang btags pa'i yod par 'gyur te/_mig la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab mang po ni skye ba'i sgor gyur pa'i phyir ro zhe na/_ma yin te tshogs pa rnams re re nas rgyu'i ngo
[\[36a.5\]]bor gyur pa'i phyir ram/_yul lhan cig byed pa yin pa'i phyir dbang po las [#]logs shig tu skye mched du yang mi 'gyur ro/_/bye brag tu bshad pa chen po [#]las ni/_gal te chos mngon pa pa zhig phung po btags pa'i yod par lta na ni de rdul phra rab khams gcig dang /_skye mched
[\[36a.6\]]gcig dang /_phung po gcig gi phyogs yin no zhes smra'o/_/'on te mi lta na ni de [#]rdul phra rab khams gcig dang /_skye mched gcig dang /_phung po gcig yin no zhes smra'o zhes 'byung ngo /_/phyogs yin yang phyogs can yin [#]bzhin du nye bar 'dogs pa yang yod de/_dper
[\[36a.7\]]na ras yug gi phyogs gcig tshig pa la ras yug tshig gi [#]zhes bya ba bzhin no/_/yang ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]phung po la sogs pa'i sgo nas ston pa rnam pa gsum rtsom par mdzad ce na/_smras pa/_gdul ba rnams kyi/_rmongs dbang 'dod rnams gsum gyi phyir/_/_
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]phung po la sogs gsum bstan to/_/rnam pa gsum ni rnam gsum mo/_/sems can rnams kyi rmongs pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_kha cig ni sems las byung ba rnams la ril po'i bdag nyid du 'dzin pas rmongs so/_/kha cig ni gzugs kho na la'o/_/[#]kha cig ni gzugs dang
[\[36b.2\]]sems dag la'o/_/dbang po dag kyang rnam pa gsum ste/_dbang po rnon po dang /_'bring dang /_rtul po'i phyir ro/_/'dod pa yang rnam pa gsum ste/_tshig bsdus pa dang /_bar ma dang /_rgya chen po 'dod pa'i phyir te/_de dag la go rims bzhin du phung po dang /_skye mched dang /_khams
[\[36b.3\]]dang gsum bstan to [#]zhes grag go/_/yang ci'i phyir sems las byung ba gzhan rnams ni 'du byed kyi phung po gcig tu bsdus la 'du shes dang tshor ba dag ni logs shig tu phung por byas she na/_smras pa/_rtsod pa'i rtsa bar gyur pa dang /_/'khor ba'i rgyu phyir rim rgyu'i phyir/_/sems byung
[\[36b.4\]]rnams las tshor ba dang /_/'du shes logs shig phung por bzhag_/rtsod pa'i rtsa ba dag ni gnyis te/_'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa dang /_lta ba la lhag par zhen pa'o/_/de gnyis kyi rgyu'i gtso bo ni go rims bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dag ste/_tshor ba ro myang ba'i dbang
[\[36b.5\]]gis ni 'dod pa rnams las mngon par zhen la/_'du shes phyin ci log gis ni lta ba rnams la'o/_/de dag ni 'khor ba'i rgyu'i gtso bo yang yin te/_tshor ba la zhen cing 'du shes phyin ci log tu gyur pa ni 'khor ro/_/gang yang phung po'i go rims kyi rgyu [#]ston par 'gyur ba'i go rims
[\[36b.6\]]kyi rgyu de'i phyir yang 'di gnyis logs shig tu phung por byas par rig par bya ste/_de ni de nyid du bshad par bya'o/_/'o na ci'i phyir skye mched dang khams dag tu ni 'dus ma byas bshad la/_phung po dag tu ni ma yin zhe na/_phung po dag tu 'dus ma byas/_/don du mi rung phyir ma bshad/_/_
[\[36b.7\]]de ni phung po dag gi nang du brjod na de ni gzugs ma yin zhing rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang ma yin pas don du mi rung ba'i phyir re zhig de dag nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar ni mi nus so/_/phung po drug par brjod par yang mi nus so/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_don du mi rung ba'i phyir te/_spungs pa'i
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]don du ni phung po'i don to zhes bshad na/_'dus ma byas na [#]gzugs bzhin du 'di ltar de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas 'dus ma byas kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'das pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis [#]tha dad pa ma yin no/_/yang kun
[\[37a.2\]]nas nyon mongs pa'i gzhi shes par bya ba'i phyir nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya la/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i gzhi shes par bya ba'i phyir phung po zhes kyang bya na/_'dus ma byas ni don du mi rung ba'i phyir gnyi ga yang ma yin te/_de dag tu rnam par [#]gzhag go/_/kha
[\[37a.3\]]cig na re ji ltar bum pa chag pa bum pa ma yin pa de bzhin du phung po zhig pa yang phung po yin par mi 'os so zhes zer te/_de dag gi ltar na khams dang skye mched dag la yang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro/_/phung po rnams kyi rnam pa gzhan bshad zin to/_/rim ni rags dang kun nyon mongs/_/_
[\[37a.4\]]snod sogs [#]don khams ji bzhin no/_/gzugs ni thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir thams cad pas rags so/_/gzugs can ma yin pa rnams kyi nang na yang tshor ba ni rgyu ba rags pa'i phyir te/_'di ltar nga'i lag pa la tshor ro/_/nga'i rkang pa la tshor ro zhes tha snyad 'dogs so/_/_
[\[37a.5\]]'du shes ni gnyis pas ches rags so/_/rnam par shes pa bas ni 'du byed de/_de'i phyir gang ches rags pa de sngar bshad do/_/yang na thog ma med pa can gyi 'khor ba na pho dang mo dag phan tshun gzugs la mngon par dga' ste/_de dag kyang tshor ba'i ro myang ba la chags pa'i phyir
[\[37a.6\]]ro/_/de la chags pa yang 'du shes phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/phyin ci log de yang kun nas nyon mongs pa dag gis so/_/sems kyang de dag gis kun nas nyon mongs pa can du byas pas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i go rims ji lta ba bzhin no/_/yang na [#]snod la sogs
[\[37a.7\]]pa'i don gyis te/_gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po ni snod dang zas dang tshod ma dang byan po dang za ba po lta bu'o/_/yang na khams kyis te 'dod pa'i yon tan gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ni 'dod pa'i khams so/_/tshor bas rab tu phye ba ni bsam gtan rnams so/_/'du shes kyis
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]rab tu phye ba ni gzugs med pa gsum mo/_/'du byed tsam gyis rab tu phye ba ni srid pa'i rtse mo ste/_'di dag ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa yin la/_de dag la rnam par shes pa gnas so zhes phung po'i go rims zhing dang sa bon gyi go rims lta bur bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/de
[\[37b.2\]]nyid kyi phyir phung po rnams ni lnga ste mi nyung mi mang ngo /_/gang gi phyir 'di dag ni ches rags pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i go rims kyi rgyu dang zas dang tshod ma lta bu dang /_de dag gi [#]khams gnyis rab tu phye ba'i go rims kyi rgyu de nyid kyi phyir [#]tshor ba dang 'du shes dag ni
[\[37b.3\]]'du byed rnams las logs shig tu phung por byas so/_/mig la sogs pa'i khams dang skye mched drug gi go rims brjod par bya ste/_de'i dbang nyid kyis [#]na de'i yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams kyi go rims su 'gyur ro/_/drug po de dag las/_da lta'i don phyir dang por
[\[37b.4\]]lnga/_/mig la sogs pa lnga'i yul ni da ltar yin pa'i phyir sngar smos so/_/yid kyi yul ma nges pa can yin te/_kha cig gi yul ni da ltar yin pa nas/_kha cig gi yul ni dus gsum dang dus ma yin pa'i bar yin no/_/'byung ba las gyur don phyir bzhi/_/dang por zhes bya
[\[37b.5\]]bar snyegs so/_/lnga rnams las kyang bzhir [#]sngar smos pa ni yul 'byung ba las gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/lus kyi yul ni ma nges te/_res 'ga' ni 'byung ba dag yin la/_res 'ga' ni 'byung ba las gyur pa dag yin no/_/res 'ga' ni gnyi ga yin no/_/gzhan
[\[37b.6\]]ni ches ring myur 'jug phyir/_/lhag ma ni ci rigs par ches rgyang ring ba dang myur bar 'jug pas gzhan pas sngar smos te/_mig dang rna ba'i yul rgyang ring ba'i phyir gnyis pas de dag sngar smos so/_/de gnyis las kyang mig ni ches rgyang ring po la 'jug ste/_chu klung
[\[37b.7\]#]rgyang ring po nas mthong yang de'i sgra mi thos pas de'i phyir de sngar smos so/_/sna dang lce ni rgyang ring po la 'jug pa med mod kyi/_de gnyis las kyang sna ni ches myur bar 'jug pa'i phyir sngar smos te/_zas lce dang ma phrad pa nyid kyi dri 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/_/yang na ji ltar gnas bzhin
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]rim/_/yang na lus 'di la mig gi rten ni dang po na gnas so/_/de'i 'og na ni rna ba'i 'o/_/de'i 'og na ni sna'i 'o/_/[#]de'i 'og na ni lce'i 'o/_/lus kyi ni phal cher de'i 'og na'o/_/yid ni de dag la brten pa [#]dang yul na mi gnas pa'i phyir te/_de dag gi go rims
[\[38a.2\]]ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin yin no/_/yang ci'i phyir gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus pa'i skye mched bcu po dag las gcig gzugs kyi skye mched du brjod la/_thams cad kyang chos kyi rang bzhin yin na gcig chos kyi skye mched ces bya zhe na/_smras pa/_bye brag don dang gtso
[\[38a.3\]]bo'i phyir/_/chos mang ba dang mchog bsdus phyir/_/gcig ni gzugs kyi skye mched dang /_/gcig ni chos zhes bya bar brjod/_/bye brag gi don ci [#]lta bu zhe na/_ci nas kyang yul dang yul can nyid du rnam par gzhag pa'i sgo nas bcu po 'di dag gi [#]so sor skye mched
[\[38a.4\]]nyid yin gyi spyir ni ma yin no zhes rtogs par bya ba yin la/_mig la sogs pa bye brag tu byas pa dag gis ni gang mig la sogs par ni ming ma btags la gzugs ni yin pa de gzugs kyi skye mched du shes par 'gyur bas 'di'i ming gzhan ma brjod do/_/yang na
[\[38a.5\]]gzugs kyi skye mched ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni thogs pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir lag pa la sogs pa'i 'dus te reg pa dag gis reg na gzugs su rung ba dang /_bstan du rung ba'i phyir te/_'di ni 'di na'o/_/che ge mo zhig na'o zhes brtag tu rung ba'i phyir ro/_/_
[\[38a.6\]]'jig rten na yang de gzugs so zhes grags kyi gzhan dag la ni ma yin no/_/bye brag gi don nyid kyis gcig ni chos kyi skye mched du bshad kyi [#]thams cad ni ma yin no/_/gzhan yang 'dir tshor ba la sogs pa chos mang po rnams bsdus te/_de'i phyir chos kyi sgrar spyir rjod
[\[38a.7\]#]par byed do/_/chos kyi mchog mya ngan las 'das pa de yang der [#]bsdus te gzhan dag tu [#]ni ma yin no/_/gzhan dag na re rnam pa nyi shu'i rig [#]pa'i phyir dang /_sha'i dang lha'i [#]dang 'phags pa'i shes rab dang mig gsum gyi spyod yul yin pa'i phyir gcig gzugs kyi skye
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]mched du bstan to zhes zer ro/_/mdo dag las phung po dang skye mched dang khams zhes bya ba gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang dmigs na/_ci de rnams 'di dag nyid kyis bsdus sam/_'on te tha dad pa zhig yin par rig par bya zhe na/_'di dag nyid kyis bsdus kyi tha dad pa ni med
[\[38b.2\]]de de la re zhig_/chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dag_/gang rnams thub pas gsungs de dag_/tshig gam ming yin de dag ni/_/gzugs dang 'du byed dag tu 'dus/_/gang dag gi ltar na sangs rgyas kyi gsung tshig gi rang bzhin yin pa de dag gi ltar na de dag ni gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus so/_/_
[\[38b.3\]]gang dag gi ltar na ming gi rang bzhin yin pa de dag gi ltar na ni 'du byed kyi phung pos bsdus so/_/yang chos kyi phung po'i tshad ji tsam zhe na/_kha cig bstan bcos tshad ces zer/_/kha cig na re de ni chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba bstan bcos mngon pa'i tshad tsam mo zhes zer te/_de
[\[38b.4\]]ni sh+lo ka drug stong ngo /_/yang gzhan dag na re/_phung po la sogs gtam re yin/_/zhes zer te/_phung po dang /_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_bden pa dang /_zas dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_rnam
[\[38b.5\]]par thar pa dang /_zil gyis gnon [#]pa'i skye mched dang /_zad par gyi skye mched dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_smon nas shes pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa la sogs pa'i gtam rgyud re re ni chos kyi
[\[38b.6\]]phung po'o [#]zhes zer ro/_/spyod pa rnams kyi gnyen por ni/_/chos kyi phung po mthun par gsungs/_/'di skad du/_sems can rnams kyi spyod pa 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang nga rgyal la sogs pa spyod pa tha dad pa brgyad khri yod de/_de dag gi gnyen por
[\[38b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri gsungs so zhes brjod do/_/ji ltar chos kyi phung po brgyad khri [#]'di phung po lnga po [#]'di dag nyid du bsdus pa/_de bzhin gzhan yang ci rigs par/_/phung po skye mched khams rnams ni/_/rang gi mtshan nyid legs dpyad de/_/_
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]ji skad bshad par bsdu bar bya/_/mdo gzhan dag las phung po dang skye mched dang khams gzhan gang dag gsungs pa de dag kyang bstan bcos 'di las/_ji skad bshad pa bzhin de dag gi rang rang gi mtshan nyid legs par dpyad nas phung po la sogs pa ji skad
[\[39a.2\]]bshad pa 'di dag nyid du bsdu bar bya ste/_de la re zhig tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dag las tshul khrims kyi phung po ni gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus so/_/lhag ma rnams ni 'du
[\[39a.3\]]byed kyi [#]phung pos bsdus so/_/zad par gyi skye mched bcu po dag las brgyad ni ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir chos kyi skye mched kyis [#]bsdus so/_/'khor rnams dang bcas na ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis bsdus te/_
[\[39a.4\]]zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams kyang [#]de dang 'dra'o/_/zad par nam mkha' dang rnam shes [#]mtha' yas skye mched dag dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi po dag ni phung po bzhi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis
[\[39a.5\]]bsdus so/_/rnam par grol ba'i skye mched lnga po dag ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir chos kyi skye mched kyis bsdus so/_/'khor rnams dang bcas na ni sgra dang yid dang chos kyi skye mched rnams kyis bsdus so/_/skye mched gnyis las 'du shes med pa'i sems
[\[39a.6\]]can ni dri dang ro'i skye mched bcu bzhi [#]po rnams kyis bsdus so/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi [#]skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba ni yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis bsdus so/_/de bzhin du khams mang po la las khams drug cu rtsa gnyis bstan pa de dag kyang ci rigs par
[\[39a.7\]]bsdu bar rig par bya'o/_/der gang dag sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams drug bstan pa la/_de dag las gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ma bshad na/_de ci nam mkha' nyid
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]nam mkha'i khams yin la/_rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams yin par rig par bya 'am zhe na/_smras pa ma yin no/_/'o na ci zhe na/_sgo dang skar khung dang kha dang sna la sogs pa'i bu ga nam mkha'i khams zhes bya/_bu ga zhes bya ba ci zhig yin par
[\[39b.2\]]rig par bya/_snang dang mun pa dag yin lo/_/bu ga ni snang ba dang mun pa dag las gzhan du gzung du med do/_/de lta bas na nam mkha'i khams ni snang ba dang mun pa'i rang bzhin te/_mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i rang bzhin du yin par [#]rig par bya'o zhes grag go/_/de nyid thogs pa'i
[\[39b.3\]]nye ba'i 'khor gyi gzugs zhes bya ste/_thogs pa zhes bya ba ni shin tu gnod par byar [#]rung ba'i phyir bsags par gnas pa'i gzugs te/_de ni de'i 'khor ro lo/_/gzhan dag na re de la gzhan mi thogs pa'i phyir te/_de ni thogs med kyang yin la gzugs gzhan gyi nye 'khor yang yin
[\[39b.4\]]pas thogs med nye 'khor yin no zhes zer ro/_/zag pa [#]dang bcas pa'i [#]rnam shes ni/_rnam shes khams yin/_ci'i phyir zag pa med pa la mi bya zhe na/_'di ltar khams drug po 'di dag ni/_skye ba'i rten yin par 'dod de/_de dag nying mtshams sbyor ba'i sems nas [#]'chi ba'i
[\[39b.5\]]sems kyi bar du skye ba'i gzhir gyur pa ste/_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams ni de lta ma yin no/_/de'i phyir de ltar na de dag las khams bzhi ni reg bya'i khams kyi nang du 'dus so/_/lnga pa ni gzugs kyi khams kyi nang du 'dus so/_/drug pa ni rnam par shes pa'i khams bdun po dag
[\[39b.6\]]tu 'dus so/_/gang dag khams bco brgyad bstan [#]pa de dag las bstan du yod pa rnams ni du/_bstan du med pa rnams ni du zhe na/_bstan yod 'dir ni gzugs gcig tu[#]/_/de ni 'di ni 'di na'o/_/che ge mo zhig na'o [#]zhes bstan par nus so/_/lhag ma rnams ni bstan du med
[\[39b.7\]]pa'o zhes bshad par 'gyur ro/_/thogs pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du/_thogs pa med pa rnams ni du zhe na/_thogs dang bcas pa gzugs can bcu/_/gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus pa'i khams bcu gang dag bshad pa de dag ni thogs pa dang bcas pa [#]yin te/_thogs pa
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]zhes bya ba ni rdugs pa'o/_/de yang rnam pa gsum ste/_sgrib pa dang yul dang dmigs pa la thogs pa'o/_/de la sgrib pa la thogs pa ni rang gi yul du gzhan skye ba'i gegs byed pa ste/_dper na lag pa 'am/_rdo ba la lag pa rdugs shig [#]thogs pa'am/_
[\[40a.2\]]rdo ba yang de gnyis la thogs pa lta bu'o/_/yul la thogs pa ni mig la sogs pa yul can rnams gzugs la sogs pa yul rnams la thogs pa ste/_btags pa las ji skad du/_chu la thogs pa la skam la ma yin pa'i mig kyang yod de/_dper na nya rnams kyi lta bu'o/_/_
[\[40a.3\]]skam thogs la chu la ma yin pa yang yod de/_mi phal che ba'i [#]lta bu'o/_/gnyi gar thogs pa yang yod de/_chu srin byis pa gsod pa dang [#]/sbal ba dang /_sha za ba dang [#]/_nya pa [#]la sogs pa rnams kyi lta bu'o/_/gnyi gar ma yin pa yang yod de/_rnam pa de dag ma
[\[40a.4\]]gtogs pa'o/_/mig gang mtshan mo thogs la nyin par ma yin pa yod de/_pha wang dang /_'ug pa la sogs pa [#]rnams kyi lta bu'o/_/nyin par thogs la mtshan mo ma yin pa ni mi phal che'i lta bu'o/_/mtshan mo dang nyin par thogs pa ni khyi dang /_wa dang /_rta dang /_gung dang /_byi la
[\[40a.5\]]la sogs pa rnams kyi lta bu'o//gnyi gar yang ma yin pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste/'di ni yul la thogs pa'o//dmigs pa la [#]thogs pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams rang gi dmigs pa dag la thogs pa'o//yul dang dmigs
[\[40a.6\]]pa dag la bye brag ci yod ce na/_gang la gang zhig byed pa de ni yul yin la/_gang zhig sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyis 'dzin pa de ni dmigs pa yin no/_/yang ji ltar na rang gi yul la [#]dmigs pa la 'jug pa la thogs pa zhes bya zhe na/_de las gzhan du mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro/_/yang na 'di la gtod pa
[\[40a.7\]]ni thogs pa yin te/_rang gi yul la 'jug pa gang yin pa'o/_/de lta bas na 'dir bcu po dag ni sgrib pa la thogs pas thogs pa dang bcas pa nyid du rig par bya ste/_phan tshun sgrib pa'i phyir ro/_/chos gang dag yul la [#]thogs pas thogs pa dang bcas pa de dag sgrib pa la
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]thogs pas kyang yin nam zhe na/_mu bzhi ste/_mu dang po ni sems kyi khams bdun dag dang /_chos kyi khams kyi phyogs mtshungs par ldan pa gang yin pa'o/_/gnyis pa ni yul lnga po dag go/_/gsum pa ni dbang po lnga dag go/_/bzhi pa ni mtshungs par ldan pa ma gtogs pa
[\[40b.2\]#]chos kyi khams kyi phyogs so/_/gang dag yul la thogs pas thogs pa dang bcas pa de dag nyid dmigs pa la thogs pas kyang yin nam zhe na/_tshig phyi ma dang sbyor ba ste/_re zhig dmigs pa la thogs pa [#]gang dag yin pa de dag ni yul la thogs pas kyang yin no/_/yul la
[\[40b.3\]]thogs pas yin la dmigs pa la thogs pas ma yin pa yang yod de dbang po lnga rnams so/_/btsun pa gzhon nu lan [#]na re ni gang la yid skye bar 'dod pa la gzhan dag gis thogs par byed [#]nus pa de ni thogs pa dang bcas pa yin par shes par bya la/_bzlog pa ni thogs pa med
[\[40b.4\]]par 'dod do zhes zer ro/_/thogs pa dang bcas pa dag bshad zin to/_/khams bco brgyad po de dag las dge ba rnams ni du/_mi dge ba rnams ni du/_lung du ma bstan pa rnams ni du zhe na/_lung ma bstan brgyad/_brgyad po dag gang zhe na/_thogs pa dang bcas pa bcu bshad
[\[40b.5\]]pa gang dag yin pa/_de dag nyid/_gzugs sgra ma gtogs dbang po lnga rnams dang /_dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khams rnams dang brgyad po de dag ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i ngo bor lung bstan du med pa'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa dag go/_/gzhan dag na re ni [#]rnam par smin pa'i phyir
[\[40b.6\]]lung bstan du med pa'i phyir [#]zhes zer te/_de ltar [#]na ni zag pa med pa la thal bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan rnam gsum/_gzhan khams bcu po dag ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang [#]lung du ma bstan pa yang yin te/_de la sems kyi khams bdun ma chags pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs par
[\[40b.7\]]ldan pa dag ni dge ba yin no/_/chags pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag ni mi dge ba yin no/_/gzhan dag ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no/_/chos kyi khams ni ma chags pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang /_kun nas bslang ba dang /_so sor
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]brtags [#]pas 'gog pa ni dge ba'o/_/chags pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang /_kun nas bslang ba ni mi dge ba'o/_/gzhan ni lung du [#]ma bstan pa yin no/_/gzugs dang sgra'i khams ni lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyis bsdus
[\[41a.2\]]pa dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems kyis kun nas bslang ba dag ni dge ba dang mi dge ba yin no/_/de las gzhan pa dag ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no/_/dge ba la sogs pa'i dngos po bshad zin to/_/khams bco brgyad po de dag las 'dod par gtogs pa rnams ni du/_gzugs
[\[41a.3\]]dang gzugs med par gtogs pa rnams ni du zhe na/_'dod khams gtogs pa thams cad do/_/gtogs pa ni ma bral ba ste/_'dod pa'i khams dang ldan zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/gzugs kyi khams ni [#]bcu bzhi'o/_/gzugs kyi khams na ni khams bcu bzhi ste/_dri
[\[41a.4\]]dang ro dang sna dang ni/_/lce'i rnam par [#]shes khams ma gtogs/_/de na dri dang ro dag med[#]/_/de gnyis ni khams kyi zas yin pa'i phyir la/_de dag gi 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyang der skye ba'i phyir ro/_/de lta [#]bas na dmigs pa med pa'i phyir sna dang lce'i rnam par shes pa
[\[41a.5\]]dag kyang med do/_/de lta [#]na ni 'o na de ni reg bya'i khams kyang med par thal bar 'gyur te/_khams kyi [#]zas yin pa'i phyir ro/_/zas kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa [#]gang yin pa de de na [#]yod do/_/dri dang ro dag kyang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro/_/reg bya dbang po'i rten dang gzhi dang bgo ba
[\[41a.6\]]la sogs pa'i dngos por yod du chug kyang zas mid pa med par dri dang ro dag la yongs su longs spyod pa med de/_de lta bas na de na zas mid pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams la dri dang ro dag dgos pa med kyi reg bya ni ma yin no/_/gzhan dag na re ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam
[\[41a.7\]]gtan la brten nas 'dir gzugs rnams kyang mthong zhing sgra rnams kyang thos la shin tu sbyangs pa dang lhan cig par gyur pa'i reg bya'i khyad par gyis kyang lus la phan 'dogs pas/_de'i phyir skye ba'i bsam gtan na gsum po de dag srid kyi/_dri dang ro dag ni ma yin no zhes
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]zer ro/_/de lta na ni 'o na sna dang lce'i dbang po dag kyang med par thal bar 'gyur te/_dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/dgos pa yod de/_de dag med par ni rten mdzes pa nyid dang /_mngon par brjod par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te dgos pa der zad na mdzes par bya ba'i don dang /_
[\[41b.2\]]tshig gi don du rten kho nas chog gi dbang po ni dgos pa med do[#]/_/dbang po med pa'i rten ni mi srid de/_pho'i dbang po'i rten bzhin no/_/de ni dgos pa med pa'i phyir mi srid par rigs kyi sna dang lce'i dbang po'i rten ni dgos pa dang bcas pa yin pas/_de'i phyir 'di dag ni
[\[41b.3\]]dbang po med par yang srid par rigs so/_/dgos pa med par yang dbang po mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/_dper na mngal du nges par 'chi ba rnams kyi lta bu'o/_/dgos pa med pa yin mod kyi rgyu med pa can ni ma yin no/_/dbang po skye ba'i rgyu gang zhe na/_dbang po la
[\[41b.4\]]sred pa dang bcas pa'i las kyi khyad par ro/_/gang yang yul la sred pa dang bral ba de ni gdon mi za bar dbang po las kyang sred pa dang bral ba yin pas de dag gi yul la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams la sna dang lce'i dbang po dag 'byung bar 'os pa ma yin no/_/yang na
[\[41b.5\]]pho'i dbang po yang ci ste 'grub par mi 'gyur/_mi mdzes par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/mdoms kyi sba [#]ba sbubs su nub pa rnams kyi ci'i phyir mi mdzes par 'gyur/_dgos pa'i dbang gis 'byung ba yang ma yin no/_/'o na ci zhe na/_rgyu'i dbang gis 'byung bas rgyu yod na mi mdzes
[\[41b.6\]]par byed bzhin du yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid do/_/'o na ni mdo las dbang po rnams ma tshang ba med cing med [#]pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ba dang 'gal lo zhe na/_de na [#]dbang po gang [#]dag srid pa de dag gis dbang po med pa ma yin pas 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/_
[\[41b.7\]]de lta ma yin na pho'i dbang po yang yod par thal bar 'gyur ro/_/'di skad du lus kyi sgo nas skye mched drug la sred pa kun du spyod kyi yul gyi sgo nas ni ma yin pas de na sna dang lce'i dbang po dag ni yod pa nyid kyi dri dang ro dag ni ma yin no/_/pho'i dbang po ni 'khrig _
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]pa reg pa'i sgo nas sred pa kun tu spyod pas de lta bas na gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i khams bcu bzhi'o zhes bya ba de grub bo zhes brjod do/_/gzugs med gtogs pa yid dang ni/_/chos dang yid kyi rnam par [#]shes/_/khams gzugs kyi 'dod
[\[42a.2\]]chags dang bral ba rnams der skye ste/_de'i phyir de ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi khams bcu dang de dag la rten [#]pa dang dmigs pa rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga yang med do/_/zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du/_zag pa med pa rnams ni du zhe na/_yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par
[\[42a.3\]]shes pa'i khams gang dag bshad pa/_de gsum zag bcas zag pa med/_/gang dag lam gyi bden pa dang 'dus ma byas kyis bsdus pa de dag ni zag pa med pa yin no/_/gzhan dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa yin no/_/lhag ma rnams ni zag bcas so/_/lhag ma khams bco lnga
[\[42a.4\]]po de dag ni gcig tu zag pa dang bcas pa yin no/_/rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du/_rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dag ni du/_rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa rnams ni du zhe na/_rtog dang dpyod dang bcas pa ni/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga
[\[42a.5\]]yin/_/'di dag ni rtag tu rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin te/_'di ltar kha phyi rol du bltas pa'i phyir rtsing ba yin no/_/ni zhes bya ba ni nges par bzung ba'i don to[#]/_/tha ma gsum ni rnam gsum mo/_/tha ma dag ni yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid
[\[42a.6\]]kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams te/_gsum po de dag ni rnam pa gsum ste/_de la yid kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_rtog [#]pa dang dpyod pa dag las gzhan pa chos kyi khams mtshungs par ldan pa dag dang [#]'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po na ni rtog pa
[\[42a.7\]]dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa dag yin no/_/bsam gtan khyad par can [#]ni rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam dag yin no/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa nas bzung ste/_srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi dang /_chos kyi khams mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa thams cad dang /_bsam gtan khyad par can _
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]gyi [#]dpyod pa ni rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa dag yin no/_/rtog pa ni rtog pa gnyis pa med pa'i phyir dang /_dpyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir rtag tu rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam yin no/_/'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i dpyod pa rnam pa gsum po 'di dag gi nang du mi 'du na de ji
[\[42b.2\]]skad du brjod par bya zhe na/_dpyod pa gnyis pa med pa'i phyir dang /_rtog pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir dpyod pa med cing rtog pa tsam yin no/_/de nyid kyi phyir rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa na chos rnam pa bzhi yod de/_rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa dag ni rtog pa dang dpyod
[\[42b.3\]]pa ma rtogs [#]pa mtshungs par ldan pa rnams so/_/rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam dag ni rtog pa'o/_/rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa dag ni mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa rnams so/_/dpyod pa med cing rtog pa tsam ni dpyod pa'o zhes bya'o/_/lhag ma rnams ni gnyi ga spangs/_/lhag ma
[\[42b.4\]]rnams ni gzugs can gyi khams bcu po dag ste/_de dag ni mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir rtag tu rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa dag yin no/_/gal te rnam par shes pa'i tshogs pa lnga po rnams rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa dag yin na/_ji ltar na [#]rnam par rtog pa med pa
[\[42b.5\]]dag ces bya zhe na/_nges par rtog dang rjes [#]dran pa'i/_/rnam par rtog pa rnams [#]mi rtog[# ]/rnam par rtog pa ni rnam pa gsum mo zhes grag ste/_ngo bo nyid dang /_nges par rtog pa dang /_rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o/_/de bas na de dag la ngo bo nyid kyi rtog pa yod kyi gzhan dag [#]yin te/_de lta
[\[42b.6\]]bas na [#]rnam par rtog pa med pa dag ces bya ste/_dper na rta rkang gcig pa la rkang med ces bya ba bzhin no/_/de la ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa ni rtog pa yin te/_de ni 'og nas sems las byung ba dag gi nang nas ston to/_/gzhan dag gi rang bzhin ci zhe na/_rim bzhin du/_de dag yid kyi shes rab
[\[42b.7\]]g.yeng /_/yid kyi dran pa thams cad nyid/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes rab ni yid kyi zhes bya'o/_/mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa ni g.yeng ba zhes bya ste/_de ni nges par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o/_/yid kyi dran pa nyid mnyam par gzhag pa dang [#]mnyam par gzhag pa
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]ma yin pa thams cad ni rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/dmigs pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du/_dmigs pa med pa rnams ni du zhe na/_dmigs bcas sems kyi khams bdun no/_/mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang lce dang /_lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnams dang /_
[\[43a.2\]]yid kyi khams te/_sems kyi khams bdun po de dag ni yul 'dzin pa'i phyir dmigs pa dang bcas pa dag go/_/chos kyi skye mched [#]kyang /_dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin te/_sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa'o/_/lhag ma gzugs can gyi khams bcu po dag dang /_chos kyi khams kyi phyogs
[\[43a.3\]]ldan pa ma yin pa ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya bar grub bo/_/zin pa rnams ni du/_ma zin pa rnams ni du zhe na/_ma zin [#]dgu/_dgu gang zhe na/_dmigs pa dang bcas pa bdun brgyad pa'i phyed dang bcas te bshad pa gang dag yin pa/_brgyad po de dag rnams dang sgra/_/de ltar na sems kyi khams bdun dang /_
[\[43a.4\]]chos kyi khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_khams dgu po de dag ni ma zin pa yin no/_/dgu po gzhan ni rnam pa gnyis[#]/_/zin pa dag kyang yin/_ma zin pa dag kyang yin te/_de la mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang [#]da ltar byung ba rnams ni zin pa yin no/_/'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa rnams ni ma
[\[43a.5\]]zin pa yin no/_/gzugs dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya'i khams da ltar byung ba dbang po dang tha mi dad pa rnams ni zin pa yin no/_/gzhan dag ni ma zin pa rnams te/_'di lta ste rtsa ba ma gtogs pa'i skra dang /_ba spu dang /_sen mo dang /_so dag la yod pa dang /_phyi sa dang /_gcin dang /_mchil ma
[\[43a.6\]]dang /_snabs dang /_khrag la sogs pa dag la yod pa dang /_sa dang [#]chu la sogs pa dag la yod pa lta bu'o/_/zin pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na/_phan pa dang gnod pa dag gis phan tshun mthun par byed pa'i phyir sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyis rten gyi dngos por nye bar gzung ba ste/_
[\[43a.7\]]'jig rten gyi na sems pa dang bcas pa zhes brjod pa gang yin pa'o/_/khams du dag gcig ni 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid yin/_du dag gcig ni 'byung ba las gyur pa yin zhe na/_reg bya rnam pa gnyis yin te/_'byung ba dag dang /_'byung ba las gyur pa'o/_/de la 'byung ba dag ni bzhi'o/_/'byung ba
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]las gyur pa ni 'jam pa nyid la sogs pa rnam pa bdun te/_'byung ba dag la yod pa'i phyir ro/_/lhag ma gzugs can dgu po ni/_/'byung gyur[#]/_dbang po lnga'i khams dag dang yul bzhi ste/_khams dgu po de rnams ni 'byung ba las gyur pa dag kho na'o/_/chos khams phyogs gcig kyang /_'byung
[\[43b.2\]]ba las gyur pa ste/_rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/lhag ma sems kyi khams bdun dang /_rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs pa chos kyi khams ni gnyis ga ma yin pa'o/_/btsun pa sangs rgyas lha na re ni skye mched bcu po dag ni 'byung ba tsam mo zhes zer ro/_/de ni de lta ma yin te/_
[\[43b.3\]]mdo las 'byung ba rnams ni bzhi nyid dang /_sra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du nges par gzung ba'i phyir la/_de dag kyang reg bya yin pa'i phyir ro/_/mig la sogs pas kyang sra ba la sogs pa mi 'dzin la/_lus kyi dbang pos kyang kha dog la sogs pa ma yin no/_/mdo las kyang dge slong mig ni nang
[\[43b.4\]]gi skye mched yin te/_'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa gzugs dang ba gzugs can bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa ste lus kyi bar du yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong gzugs rnams ni phyi'i skye mched yin te/_'byung ba chen po bzhi dag [#]rgyur byas pa gzugs can bstan du yod la thogs pa
[\[43b.5\]]dang bcas pa yin no/_/dge slong sgra ni phyi'i skye mched yin te/_'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa gzugs can bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa ste/_dri dang ro yang de bzhin no/_/dge slong reg bya rnams ni phyi'i skye mched yin te/_'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang /_'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas
[\[43b.6\]]pa gzugs can bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa'o zhes gsungs te/_reg bya'i skye mched kyi phyogs gcig kho nas 'byung ba rnams bsdus pa'i phyir lhag ma rnams ni 'byung ba dag ma yin no zhes bya bar gsal bar kun du bstan pa yin no/_/'o na mdo las/_gang mig gi sha'i [#]gong bu la sra ba mkhrang
[\[43b.7\]]bar gyur pa gang yin pa zhes gsungs so/_/de dang tha mi dad par 'jug pa'i sha'i [#]gong bu la de skad du bstan par zad do/_/mngal du 'jug pa las/_dge slong [#]'di ni khams drug pa yin no zhes gsungs so/_/sems can gyi rdzas kyi gzhi bstan pa'i phyir te/_yang reg pa'i skye mched drug ces gsungs pa'i
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]phyir dang /_sems las byung ba rnams med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/sems nyid sems las byung ba rnams yin no zhes bya bar khas blangs par rigs [#]pa yang ma yin te/_mdo las/_'du shes dang sems pa'i chos 'di ni sems las byung ba [#]sems la brten pa'o zhes 'byung
[\[44a.2\]]ba'i phyir dang /_sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de lta bas na khams rnams kyi 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa nyid ni ji skad bshad pa bzhin [#]yin no/_/bsags pa rnams ni du/_bsags pa ma yin pa rnams ni du zhe na/_gzugs can bcu ni bsags pa'o/_/dbang
[\[44a.3\]]po'i khams lnga dang [#]yul lnga dag ni rdul phra rab 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir bsags pa dag go/_/khams bco brgyad po dag las gcod par byed pa ni gang gcad [#]par bya ba ni gang /_sreg par byed pa ni gang /_bsreg [#]par bya ba ni gang /_'jal bar byed pa ni gang /_gzhal bar bya ba ni gang zhe na/_gcod byed
[\[44a.4\]]gcad par bya ba nyid/_/phyi rol gyi ni khams bzhi yin/_/gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya zhes bya ba ste/_dgra sta dang shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ci zhe na/_'dus pa'i rgyun 'brel bar 'byung ba can rnam par 'byed pa skyed pa'o/_/lus kyi dbang po la sogs pa ni
[\[44a.5\]]gcad par bya ba ma yin te/_yan lag ma lus par bcad na de dag la gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro/_/dbang po rnams la ni gnyis su 'gyur ba med de/_gcad [#]pa'i yan lag la dbang po med pa'i phyir ro/_/gcod par byed pa yang ma yin te/_nor bu'i 'od bzhin du dang ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar gcod byed
