[\[140b.5\]]yid las byung ba zhes bya ste/_phyi'i khu chu dang khrag la sogs pas cung zad kyang rgyur byas pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/srid pa tshol ba'i ngang tshul can yin pa'i phyir srid pa tshol ba'o/_/dri za ba'i phyir na/_dri za'o/_/skye ba la mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir mngon par 'grub pa ste/_mdo las/_gnod
[\[140b.6\]]pa dang bcas pa'i lus mngon par grub nas gnod pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du mdo las/_gang gis [#]mngon par 'grub pa'i kun du sbyor ba ni spangs la skye ba'i kun du sbyor ba ni ma yin pa'i gang zag kyang yod do zhes bya ba mu bzhi
[\[140b.7\]]gsungs pa'i phyir te/_mu dang po ni phyir mi 'ong ba khams gnyis las 'dod chags dang bral ba'o/_/gnyis pa ni bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o/_/gsum pa ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/bzhi pa ni rnam pa de [#]dag ma gtogs pa'o/_/yang na [#]byung ba ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/srid pa
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]tshol ba rnams ni srid pa dang bcas pa dag go/_/yang zas du zhig ni sems can byung ba rnams gnas par byed pa yin/_du zhig ni srid pa tshol ba rnams la phan 'dogs par byed pa yin zhe na/_bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re thams cad kyang gnyi ga yin no zhes zer ro/_/_
[\[141a.2\]]kham gyi zas kyang de la chags pa rnams kyi yang 'byung bar byed pa yin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis zas bzhi ni nad dang /_'bras dang /_zug rngu'i rtsa ba yin no/_/rga shi'i rkyen yin no zhes gsungs so/_/yid la sems pa yang 'dir gnas par byed pa yin par snang ste/_'di skad
[\[141a.3\]]du lo nyes kyis nyen pa'i pha zhig gis thal ba'i rkyal ba [#]kha thur mas gtur te phye yin no/_/bar du bu [#]gnyis shig yid ches par byas pa dang /_de gnyis kyang de la rtog par byed cing ring mo zhig tu gnas par gyur to/_/gcig gis kha phye nas thal ba yin no snyam ste re ba med par gyur pa dang shi'o/_/_
[\[141a.4\]]yang rgya mtshor gru chag pa'i mi zhig thang yin no snyam nas dbu ba'i phung po chen po zhig gi drung du song ste/_de la kun du bsnams [#]nas re ba med pa dang shi'o zhes grag go zhes brjod do/_/'gro ba'i rnam grangs las kyang rgya mtsho chen po nas srog chags che long rnams chu [#]nang nas skam la 'thon
[\[141a.5\]]te bye ma can gyi thang la sgo nga rnams bzhag nas bye mas bkab ste slar yang rgya mtsho'i nang du 'gro'o/_/de la [#]ma gang dag gis sgo nga las brtsams te dran pas ma brjed pa'i sgo nga de dag ni 'drul bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dag gis brjed pa de dag ni 'drul bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad de/_gzhan
[\[141a.6\]]gyi zas kyis zas dang bcas par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir de ni mi brjod kyi/_'di skad du sgo nga gang dag gis ma las brtsams nas dran pas mi brjed pas [#]de dag ni reg pa'i gnas skabs de dran pas 'drul bar mi 'gyur la/_gang dag gis brjed pa de dag ni 'drul bar 'gyur ro zhes
[\[141a.7\]]ni brjod [#]do/_/yang ci'i phyir zas bzhi kho na yin no/_/[#]zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad srid pa rnams gso bar byed pa dag ma yin nam zhe na/_de ni de lta na [#]yin mod kyi 'on kyang gtso bor bshad de/_'di la gnas dang ni/_rten pa rgyas pa'i don du gnyis/_/srid
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]gzhan 'phen dang 'grub pa yi/_/don du gnyis te go rims bzhin/_/gnas ni dbang po dang bcas pa'i lus so/_/de rgyas par byed pa ni kham gyi zas so/_/rten pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so/_/de dag rgyas par byed pa ni reg pa ste/_re zhig 'di gnyis
[\[141b.2\]]ni 'dir skyes pa'i srid pa gso bar bya ba [#]gtso bo yin no/_/yid la sems pas ni yang srid pa 'phen par byed do/_/'phangs zin pa ni las kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa'i sa bon las mngon par 'grub pas 'di gnyis ni ma skyes pa'i srid pa skyes [#]pa la gtso bor yin no/_/[#]de'i
[\[141b.3\]]phyir bzhir gsungs so/_/snga ma gnyis ni skyes zin pa gso bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ma ma lta bu dag yin no/_/phyi ma gnyis ni skyed par byed pa ma [#]yin pa'i phyir ma lta bu dag yin no/_/gang la la kham yin pa de thams cad zas kyang yin nam zhe na/_kham yin la zas ma yin pa yang yod
[\[141b.4\]]do zhes bya ba mu bzhi ste/_mu dang po ni kham gang la brten nas dbang po rnams nyams par 'gyur la/_'byung ba chen po rnams kyang yongs su 'jig par 'gyur ba'o/_/mu gnyis pa ni zas gsum pa [#]dag go/_/gsum pa ni kham gang la brten nas dbang po rnams rgyas par 'gyur zhing
[\[141b.5\]]'byung ba chen po rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur ba'o/_/bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o/_/de bzhin du reg pa la sogs pas kyang [#]ci rigs par mu bzhir [#]bya'o/_/reg pa la sogs pa la brten nas dbang po rnams rgyas par 'gyur zhing 'byung ba rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur ba
[\[141b.6\]#]de dag zas kyang ma yin pa lta yod dam zhe na/_yod de/_gzhan gyi sa pa dang /_zag pa med pa rnams so/_/bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re/_gang zhig zos nas za ba po la gnod par byed pa de la [#]yang dang po phan 'dogs pa'i phyir zas yin no/_/zas ni dus gnyis su zas kyi bya ba byed de/_
[\[141b.7\]]yongs su longs spyod pa'i tshe dang /_'ju ba'i tshe'o zhes zer ro/_/'gro ba gang na zas du zhig yod ce na/_thams cad na thams cad yod de/_skye gnas dag na yang de dang 'dra'o/_/dmyal ba dag na kham gyi zas ji lta bu zhe na/_lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba dang /_zangs zhun ma
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]yin no/_/gal te gnod par byed pa yang zas yin na ni mu bzhi la yang gnod par 'gyur la rab tu byed pa'i gzhung kham gyi zas gang zhe na/_kham gang la brten nas dbang po rnams rgyas par 'byung zhing 'gyur ba [#]chen po rnams kyang 'phel ba dang 'tsho ba [#]dang nye bar 'tsho bar
[\[142a.2\]]'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba nas/_rnam par shes pa'i bar du rgyas par gsungs pa la yang gnod par 'gyur ro zhe na/_rgyas par 'gyur ba'i zas la dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do/_/nyams par 'gyur ba'i zas ni dmyal ba dag tu zas kyi mtshan nyid thob pa'i phyir te/_des kyang bkres
[\[142a.3\]]pa dang skom pa dag 'joms par nus pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan yang nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba dag na mi dang 'dra bar kham gyi zas yod pa'i phyir 'gro ba lnga pa nyid du rigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis/_gang gis phyi'i [#]drang srong 'dod pa dag [#]las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya la zas byin pa bas gang
[\[142a.4\]]gis 'dzam bu'i tshal na 'dug pa'i so so'i skye bo gcig la byin na sbyin [#]pa de bas sbyin pa 'di 'bras bu ches che'o zhes gsungs pa/_'dzam bu'i tshal na 'dug pa'i so so'i skye bo zhes bya ba ni [#]gang zhe na/_kha cig na re 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa lto [#]dang ldan pa dag yin no zhes zer ro/_/_
[\[142a.5\]]de ni rigs pa [#]ma yin te/_gcig ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/so so'i skye bo mang po la zas byin na bsod nams mang por 'gyur gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba nyung ngu la zas byin pas [#]ni ma yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa [#]'di la khyad par ci zhig yod/_gzhan dag na re byang chub sems dpa'
[\[142a.6\]]nye ba yin no zhes zer ro/_/bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni de skad du mi brjod de/_de la byin na dgra bcom pa bye ba la byin pa bas bsod nams ches mang ba'i phyir ro/_/de lta bas na 'di ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa thob pa so so'i skye bo yin par dgongs so zhes zer ro/_/'di'i ming
[\[142a.7\]]yang don dang mthun pa ma yin la/_mdo'am bstan bcos gang las kyang 'dzam bu'i tshal du gtogs pa ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa thob [#]pa'o zhes 'ol phyir [#]ma bshad pas 'di ni yongs su rtog pa 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i [#]'dzam bu'i tshal na bzhugs
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]pa kho na yin par rigs te/_so so'i skye bo de ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar 'dra bas de'i tshe de dag las khyad par du 'phags par gsungs so/_/de ni de dag mtha' yas pa bas kyang khyad par du 'phags na/_brgya smos pa ni dang po'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro/_/de ni gdon mi za
[\[142b.2\]]bar de lta yin par shes par bya ste/_'di ltar de ma gtogs pa'i phyi rol pa rnams las rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa khyad par du 'phags par mdzad par gyur to/_/de lta ma yin na 'dzam bu'i tshal du gtogs pa las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa kho nar 'gyur ro/_/sems
[\[142b.3\]]can rnams kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji lta ba dang /_ji ltar gnas pa bshad zin to/_/ji ltar tshe zad pa la sogs pas 'chi 'pho ba la [#]yang bshad zin to/_/da ni sems [#]gang la gnas te 'chi 'pho ba dang skye bar 'gyur ba 'di brjod par bya ste/_'chad dang mtshams sbyor 'dod chags
[\[142b.4\]]bral/_/nyams dang 'chi 'pho [#]skye ba rnams/_/yid kyi rnam shes kho nar 'dod/_/ces bya ba smos so/_/de [#]dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'chad pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba nying mtshams sbyor ba dang /_khams dang sa las 'dod chags dang [#]bral ba dang /_yongs su nyams pa dang /_'chi 'pho
[\[142b.5\]]ba dang /_skye ba dang /_chos drug po 'di dag ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa kho na yin par 'dod kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no/_/skye ba smos pa ni srid pa bar mar nying mtshams sbyor ba [#]bshad zin pa'i ngo bor rig par bya'o/_/tshor ba ni/_'chi 'pho skye ba btang snyoms la/_/'chi 'pho ba ni 'chi 'pho
[\[142b.6\]]ba nyid yin no/_/skye ba ni skye ba yin no/_/'di gnyis bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba [#]yin te/_de ni mi gsal ba'i phyir ro/_/tshor ba gzhan dag ni gsal ba yin te/_rnam par shes pa gsal ba dag gis 'chi 'pho ba dang skye bar ni rung ba ma yin no/_/yid kyi rnam par
[\[142b.7\]]shes pa de la yang /_rtse gcig sems med la de med/_/'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro/_/skal ba mi mnyam pa'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa las byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dang /_phan 'dogs par byed pa yin pa'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]la 'chi 'pho ba'am skye ba med do/_/sems med pa la yang med de/_sems med pa la ni gnod pa bya bar mi nus so/_/gang gi tshe de'i lus yongs su 'jig par rtsom pa de'i tshe yang de las gdon mi za bar de'i lus dang 'brel pa'i sems mngon du gyur nas phyis 'chi
[\[143a.2\]]'pho bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no/_/skye ba la yang sems 'chad pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir dang /_nyon mongs pa med par mi skye ba'i phyir sems med par rigs pa nyid ma yin no/_/'chi ba'i srid pa rnam pa gsum du bshad pa la/_dgra bcom pa ni/_mya ngan 'das lung bstan min gnyis/_/spyod
[\[143a.3\]]lam pa dang /_gal te 'dod pa'i khams na [#]rnam par smin pa'i [#]btang snyoms yod na rnam par smin pa'i sems la gnas nas so/_/ci ste med na ni spyod lam pa kho na la'o/_/ci'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa kho na la yin gyi gzhan la ma yin zhe na/_de ni nyam chung ba'i phyir sems 'chad pa'i rjes su mthun pa yin no/_/yang 'chi ba na
[\[143a.4\]]lus kyi phyogs gang du rnam par shes pa [#]'gag ce na/_cig car 'chi na ni yid dang bcas pa'i lus kyi dbang po mod la 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/gal te rim gyis 'chi 'pho ba na [#]de'i tshe/_'og min [#]lhar 'gro mi skye rnams/_/rim gyis 'chi na
[\[143a.5\]]rkang pa dang /_/lte ba snying gar yid 'chi 'pho/_/'og tu 'gro bas na 'og tu 'gro ba ste/_ngan song du 'gro ba rnams so/_/mir 'gro bas na mir 'gro bas te/_mi'i nang du 'gro ba rnams so/_/lhar 'gro bas [#]na lhar 'gro ba ste/_lha'i nang du 'gro ba rnams so/_/de dag gi rnam par shes pa ni
[\[143a.6\]]grangs bzhin du rkang pa dang /_lte ba dang /_snying gar 'gag go/_/yang mi skye bas na mi skye ba ste/_dgra bcom pa dag go/_/de dag gi rnam par shes pa [#]snying khar 'gag go/_/gzhan dag na re spyi bor [#]zhes zer ro/_/de dag tu lus kyi dbang po 'gag pa'i phyir ro/_/'chi ba'i lus kyi dbang po ni
[\[143a.7\]]rdo leb bsregs pa'i thog tu chus btab pa zhum par 'gyur ba [#]bzhin du rkang pa la sogs par nub par 'gyur ro/_/gnad 'chad pa'i tshor bas nyen pa'i srog chags rnams ni phal cher de lta de ltar rim gyis [#]'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gnad gcod pa ni chu la [#]sogs kyis lus kyi phyogs 'ga'
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]zhig nyams na 'chi bar 'gyur ba de dag ni gnad rnams zhes bya'o/_/de dag kyang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig drag tu 'khrugs par gyur pa mtshon cha thams cad [#]bdar bas btab pa dang 'dra bas tshor ba mi bzad pa dag gis bcad pa lta bu yin gyi/_de dag shing
[\[143b.2\]]gcod pa lta bur ni ma yin no/_/yang na bcad pa dang 'dra bar yang g.yo ba med pas na bcad pa zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir sa'i khams kyi [#]ma yin zhe na/_skyon bzhi pa med pa'i phyir te/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan rnams ni skyon gsum yin pa [#]de dag gi gtso bo ni ci rigs par chu dang me dang rlung gi
[\[143b.3\]]khams dag yin no/_/gzhan dag na re snod kyi 'jig rten 'jig pa dang chos mthun pas so zhes zer ro/_/lha dag gi nang na ni gnad 'chad pa med mod kyi/_'on kyang lha'i bu 'chi ba'i chos can la ni nye ba'i snga [#]ltas lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te/_gos rnams dang rgyan rnams las sgra yid du mi 'ong ba
[\[143b.4\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lus kyi 'od chung bar 'gyur/_khrus byas pa'i chu'i thigs pa dag lus la chags par 'gyur/_g.yo ba'i bdag nyid can yang blo yul gcig la gnas par 'gyur/_mig gnyis 'dzums pa dang 'byed pa dag srid par 'gyur te/_de dag ni 'khrul pa can yin no/_/'chi
[\[143b.5\]]ba'i ltas lnga las ni mi 'da' ste/_gos dri ma can du 'gyur/_me tog phreng rnyings par 'gyur/_mchan khung gnyis nas rngul 'byung bar 'gyur/_lus las [#]dri nga ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur/_lha'i bu rang gi stan la mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'o/_/sems can gyi 'jig rten 'di de [#]ltar
[\[143b.6\]]skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang 'chi 'pho ba na bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs gsum du bzhag ste/_tshogs gsum ni yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i tshogs dang /_log pa nyid du nges pa'i tshogs dang /_ma nges pa'i tshogs so/_/de la 'phags dang mtshams med byed pa dag yang dag log pa nyid du nges/_yang
[\[143b.7\]]dag pa nyid gang zhe na/_mdo las gang 'dod chags gtan nas spangs pa dang /_zhe sdang gtan nas spangs pa dang /_gti mug gtan nas spangs pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad gtan nas spangs pa nyid ni yang dag pa nyid do zhes 'byung ngo /_/'phags pa rnams gang zhe na/_gang dag la zag
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]pa med pa'i lam skyes pa'o/_/sdig pa'i chos las ring du song bas na 'phags pa rnams te/_gtan du 'bral [#]ba'i thob pa rnyed pa'i phyir ro/_/de dag ni nyon mongs pa zad par nges pa'i phyir yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dag yin no/_/thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa thob pa yang
[\[144a.2\]]gdon mi za bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i [#]chos can yin na ci'i phyir yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dag ma yin zhe na/_de dag ni log pa nyid du yang nges par 'gyur la/_de dag ji ltar de ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa la sogs pa ltar dus nges par yang dag pa nyid du nges pa yang ma
[\[144a.3\]]yin no/_/log pa nyid gang zhe na/_dmyal ba rnams dang /_dud 'gro dang /_yi dgas te/_'di ni log pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la mtshams med pa byed pa rnams ni dmyal bar nges pa'i phyir log pa nyid du nges pa dag yin no/_/nges pa de dag las gzhan pa ni ma nges pa'o zhes bya bar grub ste/_
[\[144a.4\]]de dag ni rkyen la ltos na gnyi ga la brten [#]pa nyid dang /_gnyi ga la mi brten pa nyid kyang yin no/_/sems can gyi 'jig rten bshad zin to/_/[#]da ni snod kyi 'jig rten bshad par bya ste/_de la snod kyi 'jig rten gyi/_/gnas par 'dod pa'i 'og dag gi_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor rngams su ni/_/sa
[\[144a.5\]]ya drug 'bum grangs med do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni 'di ltar gnas par 'dod de/_'di lta ste/_sems can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis 'og na nam mkha' la brten pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub ste/_de'i rngams su ni dpag tshad sa ya
[\[144a.6\]]drug 'bum mo/_/rgyar ni grangs med de/_'di ltar gang tshan po che chen po'i rdo rjes kyang gzhig par mi nus par sra ba yin no/_/de'i steng na/_chu rngams 'bum phrag bcu gcig dang /_/stong phrag dag ni nyi shu'o/_/dkyil 'khor zhes bya bar sbyar te/_sems can rnams kyi las dag
[\[144a.7\]]gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor der sprin rnams 'dus nas/_char gyi rgyun gnya' shing tsam 'bab [#]pa de chu'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur te/_de'i rngams su ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu gcig dang nyi khri'o/_/ji ltar na chu de dag thad kar mi 'bo zhe na/_kha cig na re sems can rnams kyi las kyi
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]dbang gis te/_dper na bza' ba dang /_btung ba zos pa dang 'thung ba [#]ma zhu ba long kar mi ltung ba bzhin no zhes zer ro/_/sde pa gzhan dag na re sbyang gi tshul du rlung gis 'dzin to zhes zer ro/_/yang sems can rnams kyi las kyi mthu las byung ba'i rlung dag gis chu de kun nas dkrugs pa na 'o
[\[144b.2\]]ma bskol ba spris ma chags pa'i tshul du steng ma gser du 'gyur ro/_/chu'i dkyil 'khor de phyis ni rngams su 'bum phrag brgyad/_lhag ma dag ni gser du 'gyur/_/lhag ma yang gang zhig ce na/_chu'i steng rim dpag tshad sum 'bum nyi khri gser gyi rang bzhin gyi sa gzhir gyur pa
[\[144b.3\]]de'i chu dang gser [#]gyi rngams bshad zin to/_/chu dang gser gyi dkyil 'khor gyi/_/thad kar 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang /_/stong phrag gsum dang brgya phrag ni/_/phyed dang lnga rnams kho na'o/_/'di gnyi ga rgya mnyam mo/_/khor yug tu ni sum 'gyur ro/_/kho [#]ra khor yug tu brtsi na ni sum
[\[144b.4\]]'gyur du 'gyur te/_dpag tshad sa ya phrag gsum [#]dang /_'bum phrag drug dang /_khri sum brgya lnga bcu'o/_/gser gyi sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor chu'i steng na gnas pa gang yin pa/_de la lhun po gnya' shing 'dzin/_/gshol mda' 'dzin dang seng ldeng can/_/de bzhin blta na [#]sdug ri dang /_/_
[\[144b.5\]]rta rna dang ni rnam bdud [#]dang /_/mu khyud 'dzin ri'o/_/ri chen po brgyad po 'di dag ni gser gyi dkyil 'khor la brten pa yin te/_ri rab ni dbus na'o/_/lhag ma rnams kyis ni ri rab bskor te gnas so/_/ri bdun gyi [#]ra bas bskor ba de'i phyi [#]rim gang yin pa de ni ri mu khyud 'dzin no/_/_
[\[144b.6\]]de nas ni gling rnams yin no/_/de'i phyi rol na ni gling bzhi dag go/_/de dag gi yang phyi rol na ni khor yug ste/_des ni gling bzhir [#]khor yug tu bskor te[#]/_de dag las/_bdun ni gser yin te [#]lcags so/_/gnya' shing 'dzin la sogs pa'i ri bdun ni gser gyi rang bzhin yin no/_/_
[\[144b.7\]]khor yug ni lcags kyi rang bzhin yin no/_/lhun po rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin/_gser gyi rang bzhin dang /_dngul gyi rang bzhin dang /_baiDUr+ya'i rang bzhin dang shel gyi rang bzhin te/_ngos bzhi dag tu grangs bzhin no/_/ri rab kyi [#]ngos gang zhig gang gi rang bzhin [#]yin pa de'i mthus
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]de'i ngos kyi nam mkha' yang de'i kha dog tu snang ste/_de'i ngos 'dzam bu'i gling logs baiDUr+ya'i rang bzhin yin la/_de'i 'od kyi kha dog gis 'di'i nam mkha' yang bai DUr+ya'i kha dog tu snang ngo zhes brjod do/_/yang de dag ji ltar 'byung zhe na/_gser gyi rang bzhin
[\[145a.2\]]gyi sa gzhi la char pa'i rgyun [#]'bab ste/_sa bon rnam pa sna tshogs khong na yod pa'i chu de dag mthu rnam pa du ma'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i rlung dag gis bshig pa na ri [#]de dang de dag tu 'gyur ro/_/[#]'di ltar 'gyur te/_gang rigs tha dad pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par bskyed par bya ba la ma phrad par
[\[145a.3\]]rkyen du 'gyur ba yin gyi/_ji ltar grangs can pa rnams kyi 'gyur ba lta bu ni ma yin no/_/grangs can pa rnams kyi 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhe na/_rdzas gnas pa la chos gzhan log na chos gzhan 'byung ba'o/_/'di la nyes pa ci zhig yod ce na/_gnas pa gang gi chos rnams kyi bye brag brtag par
[\[145a.4\]]bya ba'i chos can nyid med do/_/chos can [#]rnams las chos can gzhan no zhes de skad du zer/_chos de nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba tsam ni 'gyur ba yin no zhe na/_de lta [#]na yang rigs pa ma yin no/_/'di la mi rigs pa [#]ci zhig yod ce na/_de nyid 'di yin la/_'dis [#]de lta bu yang ma yin no
[\[145a.5\]]zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lugs 'di ni sngon ma byung ba yin no/_/de ltar byung ba'i [#]gser la sogs pa las kyi mthus bskyed pa'i rlung dag gis bsdus nas phung por byed de/_de dag ni ri dag tu'ang 'gyur la/_gling rnams su yang 'gyur ro/_/ri rab la sogs pa khor yug la thug pa'i ri de
[\[145a.6\]]dag ni chu'i nang du brgyad khri dag nub bo/_/de dag gser gyi sa gzhi'i steng na chu dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pa der nub bo/_/chu'i steng [#]du yang /_dpag tshad dag ni brgyad khri'o/_/de ltar na ri rab ni 'phang du dpag tshad 'bum drug khri'o/_/brgyad po'i 'phang du phyed phyed [#]dbri/_/ri rab chu'i steng du
[\[145a.7\]]ji tsam 'phags pa de'i phyed ni gnya' shing 'dzin te/_dpag tshad bzhi khri yin la/_de'i phyed ni gshol mda' 'dzin to zhes bya bas[#]/_de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang mu khyud 'dzin gyi phyed ni khor yug ste/_'phang du dpag tshad sum brgya [#]phyed dang bcu gsum yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du phyed phyed
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]kyis dbri bar rig par bya'o/_/de dag rngams su [#]'phang dang mnyam/_/de dag chu las ji tsam gyen du [#]'phags pa rngams su yang de tsam ste/_rgyar zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/de dag bar bdun rol mtsho yin/_/mu khyud 'dzin la thug pa'i ri de dag gi bar bdun ni rol mtsho bdun zhes bya ste/_
[\[145b.2\]]yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ngo /_/chu de ni bsil ba dang /_zhim pa dang /_yang ba dang /_'jam pa dang /_dngas pa [#]dang /_dri nga ba med pa dang /_'thung [#]na mgrin pa la mi gnod pa dang /_'thungs [#]na lto la mi gnod pa'o/_/yang de dag las/_dang po stong phrag brgyad cu'o/_/ri rab dang gnya' shing
[\[145b.3\]]'dzin gyi bar gyi rol mtsho dang po ni kha tshon dpag tshad brgyad khri'o/_/de ni nang gi rgya mtsho yin/_/rgya mtsho ni gnyis te/_nang gi dang phyi'i'o/_/rol mtsho de ni nang gi rgya mtsho yin no/_/de'i ngos la sum 'gyur ro/_/kha tshon ni dpag tshad brgyad khri [#]bshad do/_/ngos la ni gnya' shing 'dzin gyi
[\[145b.4\]]'gram nas bgrangs na sum 'gyur te/_dpag tshad nyis 'bum bzhi khri'o/_/rol mtsho gzhan ni phyed phyed do/_/[#]gnya' shing 'dzin nas gshol mda' 'dzin gyi bar gyi rol mtsho gnyis pa ni dang po'i phyed de/_dpag tshad bzhi khri yin la/_gsum pa ni de'i phyed do zhes bya ba nas/_de bzhin
[\[145b.5\]]du rol mtsho bdun pa ni/_dpag tshad stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'o [#]zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/[#]rol mtsho gzhan rnams phyed phyed kyis dbri'o/_/de dag gi srid du ni ha cang 'byams [#]klas pa'i phyir ma bgrangs so/_/lhag ma phyi'i mtsho chen yin/_/lhag ma gang zhig ce na mu khyud 'dzin dang khor yug gi
[\[145b.6\]]bar de'i ni phyi'i rgya mtsho chen po yin te/_tshwa sgo'i [#]tshwa chus gang ngo /_/de yang kha tshon du [#]dpag tshad 'bum phrag gsum dang stong phrag ni nyi shu gnyis so/_/de la ri rab kyi ngos bzhi ni [#]gling bzhi ste/_de la ni 'dzam bu'i gling ste ngos gsum la/_stong phrag gnyis po [#]shing rta'i dbyibs/_/de'i ngos gsum
[\[145b.7\]]la dpag tshad nyis stong nyis stong yod la/_de'i [#]dbyibs kyang shing rta dang 'dra'o/_/de'i dbus su gser gyi rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi la gang du byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin skyed [#]par mdzad pa rdo rje'i gdan mngon par 'grub ste/_de ni lus sam sa phyogs gzhan
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]gyis bzod par mi nus so/_/gcig la dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi'o/_/[#]de'i ngos bzhi pa dag [#]la ni dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi ste/_de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni shing rta chen po'i [#]dbyibs lta bu yin no/_/shar gyi lus 'phags zla gam 'dra/_/'di nas shar phyogs kyi ri rab kyi ngos
[\[146a.2\]]rol na shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling yod de/_de ni zla ba kham pa [#]lta bur mngon par grub bo/_/rgyar ni ngos gsum 'di dang 'dra'o/_/[#]ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling la dpag tshad nyis stong nyis stong yod pa bzhin no/_/gcig la dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu'o/_/ngos bzhi pa la ni dpag tshad sum brgya
[\[146a.3\]]lnga bcu'o/_/ba lang spyod gling zlum po ste/_/stong phrag phyed dang brgyad yin no/_/'di nas nub phyogs kyi ri rab kyi ngos rol na ba lang spyod kyi gling yod de/_dpag tshad bdun stong lnga brgya'o/_/de ni zla ba nya ba [#]bzhin du kun nas zlum po yin te/_de dbus stong phrag phyed dang gsum/_/chu zheng
[\[146a.4\]]du ni dpag tshad stong phrag phyed dang gsum mo/_/[#]sgra mi snyan brgyad gru bzhir [#]mnyam/_/'di nas byang phyogs kyi ri rab kyi ngos la [#]byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling yod de/_kun du dpag tshad brgyad [#]stong yod do/_/dbyibs ni khri'u bzhin du kun nas [#]gru bzhi ste/_ji ltar ngos gcig la dpag tshad nyis stong yod pa
[\[146a.5\]]ltar gzhan dag kyang de dang 'dra ste/_cung zad kyang lhag ma [#]med do/_/gling gang gi dbyibs ci 'dra ba de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi gdong gi dbyibs kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/yang de dag gi bar bar na bar gyi gling rnams mngon par grub pa de dag ni gang yin/_du zhig ni yod ce na/_de yi bar gyi gling brgyad
[\[146a.6\]]ni/_/lus dang lus 'phags sgra mi snyan/_/sgra mi snyan gyi zla dang ni/_/rnga yab dang ni rnga yab gzhan/_/g.yo ldan dang ni lam mchog 'gro/_/de la lus dang lus 'phags ni shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling [#]'khor yin no/_/sgra mi snyan dang sgra mi snyan gyi zla ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi'o/_/g.yo ldan dang
[\[146a.7\]]lam mchog 'gro ni nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi'o/_/rnga yab dang rnga yab gzhan ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi [#]ste/_thams cad na yang mi rnams gnas so/_/kha cig na re/_gcig na srin po dag gnas so zhes zer ro/_/'di nas byang du ri nag po/_/dgu 'das gangs ri'o/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i byang
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]phyogs 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid na ri nag po gsum yod do/_/de dag 'das nas yang gsum yod de/_de [#]'das nas yang gsum yod do/_/[#]ri nag po dgu 'das pa'i pha rol na gangs ri yod do/_/de nas ni/_spos ngad ldang ba'i tshu rol na/_/chu zheng lnga bcu yod pa'i mtsho/_/gangs ri de'i pha rol
[\[146b.2\]]ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i [#]tshu rol na mtsho ma dros pa zhes bya ba gnas pa [#]las chu bo chen po bzhi po gang gA dang /_sin d+hu dang /_si ta dang /_pak+Shu 'bab pa yod do/_/de'i [#]zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu yod la/_chur yang dpag tshad lnga bcu yod de/_yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ngo /_/der ni
[\[146b.3\]]rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pa'i mis 'gro bar dka'o/_/de nyid kyi drung na gang la 'bras bu mngar po dag yod pa shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba mngon par 'grub ste/_de'i dbang gis 'di 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar grags so/_/yang na de'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar grags so/_/_
[\[146b.4\]]dmyal ba rnams [#]ni gang rol na yod/_tshad ni ji tsam zhe na/_'di 'og stong phrag nyi shu na/_/mnar med pa'o de tsam mo/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi 'og dpag tshad nyi khri na dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yod de[#]/_gnam 'phang dang rgyar ni dpag tshad nyi khri'o/_/de'i 'og gzhi yang de dang 'dra
[\[146b.5\]]ste/_'di nas ni dpag tshad bzhi khri yod do/_/sdug bsngal [#]bar chad med pas na mnar med pa'o/_/gzhan dag [#]ni sdug bsngal bar chad dang bcas pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_yang sos na ni lus rnams bcad cing phug la btags kyang rlung grang mo dag [#]langs na sems can de dag yang sos
[\[146b.6\]]par 'gyur bas de'i phyir yang sos yin no/_/gzhan dag na re de na bde ba'i gnas skabs med pas na mnar med pa [#]ste/_gzhan dag na yang bde ba'i tshor ba rnam par smin pa las byung [#]ba ni med kyi rgyu mthun par [#]byung ba ni 'gag pa med do zhes zer ro/_/de yi steng na dmyal ba bdun/_/mnar med pa de'i
[\[146b.7\]]steng na dmyal ba bdun po rab tu tsha ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_bsdus 'joms dang /_thig nag dang /_yang sos dag gong nas gong du gnas so/_/gzhan dag na re mnar med pa'i glo dag [#]na gnas so zhes zer ro/_/de dag kyang /[# ]brgyad po kun la lhag
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]bcu drug_/bcom ldan 'das kyis/_de ltar de dag dmyal ba ni/_/brgyad ces bya ste rgal [#]bar dka'/_/drag po'i las kyis kun du gang /_/re re la yang lhag bcu drug_/rtsig pa bzhi dang sgo bzhi ste/_/rnam phye ris su chad pa yin/_/lcags kyi ra bas
[\[147a.2\]]kun du bskor/_/lcags dag gis ni gang ba yin/_/de la lcags 'bar sa gzhi ste/_/'bar ba'i me dang ldan pa yin/_/dpag tshad brgya phrag du mar ni/_/me lce dag gis khyab par gnas/_/zhes gsungs so/_/lhag ma [#]bcu drug gang zhe na/_de dag gi ni ngos bzhi na/_/me ma mur dang ro
[\[147a.3\]]myags dang /_/spu gri la [#]sogs chu bo yin/_/de dag gi sgo re re na lhag pa bzhi bzhi yod de/_me ma mur pus mo nub tsam gang du sems can de dag gi rkang pa bzhag na ni pags pa dang sha dang khrag zhig par 'gyur la/_rkang pa bteg na ni pags pa dang sha dang khrag slar skye
[\[147a.4\]]ba dang /_ro myags rkyag pa'i 'dam rdzab gang du 'bu mchu rnon zhes bya ba lus thams cad dkar zhing mgo gnag la mchu smyung ba'i srog chags dag gnas shing de dag gis sems can de dag gi rus pa'i bar du 'bigs par byed pa dang /_spu gri'i sos [#]gtams pa'i lam po che gang du
[\[147a.5\]]sems can de dag 'gro ba na [#]rkang pa bzhag na ni pags pa dang sha dang khrag zhig par 'gyur zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/lo ma ral gri lta bu'i gnas [#]gang du ral gri rnon po rnams lhung zhing /_sems can de dag gi yan lag dang nying lag rnams gcod par 'gyur zhing /_khyi sre bo rnams
[\[147a.6\]]kyang za bar byed pa dang /_lcags kyi shal ma ri nags tsher ma rnon po sor bcu drug pa gang du sems can de dag 'dzeg pa na ni tsher ma de rnams kha thur du lta bar 'gyur zhing lus 'bigs par byed la/_'bab pa na ni kha gyen du lta bar 'gyur zhing /_khwa [#]lcags kyi mchu can rnams
[\[147a.7\]]kyis mig dag phyung zhing phyung nas za bar byed pa ste/_spu gri'i lam la sogs pa gsum po de ni mtshon cha mngon par 'bab pa [#]'dra ba'i phyir gcig tu bya'o/_/lhag ma [#]bzhi pa ni chu bo rab med thal chu khol mas gang ba ste/_gang du sems can de dag 'gram gnyis nas [#]skyes bu
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]lag na ral gri dang /_mdung thung dang /_thag mdung thogs pa dag gis 'gog cing /_dper na phru ba chu mang pos bkang ba thab tu bcug [#]pa'i nang du til dang 'bras thug po che la sogs pa blugs pa bzhin du/_steng du 'gro na yang gdu [#]zhing 'tshed la/_'og dang thad kar 'gro na yang
[\[147b.2\]]gdu [#]zhing 'tshed par byed pa'o/_/des kyang dmyal ba chen po 'obs bzhin du bskor ro/_/lhag ma [#]bzhi po 'di dag ni phyogs kyi bye brag gis bcu drug ces bya'o/_/gnod pa lhag ma'i gnas [#]yin pa'i phyir lhag pa'o [#]zhes bya ste/_dmyal ba dag tu gnod pa byas nas yang 'di dag
[\[147b.3\]]tu gnod par byed do/_/gzhan dag na re dmyal ba pa'i 'ching ba'i [#]'og tu 'di dag tu bying [#]bas na lhag pa'o zhes bya'o zhes zer ro/_/dri ba las dri ba gzhan 'byung ste/_ci dmyal ba'i srung ma de dag sems can du bgrang ba zhig yin nam/_'on te ma yin zhe na/_kha cig na re ma yin no
[\[147b.4\]]zhes zer ro/_/da ni ji ltar na de dag g.yo ba yin zhe na/_sems can rnams kyi las dag gis te/_'chags pa'i rlung bzhin no/_/'o na btsun pa chos ldan rab 'byor gyis/_gang dag khro zhing gtum las dang /_/sdig la mngon par dga' ba dang /_/sdug bsngal ba la dga'
[\[147b.5\]]de dag_/gshin rje srin por skye bar 'gyur/_/zhes gang bshad pa ji ltar drang zhe na/_gshin rjes bsgo ba gang dag gi [#]sems can rnams dmyal ba dag tu khrid par byed pa de dag gshin rje srin po zhes bshad kyi/_gang dag las rnam par [#]byed pa de [#]ni ma yin no/_/gzhan dag na
[\[147b.6\]]re sems can dag tu bgrang ba yin no zhes zer ro/_/da ni las de dag gang du rnam par smin zhe na/_dmyal ba de dag nyid du ste/_gang dag tu mtshams med pa byed pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i go skabs yod pa de dag [#]gi su zhig 'gog pa[#]/_me'i nang na gnas pa rnams ji ltar
[\[147b.7\]]mi tshig [#]ce na/_me ni gdon mi za bar las dag gis mtshams gcad pa'i phyir ro/_/yang na 'byung ba'i khyad par grub pa'i phyir ro/_/re zhig de dag ni tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams zhes bya'o/_/chu bur can sogs grang brgyad gzhan/_/[#]gzhan yang grang ba'i
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]dmyal ba brgyad de/_'di lta ste/_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol pa dang /_so thams thams dang /_a chu zer ba dang /_kyi hud zer ba dang /_ut+pal [#]ltar gas pa dang /_pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad+ma ltar cher gas pa'o/_/ming 'di rnams ni sems can grang ba mi bzad
[\[148a.2\]]pas nyen pa de dag gi [#]lus dang sgra 'gyur ba dang sgra mthun pa dag yin no/_/de dag kyang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi 'og dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi thad ka na yod do/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di tsam gyi 'og na mnar med pa la sogs pa'i go skabs ga la yod ce na/_gling rnams ni 'bru'i phung
[\[148a.3\]]po bzhin du zhabs rgya che ba yin te/_de nyid kyi phyir rgya mtsho chen po rim gyis gzhol ba yin no/_/de ltar na sems can dmyal ba bcu drug po de rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi las kyi dbang gis mngon par grub pa dag yin no/_/nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnams ni mang po'am gnyis sam
[\[148a.4\]]gcig gi so so'i las dag gis mngon par grub pa yin te/_de dag gi rnam pa'i bye brag ni rnam pa du ma yod do/_/gnas ni nges pa med de/_chu bo dang /_ri dang /_mya ngam gyi phyogs dag dang /_gzhan dag dang /_'og na yang yod pa'i phyir ro/_/re zhig 'di ni dmyal ba'i snod rnams kyi gnas
[\[148a.5\]]pa yin no/_/dud 'gro ni thang dang /_chu dang /_nam mkha'i spyod yul pa dag yin no/_/de dag gi gnas kyi rtsa ba ni rgya mtsho chen po yin te/_gzhan ni de dag las 'phros pa dag yin no/_/yi dwags rnams kyi rgyal po ni gshin rje zhes bya ba yin no/_/de dag gi gnas kyi rtsa ba rgyal po'i
[\[148a.6\]]khab ni 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i [#]'og dpag tshad lnga brgyas bcad pa na yod de/_gzhan ni de las 'phros pa dag yin no/_/de las yi dwags rdzu 'phrul chen po kha cig ni lha'i dpal lta bu yang nyams su myong ngo /_/lhag ma ni ji ltar yi dwags kyi rtogs pa brjod pa dag las 'byung ba yin
[\[148a.7\]]no/_/yang nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag ci la brten zhe na/_rlung la ste/_sems can thams cad kyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang gis bar snang la nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_skar ma rnams 'phul [#]bar byed pa'i rlung dag grub ste/_ri rab la rlung gi 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor ro/_/nyi ma dang zla ba
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]dag 'di nas thag ji srid ce na/_nyi zla lhun po'i phyed na'o/_/ri gnya' shing 'dzin gyi rtse mo dang mnyam pa nas rgyu'o/_/tshad ji tsam zhe na/_go rims bzhin du/_dpag tshad lnga bcu gcig dang bcas/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni dpag tshad lnga bcu'o/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
[\[148b.2\]]gyi ni gcig dang bcas pa'i lnga bcu ste/_lnga bcu rtsa gcig ces bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/skar ma'i gzhal yas khang rnams kyi nang gi tshad chung ba de'i ni rgyang grags gcig go/_/srog chags rnams kyi las dag gis nyi ma'i gzhal med khang 'og gi phyi rol ni me shel gyi dkyil 'khor
[\[148b.3\]]tsha bar byed pa dang /_snang bar byed pa mngon par grub bo/_/zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi ni chu shel bsil bar byed pa dang /_snang bar byed pa mngon par grub ste/_ci rigs par mig dang /_lus dang /_'bras bu dang /_me tog dang /_lo tog dang /_sman rnams la phan 'dogs par byed pa dang /_gnod [#]par byed pa
[\[148b.4\]]dag yin no/_/gling bzhi pa gcig tu ni zla ba gcig kho na dang /_nyi ma gcig gis bya ba byed do/_/ci gling bzhi po dag tu nyi mas cig car bya ba byed dam zhe na/_ma yin no/_/'o na ci zhe na/_de dag tu/_nam phyed nyi ma nub pa dang /_/nyi ma phyed dang 'char dus gcig_/_
[\[148b.5\]]gang gi tshe byang gi sgra mi snyan du nam phyed pa de'i tshe shar gyi lus 'phags su ni nyi ma nub bo/_/'dzam bu'i gling du ni nyi ma phyed do/_/ba lang spyod du ni nyi ma shar te/_de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/nyi ma'i 'gros kyi bye brag las 'di na nyin mo dang mtshan mo rnams ring thung
[\[148b.6\]]du 'gyur te/_de la/_dbyar gyi zla ba gnyis pa yi/_/tha ma'i tshes dgu nas mtshan ring /_/dbyar rnams kyi zla ba gnyis pa dbyar zla tha chungs [#]yar gyi ngo'i tshes dgu nas mtshan mo ring ngo /_/dgun rnams kyi ni bzhi pa la/_/thung ngur [#]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dgun rnams kyi zla ba bzhi pa'i tha ma'i tshes dgu nas thung
[\[148b.7\]]ngur [#]'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar te/_dgun zla tha chungs [#]yar gyi ngo'i tshes dgu nas so/_/nyin mo bzlog_/gang gi tshe mtshan mo ring ba de'i tshe nyin mo thung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe mtshan mo thung ba de'i tshe nyin mo ring bar 'gyur ro/_/ji tsam zhig gis ring por 'gyur zhe na/_nyin mtshan
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]mtshan [#]ring ba thang cig go/_/nyin mo 'am mtshan mo thang cig thang cig gis ring bar 'gyur ro/_/ring ba de dag kyang go rims bzhin du/_nyi ma lho byang 'gro tshe'o/_/nyi ma 'dzam bu'i gling gi lho phyogs kyi ngos su 'gro ba [#]mtshan mo ring ngo /_/byang phyogs su 'gro ba na nyin
[\[149a.2\]]mo ring ngo /_/zla ba yar gyi ngo'i dang po'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ma rangs par snang ba de la rgyu ci yod ce na/_nyi ma dang ni nye ba las/_/rang gi grib mas 'grib par snang /_/btags [#]pa las/_gang gi tshe zla ba'i gzhal med khang nyi ma'i gzhal med khang dang nye bar rgyu ba de'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od
[\[149a.3\]]kyis de'i gzhal med khang la 'bab ste/_des na de'i phyi rol gyi ngos su grib ma bab pas dkyil 'khor ma rangs par snang ngo zhes bstan to zhes grag go[#]/_/sngon gyi slob dpon rnams na re gang res 'ga' gzhal med khang gi phyed snang ba de lta bu de ni rgyu ba'i tshul yin no zhes zer ro/_/yang nyi
[\[149a.4\]]ma la sogs pa'i gzhal med khang 'di dag na [#]sems can gang dag cig gnas [#]she na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa'i lha rnams so/_/ci de dag gi 'di dag kho na'am zhe na/_gzhal med khang na gnas pa rnams kyi ni 'di dag go/_/sa la gnas pa rnams kyi ni ri rab kyi bang rim la sogs pa'o/_/_
[\[149a.5\]]'di la bang rim ni du zhig yod/_thag ni ji srid ce na/_'di la bang rim bzhi yod de/_bar gyi thag ni stong phrag bcu/_/dpag tshad ni khri'i ltag na gcig yod de/_bzhi'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o/_/de dag gis ni ri rab kyi phyed man chad du phyin to/_/de dag kyang de las grangs bzhin du/_
[\[149a.6\]]stong phrag dag ni bcu drug dang /_/brgyad dang bzhi dang gnyis 'phags so/_/bang rim dang po ni [#]ri rab las dpag tshad stong phrag bcu drug 'phags so/_/gnyis pa ni brgyad do/_/gsum pa ni bzhi'o/_/bzhi pa ni gnyis so/_/de la lag na gzhong thogs dang /_/phreng thogs dang ni
[\[149a.7\]]rtag myos dang /_/rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams gnas/_/bang rim dang po la ni gnod sbyin lag na gzhong thogs zhes bya ba rnams gnas so/_/gnyis pa la ni phreng thogs rnams gnas so/_/gsum pa la ni rtag tu myos rnams gnas te/_lha 'di dag thams cad kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]#]ris pa dag yin no/_/bzhi pa la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi bdag nyid dang /_de'i 'khor rnams gnas te/_de'i phyir na rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams zhes bshad do/_/ji ltar bang rim dag la rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams [#]gnas pa de bzhin du/_ri bo [#]bdun po dag la yang /_/ri gnya'
[\[149b.2\]]shing 'dzin la sogs pa na yang de dag gi grong dang /_grong rdal [#]dag yod de/_de nyid kyi phyir lha'i ris de ni thams cad pas che ba yin no/_/lhun po'i rtse na sum cu gsum/_/yang lhun po'i rtse mo ji tsam zhe na/_de yi ngos la brgyad khri'o/_/thur du ji lta bar ngos re re la yang [#]brgyad khri'o/_/_
[\[149b.3\]]gzhan dag na re/_de yi ngos la nyi khri'o/_/zhes zer te/_'di la ngos bzhir phyogs bzhi yod de/_ngos re re zhing yang dpag tshad nyi khri nyi khri yod la kun du bskor na ni brgyad khri'i zhe'o/_/phyogs mtshams brtsegs pa bzhi la ni/_/lag na rdo rje gnas/_ri rab rtse mo'i phyogs mtshams ni gru
[\[149b.4\]#]bzhi ste/_de dag las dpag tshad lnga brgya'i tshad tsam gyis brtsegs pa bzhi gyen du 'phags te/_de dag la gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba gnas so/_/ri rab kyi rtse mo de'i dbus na/_grong khyer blta [#]na sdug ces pa/_/ngos la nyis stong lnga brgya pa/_/dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis gser gyi
[\[149b.5\]]rang bzhin gzhi bkra mnyen pa yod/_/ri rab kyi gzhi'i dbus na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer blta [#]na sdug ces bya ba ngos re re zhing yang dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya pa/_'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis pa/_gser gyi rang bzhin 'di'i sa gzhi tshon brgyas
[\[149b.6\]#]bkra bar byas la/_sa gzhi de yang shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du reg na 'jam pa rkang pa gzhag pa dang /_bteg pa dag gis na nems zhes byed pa dang par zhes byed pa yod do/_/de na rnam par rgyal byed do/_/[#]ngos la nyis brgya lnga bcu'o/_/grong khyer gyi dbus na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi
[\[149b.7\]]khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba rin po che dang gnas rnam pa du ma phun sum tshogs pa gnas gzhan thams cad kyi dpal gyi che ba'i bdag nyid ngo tsha [#]bar byed pa ngos ngos kyi srid du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu pa zhig yod do[#]/_/re zhig 'di ni grong gi mngon par dga' ba yin no/_/de'i
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]phyi rol shing rta sna tshogs dang /_/rtsub 'gyur 'dres pa dga' bas brgyan/_/grong khyer de'i phyi rol gyi ngos bzhi dag na lha rnams kyi rtsed mo'i sa skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/_'di lta ste skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can dang /_rtsub 'gyur dang /_'dres pa dang /_dga'
[\[150a.2\]]ba'i tshal te/_de dag gis grong khyer de'i phyi rol brgyan to/_/de dag gi ni phyogs bzhi na/_/nyi shus bcad na sa gzhi bzang /_/skyed mos tshal de dag gi phyogs bzhi dpag tshad nyi shus bcad pa na lha rnams kyi rtse ba'i gnas sa gzhi bzang po phan tshun 'gran pa lta bur mdzes pa dang ldan pa bzhi
[\[150a.3\]]yod do/_/grong khyer gyi phyi rol gyi ngos/_byang shar mtshams na yongs 'du ste/_/lho nub mtshams na chos bzang ngo /_/shing sa brtol yongs 'du zhes bya ba sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba mchog gi gnas zhig yod de/_de'i rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcu zug go_/_
[\[150a.4\]]gnam 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya 'phags so/_/yal ga dang /_'dab ma dang /_lo ma ni dpag tshad lnga bcur khyab par gnas so/_/de'i me tog dang /_'dab ma thams cad rgyas pa'i dri ngad rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad brgyar ldang ngo /_/rdzi [#]phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur
[\[150a.5\]]ldang ngo /_/re zhig rdzi phyogs su ni rigs [#]na rdzi phyogs ma yin par go ji ltar zhe na/_kha cig na re shing las mi 'da' ba las dgongs te gsungs so zhes zer ro/_/de rdzi phyogs su ma yin par 'gro ba ma yin gyi/_dri de nyid kyi phun sum tshogs pa lha'i rlung chung ngu dag gis bkag
[\[150a.6\]]bzhin du yang dri gzhan gyi rgyun 'byung ba de lta bur 'dod par bya'o/_/rgyun chung ba dang /_ches chung ba dang /_ches shin tu chung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir myur ba kho nar kun du chad par 'gyur [#]te/_de bzhin du lam ring por mi 'gro'o/_/ji [#]me tog gi dri'i rgyun de rang gi 'byung ba kho na la brten
[\[150a.7\]]nas 'jug gam/_'on te rlung la brten [#]nas kyang skye zhe na/_slob dpon gyi 'dod pa ni de la nges pa med de/_gnyi ga ltar yin pa'o/_/'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis/_me tog dri ni rdzi phyogs min mi 'gro/_/rtsa ba'am rgya spos tsan dan yang ma yin/_/mkhas rnams dri ni rdzi phyogs min 'gro ste/_/_
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]skyes bu dam pa phyogs rnams kun du 'gro/_/zhes gang gsungs pa ji ltar drang zhe na/_mi'i me tog gi dri'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa yin no/_/de ni 'jig rten na grags pa yin te/_de la mthu de lta bu ni med do/_/sa ston sde rnams [#]rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad brgyar dri'i ngad ldang
[\[150b.2\]]ngo /_/rlung med na ni dpag tshad lnga bcur ldang ngo zhes 'don to/_/lho nub kyi phyogs cha na gang du lha rnams 'khod nas bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa 'gro bar byed pa lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs [#]zhes bya ba yod do/_/re zhig de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi snod gnas pa yin no/_/de'i
[\[150b.3\]]steng lha rnams gzhal med khang /_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi steng gi lha rnams ni gzhal yas khang dag na gnas te/_de dag kyang 'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_sngar bshad pa tshangs ris la sogs pa
[\[150b.4\]]gnas gzhan bcu drug tu gtogs pa rnams te/_de ltar na gang dag gi [#]snod mngon pa ni [#]mdor bsdu na lha'i ris nyi shu rtsa gnyis po de dag yin no/_/'dod pa spyod pa drug yin no/_/de dag las 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po 'di lta ste/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris nas gzhan 'phrul dbang
[\[150b.5\]]byed kyi bar rnams ni 'dod pa dag la spyod kyi lhag ma rnams ni ma yin no/_/de dag kyang /_gnyis gnyis 'khyud dang lag bcangs dang /_/dgod dang bltas pas 'khrig pa yin/_/sa dang 'brel par gnas pa rgyal chen bzhi pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams ni mi rnams ji lta ba
[\[150b.6\]]bzhin du gnyis gnyis kyis 'khrig go/_/de dag la yang khu chu med pa'i phyir rlung btang bas yongs su gdung ba dang bral lo/_/'thab bral ba rnams ni 'khyud pas 'khrig pa yin te/_'khyud pa tsam gyis yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/dga' ldan pa rnams ni
[\[150b.7\]]lag bcangs byas pas so/_/'phrul dga' ba rnams ni dgod pas so/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams ni bltas pas so/_/bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re thams cad kyang gnyis kyis gnyis sprod [#]pas yin no/_/brtags [#]pa las bshad pa ni dus kyi tshad yin te/_ji
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]tsam ji tsam du yul rnams ches shas che ba de tsam de tsam du 'dod chags kyang ches shas che'o zhes zer ro/_/lha 'am lha mo gang gi pang du lha gzhon nu'am lha'i bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba de ni [#]de gnyis kyi bu yang yin la/_de'i bu mo yang yin no/_/bong tshod ji
[\[151a.2\]]tsam du skye zhe na/_byis pa lo lnga lon pa nas/_/lo bcu lon pa lta bu'i bar/_/de dag tu skye/_lha'i ris de [#]dag tu grangs bzhin te/_de dag kyang myur ba nyid du skye'o/_/gzugs can rnams/_kun rdzogs gos dang bcas pa nyid/_/gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams ni lus kun rdzogs
[\[151a.3\]]pa dang gos gyon bzhin du skye'o/_/lha thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i skad du smra'o/_/de la 'dod pa skye ba gsum po ni/_/'dod pa'i lha dang mir bcas rnams/_/'dod pa'i khams su rig par bya ste/_ji lta zhe na sems can 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa rnams 'dod pa nye bar gnas
[\[151a.4\]]pa dag la dbang phyug gis [#]dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de/_'di lta ste mi rnams dang lha kha cig go/_/de dag kyang lha'i ris bzhi rnams so/_/sems can 'dod pa sprul pa rnams 'dod pa rnams [#]sprul zhing dbang phyug gis [#]dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de[#]/_dper na 'phrul dga'i lha rnams
[\[151a.5\]]lta bu'o/_/sems can 'dod pa gzhan gyis sprul pa rnams 'dod pa gzhan gyis sprul pa dag la dbang phyug gis [#]dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de/_'di lta ste/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams so/_/de dag ni ji ltar byung ba la [#]yongs su longs spyod pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_ji ltar
[\[151a.6\]]'dod pa bzhin bdag nyid kyis sprul pa la yongs su longs spyod pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bdag dang gzhan gyis sprul pa la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir 'dod pa skye ba gsum zhes bya'o/_/gzugs kyi khams [#]ni/_bde ba skye ba gsum po ni/_/bsam gtan
[\[151a.7\]]gsum la sa dgu yin/_/bsam gtan gsum dag na sa dgu po gang dag yin pa de dag ni bde ba skye ba gsum yin te/_lha de dag ni dben pa las skyes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba'i bde ba dang /_dga' ba med pa'i bde bas bde bar gnas pa na yun ring mo
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]zhig tu gnas te/_de'i phyir bde ba skye ba de dag ni sdug bsngal ba med pa dang /_yun ring por [#]bde ba'i phyir bde ba skye ba dag yin no/_/bsam gtan khyad par can du skyes pa la ni dga' ba dang [#]bde ba med pa'i phyir bde ba skye ba nyid dpyad par bya'o/_/gang dag lha rnams kyi gnas nyi shu
[\[151b.2\]]rtsa gnyis bshad pa de dag la 'og ma nas gong mar thag ji srid ce na/_de dag [#]thams cad dpag tshad kyi grangs kyis [#]bgrang bar ni sla ba ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang /_gnas dang gnas 'og ji srid pa/_/de nas de yi gong de srid/_/'dzam bu'i gling nas bzung ste gong ma'i gnas gang yin pa
[\[151b.3\]]de [#]ni de nas 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid par de nas gong ma'i gnas gzhan du yang de srid de/_'di lta ste/_'di nas dpag tshad bzhi khri na rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rtsa ba'i gnas bang rim bzhi pa yod pa de nas 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du/_ji srid par gong ma sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi
[\[151b.4\]]gnas su yang de srid do/_/de nas kyang 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid par gong ma 'thab bral ba rnams kyi gnas su yang de srid do/_/de nas kyang 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid par gong ma dga' ldan pa rnams kyi gnas su yang de srid do/_/de bzhin du rgyas par thams cad go rims
[\[151b.5\]]dang mthun par bya ste/_shin du mthong ba dag nas 'og ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid par gong ma 'og min pa rnams kyi gnas su yang de srid do/_/de'i gong na ni gnas med do/_/de nyid kyi phyir de dag ni [#]thu bor gyur pa'i phyir 'og min zhes bya'o/_/gzhan dag na re thog [#]mtha' zhes bya ste/_
[\[151b.6\]]thogs pa ni bsags par gnas pa'i gzugs te/_de ni 'dir mthar thug go zhes zer ro[#]/_/yang ci gnas 'og mar skyes pa rnams gong ma'i gzhal med khang du dong nas mthong bar 'gyur ram zhe na/_rdzu 'phrul gzhan brten ma gtogs [#]par/_/de dag gong ma mthong ba med/_/rdzu 'phrul
[\[151b.7\]]gyis sam/_gzhan la brten nas te/_rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'am/_de na gnas pa'i lhas khrid par gyur na sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams 'thab bral ba'i nang du 'gro bar 'gyur te/_lhag ma rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/gong du skyes pa 'ongs pa mthong bar 'gyur gyi/_khams gong ma
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]pa yang ma yin la/_sa gong ma pa yang ma yin te/_dper na yul ma yin pa'i phyir reg bya reg par mi 'gyur ba bzhin no/_/de nyid kyi phyir rang gi lus kyis mi 'ong ngo /_/'o na ji lta bu zhe na/_sa 'og ma'i sprul pas so/_/sde pa gzhan dag na re/_de'i 'dod
[\[152a.2\]]pas 'di na 'khod pa bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/yang 'thab bral ba la [#]sogs pa'i gzhal med khang de dag gi tshad ji tsam zhe na/_re zhig kha cig na re bzhi rnams kyis ni ri rab kyi rtse mo [#]de tsam mo zhes zer ro/_/gzhan dag na re gong ma gnyis [#]'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/kha
[\[152a.3\]]cig na re bsam gtan dang po'i ni gling bzhi pa tsam mo/_/gnyis pa'i ni stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mo/_/gsum pa'i ni stong gnyis pa tsam mo/_/bzhi pa'i ni stong gsum pa tsam mo zhes zer ro/_/gzhan dag na re dang po la sogs pa ni stong la sogs pa'i tshad tsam
[\[152a.4\]]mo/_/bzhi pa ni tshad med do zhes zer ro/_/yang stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ci/_stong gnyis pa 'am/_stong [#]gsum pa ni ci zhe na/_gling bzhi dang ni [#]nyi zla dang /_/ri rab dang ni 'dod lha dang /_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni/_/stong ni spyi phud yin par 'dod/_/_
[\[152a.5\]]'dzam bu'i gling dang /_shar gyi lus 'phags dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_ri rab stong dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar stong dang /_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten [#]'di ni stong spyi phud
[\[152a.6\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o/_/de stong la ni stong gnyis pa/_/bar ma'i 'jig rten khams yin no/_/stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag stong ni stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams yin no/_/de stong la ni stong gsum mo/_/stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de
[\[152a.7\]]dag stong ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i [#]'jig rten gyi khams yin te/_'di thams cad ni/_mnyam du 'jig cing 'byung ba yin/_/mnyam du 'jig cing mnyam du 'byung ste/_'byung ba ni chags [#]pa yin no zhes 'og nas bshad par bya'o/_/yang ji ltar snod rnams kyi tshad bye brag yod pa de
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]bzhin du de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshad kyang /[# ]bye brag yod dam zhe na/_smras pa yod de/_de la re zhig_/'dzam bu'i gling pa rnams kyi tshad/_/khru bzhi pa dang phyed dang bzhi/_/'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni phal cher khru phyed dang bzhi pa'o/_/kha cig ni khru bzhi pa
[\[152b.2\]]dag yin no/_/shar dang ba lang spyod dang ni/_/byang zhes bya ba gnyis [#]'gyur bskyed/_/shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams ni rim bzhin du khru brgyad pa dang /_bcu drug pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gnyis pa dag yin no/_/_
[\[152b.3\]]'dod dang ldan pa'i lha yi lus/_/bzhi cha nas ni rgyang grags dag_/phyed dang gnyis kyi bar du bskyed/_/bzhi cha zhes bya ba ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha ste/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa rnams kyi lus ni de tsam mo/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi ni bzhi cha gnyis so/_/'thab bral ba
[\[152b.4\]]rnams kyi ni bzhi cha gsum mo/_/dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig go/_/'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig dang bzhi cha gcig go/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni [#]rgyang grags phyed dang gnyis so/_/gzugs can dang po dpag tshad phyed/_/gzugs
[\[152b.5\]]can gyi lha rnams kyi gnas kyi dang po ni [#]tshangs ris pa rnams kyi lus ni dpag tshad phyed tsam mo/_/de yi gong ma phyed phyed bskyed/_/gnas gsum dag na tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams kyi dpag tshad gcig go/_/tshangs pa chen po'i ni phyed dang gnyis so/_/'od chung pa rnams
[\[152b.6\]]kyi [#]ni dpag tshad gnyis so/_/'od chung rnams kyi lha [#]yan chad/_/lus ni nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur te/_/sprin med dpag tshad gsum dor ro/_/tshad med 'od rnams kyi ni [#]dpag tshad bzhi'o/_/'od gsal ba rnams kyi ni brgyad de/_de bzhin du dge rgyas pa rnams kyi ni drug cu
[\[152b.7\]]rtsa bzhi yin pa'i bar du nyis 'gyur du bskyed do/_/sprin med pa rnams kyi ni nyis 'gyur du bsgyur nas de las dpag tshad gsum phri nas dpag tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o[#]/_/de yan chad bsod nams skyes pa la sogs pa nas 'og min pa rnams kyi lus dpag tshad [#]khri drug stong yin
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]pa'i bar du nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur du bsgyur ro[#]/_/ci de ltar bong tshod tha dad pa rnams kyi tshe yang bye brag yod dam zhe na/_smras pa yod de/_sgra mi snyan na tshe stong ste/_/lo rnams so/_/gnyis la [#]phyed phyed spangs pa'o/_/gnyis la ni phyed phyed spangs nas/_ba lang
[\[153a.2\]]spyod pa la sogs pa [#]rnams kyi ni lo lnga brgya'o/_/shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams kyi ni nyis brgya lnga bcu'o/_/'di na [#]ma nges/_'dzam bu gling 'di [#]na ni tshe nges pa med de/_res 'ga' ni ring por 'gyur ro/_/res 'ga' ni thung ngo /_/tha mar ni/_lo bcu/_lo zhes bya ba ni lo skor [#]yin te/_
[\[153a.3\]]tha ma thung ngur gyur pa na tshe lo bcu par 'gyur ro/_/dang po dpag tu med/_bskal pa dang po pa'i mi rnams kyi tshe ni dpag tu med pa yin te/_stong la sogs pa'i grangs kyis yongs su tshad gzung [#]bar mi nus so/_/mi rnams kyi bshad zin to/_/lha rnams kyi [#]brjod par bya ste/_de yang
[\[153a.4\]]nyin zhag rnam par bzhag nas brjod par nus pas re zhig de dag gi de nyid rnam par gzhag par bya ste/_mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu la/_'dod pa dag gi lha rnams las/_/'og ma dag gi nyin zhag gcig_/mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rgyal chen
[\[153a.5\]]bzhi'i ris pa rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/_/des na tshe lo lnga brgya'o/_/de'i [#]nyin zhag des na de rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig go/_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lha'i lo lnga brgya'o/_/gong ma gnyi ga nyis 'gyur ro/_/lnga po gong ma rnams ni nyin zhag
[\[153a.6\]]dang tshe gnyi ga nyis [#]'gyur te/_ji lta zhe na/_mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la/_nyin zhag des na tshe lha'i lo stong thub bo/_/de bzhin du mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya dang /_bzhi brgya dang /_brgyad brgya dang /_stong drug brgya ni
[\[153a.7\]]'thab bral la sogs pa'i nyin [#]zhag gcig yin la/_nyin zhag des na tshe'i tshad lha'i lo nyis stong dang /_bzhi stong dang [#]/_brgyad stong dang [#]/_khri drug stong thub bo/_/gnya' shing 'dzin yan chad na nyi ma dang zla ba med pa'i phyir lha rnams kyi nyin zhag rnam par gzhag pa dang /_snang ba'i bya ba ji lta
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]bu zhe na/_ku mu ta [#]dang pad ma bzhin du me tog rnams kha 'dzums [#]pa dang /_kha 'byed pa [#]dang /_bya rnams skad 'byin pa dang /_skad mi 'byin pa dang /_gnyid sangs pa dang /_bro ba las so/_/snang ba'i bya ba ni bdag nyid la 'od yod pa'i phyir ro/_/'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad
[\[153b.2\]]bshad zin to/_/gzugs can nyin mtshan med tshe ni[#]/_/rang lus gzhal ba'i bskal pa yis/_/gzugs can gang dag gi lus dpag tshad phyed yin pa de dag gi tshe [#]bskal pa phyed yin la/_gang dag gi dpag tshad gcig yin pa de dag gi ni bskal pa gcig yin pa nas/_de bzhin du 'og
[\[153b.3\]]min pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bskal pa khri drug stong yod pa'i bar du gang gi [#]lus dpag tshad ji snyed pa de'i tshe yang [#]bskal pa de snyed do/_/gzugs med bskal pa stong phrag ni/_/nyi shu lhag pas [#]lhag pa yin/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched na ni tshe'i tshad bskal pa nyi khri'o/_/rnam
[\[153b.4\]]shes mtha' yas skye mched na ni de las nyi khri lhag go/_/ci yang med pa'i skye mched na ni de las nyi khri lhag go/_/srid pa'i rtse mo na ni de las nyi khri lhag pa'o/_/de ltar na de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni go rims bzhin du bskal pa nyi khri dang /_bzhi khri dang /_drug khri dang /_brgyad khri yin no/_/_
[\[153b.5\]]'dir bskal pa gang zhig yin par rig par bya/_ci bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'chags pa dang /_gang yang chags nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu [#]pa chen po zhig yin zhe na/_'od chung nas bzung bskal chen te/_/de yi 'og ma phyed yin no/_/lha'i ris 'od chung nas bzung ba'i tshe'i tshad
[\[153b.6\]]ni bskal pa chen por rig par bya'o/_/de'i 'og ma tshangs chen la sogs pa'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa chen po phyed la bskal par byas nas rnam par bzhag go/_/ji lta bu zhe na/_gang yang 'jig rten bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur chags [#]pa dang /_gang yang chags nas bar gyi bskal
[\[153b.7\]]pa nyi shur 'dug pa dang /_gang yang bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'jig pa dang /_bar gyi bskal pa drug cu [#]po de dag la tshangs pa chen po'i bskal pa phyed dang gnyis su bshad de[#]/_de ltar byas na bskal pa chen po'i phyed bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcu la bskal par byas nas de dag gis [#]tshe'i
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]tshad du byas nas bshad pa yin no/_/bde 'gro'i tshe'i tshad bshad zin to/_/da ni ngan 'gro'i brjod par bya ste/_de la re zhig_/yang sos la sogs drug rim bzhin/_/'dod lha'i tshe dang nyin zhag mnyam/_/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po de dag gi tshe ji tsam
[\[154a.2\]]par bshad pa de dang go rims [#]bzhin du yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_dmyal ba drug gi nyin zhag dang mnyam par rig par bya ste/_des na de dag rnams kyi tshe/_/'dod pa'i lha dang 'dra ba yin/_/de [#]ni rang
[\[154a.3\]]gi nyin zhag de dag gis de dag [#]tshe'i tshad [#]'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris [#]drug po de dag gi tshe ji lta ba de bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/ji lta [#]zhe na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad gang yin pa de ni dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la/_des na zla ba bcu gnyis
[\[154a.4\]]pa'i los tshe de na yod pa'i lo lnga brgya zhes bya ba'i bar du yin no/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad gang yin pa de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi nyin zhag gcig yin la/_nyin zhag des na de'i tshe lo stong ste/_de bzhin du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi
[\[154a.5\]]tshe'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gis dmyal ba chen po tsha ba na tshe'i tshad lo khri drug stong yin pa'i bar du gzhan dag la ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o/_/rab tu tsha phyed/_dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba na ni tshe'i tshad bar gyi bskal pa phyed do/_/mnar med ni/_bar gyi bskal pa'o/_/_
[\[154a.6\]]dud 'gro rnams [#]ni nges pa med do/_/[#]dud 'gro rnams/_mchog ring bskal pa'o/_/dud 'gro'i tshe mchog tu ring ba ni bar gyi bskal pa gcig ste/_klu dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo dang /_rta mgo la sogs pa dag ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis/_dge slong dag klu brgyad po
[\[154a.7\]]'di dag ni klu chen po ste/_bskal par gnas pa/_sa 'dzin pa'o zhes rgyas par gsungs so/_/yi dwags rnams/_zla ba nyin zhag gi lnga brgya'o/_/mi rnams kyi zla ba gcig gang yin pa de ni yi dwags rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig [#]yin la/_nyin zhag des na tshe lo lnga brgya'o/_/_
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]yang grang ba'i dmyal ba dag na tshe'i tshad ji tsam zhe na/_ji srid du/_til sbyang [#]nas ni lo brgya zhing /_/til gcig phyung [#]bas zad gyur pa/_/chu bur can gyi tshe yin te/_/gzhan gyi tshe ni nyi shur 'gyur[#]/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi tshe'i tshad kyi dpe tsam du dge slong dag dper na 'di na yul
[\[154b.2\]]ma ga d+hA'i [#]til gyi sbyang [#]khal brgyad cu pa zhig til dag gis byur bur bkang ste/_de nas la la zhig gis lo brgya brgya 'das shing til re re bor na dge slong dag rim pa des [#]na yul ma ga d+hA'i [#]til gyi sbyang [#]khal brgyad cu pa de ma lus par yongs su zad par gyur pa ni ches myur gyi chu bur can
[\[154b.3\]]du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe yongs su gtugs par ni nga mi smra'o/_/dge slong dag chu bur can nyi shu ji lta ba de bzhin du chu bur rdol pa gcig yin no zhes bya ba nas rgyas par yang [#]dge slong dag pad+ma ltar gas pa nyi shu ji lta ba de bzhin du pad+ma ltar gas pa chen po gcig yin no zhes gsungs
[\[154b.4\]]so/_/de ltar [#]tshe dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag tshe yongs su ma rdzogs par bar ma dor 'chi ba yod dam 'on te/_med ce na/_thams cad la yod de/_sgra mi snyan ma gtogs par 'chi/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan dag na [#]ni sems can rnams tshe nges pa yin te/_gdon mi za bar tshe rangs
[\[154b.5\]]par 'tsho'o/_/gzhan dag [#]ni ma nges so/_/gang zag rnams las bar ma dor 'chi ba med pa yang mang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dga' ldan na bzhugs pa dang /_sems can srid pa tha ma pa [#]dang /_rgyal bas bstan pa dang /_rgyal ba'i thad du btang ba'i
[\[154b.6\]]pho nya dang /_dad pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'khor los sgyur [#]ba'i yum de dag lhums na yod pa dang /_de lta bu la sogs pa'o/_/dpag tshad kyi tshad kyis gnas rnams dang /_lus rnams kyang [#]lo'i tshad kyis tshe [#]yang bshad na/_de gnyis
[\[154b.7\]]kyi tshad ni ma bshad pas brjod par bya la/_de dag thams cad kyi rnam par gzhag pa yang ming yin pas de'i mtha' yang brjod par bya ste/_de rnams yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dang po'i rim pa brtsam mo/_/gzugs ming dus mtha' [#]rdul yig dang /_/skad cig_/gzugs 'grib
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]pa'i mtha' ni rdul phra rab yin no/_/dus kyi mtha' ni skad cig ma'o/_/ming gi mtha' ni yi ge ste/_dper na ba lang zhes bya ba lta bu'o/_/yang [#]skad cig ma'i tshad ji tsam zhe na/_rkyen rnams tshogs na ji srid du chos kyi bdag nyid thob pa'am/_chos 'gro ba na ji srid du
[\[155a.2\]]rdul phra rab nas rdul phra rab gzhan du 'gro ba yin no/_/chos mngon pa [#]rnams na re skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis skad cig ma drug cu rtsa lnga 'da'o zhes zer ro/_/de la phra rab rdul dang ni/_/rdul phran dang ni de bzhin du/_/lcags chu ri bong lug dang glang /_/nyi
[\[155a.3\]]zer rdul dang sro ma dang /_/de las byung dang de bzhin du/_/sor tshigs zhes bya gong bdun 'gyur/_/rdul phra rab la sogs pa 'di dag ni gong nas gong du bdun 'gyur du rig par bya ste/_rdul phra rab bdun la ni rdul phran no/_/rdul phran bdun la ni lcags rdul lo/_/de dag bdun la ni chu rdul lo/_/de dag bdun la ni
[\[155a.4\]]ri bong gi [#]rdul lo/_/de dag bdun la ni lug rdul lo/_/de dag bdun la ni glang rdul lo/_/de dag bdun la ni nyi zer rdul lo/_/de dag bdun la ni [#]sro ma'o/_/sro ma bdun la ni de las byung ba ste/_sro ma las byung ba ni shig ces bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/shig
[\[155a.5\]]bdun la ni nas so/_/nas bdun la ni sor mo'i tshigs so/_/sor mo'i tshigs gsum la ni sor mo zhes bya bar grags pa nyid pas ma bshad do/_/ngos su bya ba [#]ni/_sor ni nyi shu bzhi la khru/_/khru bzhi la ni [#]gzhu gang ngo /_/'dom gang ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/de dag lnga brgya rnams
[\[155a.6\]]la ni/_/rgyang grags de la dgon par 'dod/_/gzhu lnga brgya la ni rgyang grags te/_grong nas rgyang grags tsam gyi thag la ni dgon pa yin par 'dod do/_/de brgyad dpag tshad ces bya'o/_/rgyang grags de dag brgyad la dpag tshad ces bya'o/_/dpag tshad kyi tshad ni bshad zin to/_/da ni
[\[155a.7\]]lo'i tshad [#]brjod par bya ste/_skad cig ma brgya nyi shu la/_de yi skad cig_/skad cig ma brgya nyi shu la [#]de'i skad cig go/_/de dag kyang /_drug cu la ni thang cig go/_/de'i skad cig drug cu la ni thang cig ces bya'o/_/yud tsam nyin zhag zla gsum ni/_/gong nas gong du sum cur [#]'gyur/_/thang
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]cig sum cu la yud tsam mo/_/yud tsam sum cu la ni [#]nyin zhag gcig go/_/res 'ga' ni mtshan mo ring ngo /_/res 'ga' ni thung ngo /_/res 'ga' ni mnyam mo/_/nyin zhag sum cu la ni zla ba gcig go/_/zhag mi thub dang bcas pa yi/_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig go[#]/_/dgun rnams
[\[155b.2\]]kyi zla ba bzhi dang /_dpyid rnams kyi zla ba bzhi dang /_dbyar rnams kyi zla ba bzhi ste/_de dag [#]zla ba bcu gnyis po de dag zhag mi thub dang bcas pa la lo gcig go/_/lo la ni zhag gcig [#]gi shol drug dor te/_ji lta [#]zhe na/_dgun dang dpyid dang dbyar rnams kyi/_/zla ba phyed dang gnyis 'das nas/_/_
[\[155b.3\]]zla ba phyed ni lus pa na/_/mkhas pas zhag mi thub pa [#]dor/_/lo'i tshad bshad zin to/_/da ni bskal pa [#]brjod par bya ste/_bskal pa rnam pa mang bshad pa/_/bar gyi bskal pa dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa dang /_'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /_bskal pa chen po'o/_/de la re zhig_/'jig
[\[155b.4\]]pa'i bskal pa dmyal ba yi/_/srid pa med nas snod zad pa/_/dmyal ba dag nas sems can mi srid pa nas bzung ste snod zad pa'i bar ro/_/ji lta bu zhe na/_'jig pa ni gnyis te/_'gro ba 'jig pa dang /_khams 'jig pa'o/_/yang gnyis te/_sems can 'jig pa dang snod 'jig pa'o/_/_
[\[155b.5\]]gang sems can rnams dmyal ba dag nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur zhing skye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dus kyang yod de/_da ni 'jig pa'i bskal pa mgo brtsam [#]pa yin te/_gang 'jig rten [#]'di chags nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'dug pa de las ni nges par 'byung ba zhes brjod par bya la/_gang
[\[155b.6\]]bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'jig par 'gyur ba de la ni zhugs pa zhes brjod par bya ste/_gang gi tshe dmyal ba dag na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus par gyur pa [#]de tsam gyis 'di lta ste/_dmyal ba 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no/_/de'i tshe gang la nges par dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur
[\[155b.7\]]ba'i las yod pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu 'phen par 'gyur te/_dud 'gro myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_yi dgas myong bar 'gyur ba yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/rgya mtsho chen po na 'khod pa'i dud 'gro rnams ni sngar 'jig go/_/mi dang lhan cig rgyu [#]ba rnams ni de dag mi dang
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]lhan cig tu'o/_/gang mi rnams dag gi nang na sems can gang yang rung ba bdag nyid kyis slob dpon med par [#]chos nyid kyis thob pa'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa de lta bu'i dus kyang yod de/_de de las langs nas tshig tu kye ma dben pa las skyes pa'i
[\[156a.2\]]dga' ba dang bde ba ni bde ba yin no/_/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba ni zhi ba yin no zhes kyang smra la/_sgra de thos nas sems can de [#]dag kyang snyoms par 'jug cing /_shi nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/_gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can 'ga' yang ma
[\[156a.3\]]lus par gyur na de tsam gyis 'di lta ste/_'dzam bu'i gling 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no/_/shar gyi lus 'phags dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan 'jig pa dag kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya ste/_gang gi tshe mi dag gi nang na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus
[\[156a.4\]]par gyur pa de tsam gyis na 'di lta ste/_mi 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_de na 'dod chags dang bral ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dag na/_yang bsam
[\[156a.5\]]gtan dang po bskyed pa nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/_gang gi tshe de na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus par gyur na de tsam gyis 'di lta ste/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 'jig pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du brjod
[\[156a.6\]]par bya ste/_gang gi tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dag gi nang na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus par gyur pa de tsam gyis na 'di lta ste 'dod pa'i khams 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di [#]zhig pa yin no/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na yang sems can gang yang rung ba zhig chos nyid kyis thob pa'i bsam
[\[156a.7\]]gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs te/_langs nas tshig tu kye ma ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba ni bde ba yin no/_/kye ma ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba ni zhi ba yin no zhes smra ba/_sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sgra de thos nas snyoms par 'jug
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]cing shi nas kyang 'od gsal gyi lha dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_gang gi tshe tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus par gyur na de tsam gyis 'di lta ste/_sems can 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no/_/de'i 'og tu sems can rnams kyi de 'phen pa'i las yongs
[\[156b.2\]]su zad pa dang /_snod stong pas 'di nyid nas kun nas nyi ma bdun byung nas rim gyis sa dang ri rab kyi bar du ma lus par sreg par byed do/_/rab tu 'bar ba de nyid las me lce rlung gis khyer nas tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang gi bar du sreg par 'gyur ro/_/me lce de dang [#]de'i sa pa kho nar rig par bya
[\[156b.3\]]ste/_ris mi mthun pa'i skyon dag 'gro ba ni med de[#]/_de dang 'brel pa las byung ba nyid kyi phyir de nyid las zhes bshad de/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i me ni gzugs na spyod pa dang 'brel par byed do/_/de bzhin [#]du 'jig pa gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya'o/_/de ltar na dmyal ba
[\[156b.4\]]dag na sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang mi skye ba nas bzung ste/_snod rnams zad [#]pa'i bar gyi dus de ni 'jig pa'i bskal pa zhes bya'o/_/'chags pa dang po'i rlung [#]ni dmyal ba srid pa'i bar du'o/_/dang po'i rlung nas bzung [#]ste dmyal ba dag nas sems can srid pa'i bar te/_de ltar
[\[156b.5\]]'jig rten zhig pa ni nam mkha' tsam lus par yun ring du gnas so/_/yang rim gyis sems can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis nam mkha' la snod rnams kyi snga ltas su gyur pa rlung 'jam po 'jam po dag ldang ste/_de'i tshe 'jig rten 'di zhig nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'dug pa gang yin
[\[156b.6\]]pa de las ni nges par byung ba zhes brjod par bya la/_bar gyi bskal [#]pa nyi shur 'chags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni nye bar 'ongs par brjod par bya'o/_/de nas rlung de dag skye ba na ji skad bshad pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu rim gyis chu'i dkyil 'khor dang /_
[\[156b.7\]]gser gyi rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi chen po dang /_gling rnams dang /_ri rab la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa'i rim pa dang tshul du thams cad 'byung ngo /_/dang por ni tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang 'byung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu ni 'thab bral ba'i bar du 'byung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa ste/_de tsam gyis na 'di lta ste snod chags pas 'jig rten 'di chags pa yin no/_/de nas sems can gang yang rung ba zhig 'od gsal dag nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang stong par skye bar 'gyur la/_sems
[\[157a.2\]]can gzhan dag kyang de nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu tshangs ris dag dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dag dang /_'phrul dga' dag nas rim gyis byang gi sgra mi snyan pa dang /_ba lang spyod dang /_shar gyi lus 'phags po dang /_'dzam
[\[157a.3\]]bu'i gling dang /_yi dgas rnams dang /_dud 'gro rnams dang /_dmyal ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_gang mjug tu 'jig pa de dang por 'chags pa 'di ni chos nyid yin no/_/gang gi tshe [#]dmyal ba dag na sems can 'ga' zhig skyes par gyur pa de'i [#]tshe 'jig rten 'di bar
[\[157a.4\]]gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'chags pa gang yin pa de las ni nges par byung ba yin la/_chags nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'dug par 'gyur ba [#]gang yin pa de ni nye bar 'ongs pa yin no/_/bar gyi bskal pa dpag med nas/_/tshe lo bcu pa'i bar du'o/_/'jig rten chags [#]pa na
[\[157a.5\]]mi rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa la bar gyi bskal pa bcu dgur 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dpag tu med pa nas 'grib pa na tshe lo bcu pa'i bar du 'gyur te/_'di ni chags nas gnas pa rnams kyi bar gyi bskal pa dang po yin no/_/de nas yar skye mar 'bri ba'i/_/bskal pa
[\[157a.6\]]gzhan ni bco brgyad dang /_/de nas yar skye ba dang mar 'bri ba gzhan bco brgyad de/_bar gyi bskal pa gzhan [#]bco brgyad du 'gyur ro/_/ji lta zhe na/_tshe lo bcu pa de dag kyang [#]yar skye bar 'gyur ba na rim gyis tshe lo brgyad khri'i [#]bar 'gyur[#]/_yang mar 'bri bar 'gyur
[\[157a.7\]]ba na tshe lo bcu par 'gyur ba 'di ni bar gyi bskal pa gnyis pa yin te/_de lta bu bco brgyad kyi bar dang /_yar skye ba ni gcig yin te/_bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu pa gcig ni yar skye ba kho na yin gyi mar 'grib pa [#]ni ma yin no/_/mi rnams kyi tshe lo bcu pa dag las tshe lo
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]brgyad khri pa'i bar du [#]'gyur ro/_/yang mar [#]skye ba de dag ji tsam du yang [#]skye bar 'gyur zhe na/_de dag tshe ni brgyad khri'i bar[#]/_/de las yar ni mi skye'o/_/bar gyi bskal pa gzhan rnams kyi yar skye ba dang mar 'grib pa'i dus ji srid par bar gyi bskal pa dang po'i mar 'grib pa dang tha ma'i
[\[157b.2\]]yar skye ba'i dus kyang de srid pas thams cad dus mnyam pa yin no/_/de ltar 'jig rten chags pa 'di/_/bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas/_/de ltar na bar gyi bskal pa'i tshul 'dis 'jig rten 'di bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur chags nas gnas so/_/dus ji srid du chags nas
[\[157b.3\]]gnas pa'i dus de srid kho nar/_'chags pa dang ni 'jig pa dang /_/zhig nas 'dug [#]pa dag mnyam mo/_/bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu kho nar 'chags so/_/nyi shur 'jig go/_/nyi shur zhig nas 'dug go/_/gal te yang de'i tshe yar skye ba dang mar 'grib pa mi 'jug [#]tu zin kyang dus
[\[157b.4\]]ni mnyam par yongs su brtsi'o/_/de la bar gyi bskal pa gcig tu snod rnams [#]'chags so/_/bar gyi bskal pa bcu dgur gnas par byed do/_/bar gyi bskal pa gcig tu snod rnams 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/bcu dgur stong [#]par 'gyur ro/_/bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu phrag
[\[157b.5\]]bzhi po de dag ni brgyad cur 'gyur te/_de dag brgyad cu la bskal chen/_/bskal pa chen po'i tshad ni de yin no/_/bskal pa'i rang bzhin ci zhe na/_phung po lnga'i rang bzhin no/_/bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis [#]sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa de bskal
[\[157b.6\]]pa de dag gang zhe na/_bskal pa chen por bshad pa gang yin pa/_de grangs med gsum la sangs rgyas 'byung ngo /_/bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis so/_/grangs med pa la grangs kyi mtha' med na ji ltar gsum nyid du brjod ce na/_de ni de ltar rig par mi bya'o/_/'o na ci zhe na/_
[\[157b.7\]]mdo sil bu las/_grangs ni gnas gzhan drug cu dag go zhes 'byung ngo /_/drug cu gang zhe na/_gcig ste gnyis pa ma yin pa ni gnas gzhan dang po yin no/_/gcig bcu ni gnyis pa yin no/_/bcu phrag bcu la ni [#]brgya ste gsum pa yin no/_/brgya phrag bcu la ni stong ngo /_/stong
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]phrag bcu la ni khri'o/_/khri phrag bcu la ni 'bum mo/_/'bum phrag bcu la ni sa ya'o/_/sa ya phrag bcu la ni bye ba'o/_/bye ba phrag bcu la ni dung phyur ro/_/dung phyur phrag bcu la ni ther 'bum mo/_/ther 'bum phrag bcu la ni ther 'bum chen po'o/_/ther 'bum
[\[158a.2\]]chen po phrag bcu la ni khrag khrig go/_/khrag khrig phrag bcu la ni khrag khrig chen po'o/_/khrag khrig chen po phrag bcu la ni rab bkram mo/_/rab bkram phrag bcu la ni rab bkram chen po'o/_/rab bkram chen po phrag bcu la ni gtams so/_/gtams phrag bcu la ni gtams chen
[\[158a.3\]]no/_/gtams chen phrag bcu la ni dkrigs so/_/dkrigs phrag bcu la ni dkrigs chen no[#]/_/dkrigs chen phrag bcu la ni mi 'khrugs pa'o/_/mi 'khrugs pa phrag bcu la ni mi 'khrugs pa chen po'o/_/mi 'khrugs pa chen po phrag bcu la ni khyad phyin no/_/khyad phyin phrag bcu
[\[158a.4\]]la ni khyad phyin chen po'o/_/khyad phyin chen po phrag bcu la ni pang steng ngo /_/pang steng phrag bcu la ni pang steng chen po'o/_/pang steng chen po phrag bcu la ni ded 'dren no/_/ded 'dren phrag bcu la ni ded 'dren chen po'o/_/ded 'dren chen po phrag bcu la ni mtha' snang ngo /_/mtha' snang
[\[158a.5\]]phrag bcu la ni mtha' snang chen po'o/_/mtha' snang chen po phrag bcu la ni rgyu rig go/_/rgyu rig [#]phrag bcu la ni rgyu rig chen po'o/_/rgyu rig chen po phrag bcu la ni 'od mdzes so/_/'od mdzes phrag bcu la ni 'od mdzes chen po'o/_/'od mdzes chen po phrag bcu la ni dbang po'o/_/dbang
[\[158a.6\]]po phrag bcu la ni dbang chen no/_/dbang chen phrag bcu la ni legs phyin no/_/legs phyin phrag bcu la ni legs phyin chen po'o/_/legs phyin chen po phrag bcu la ni rtogs 'gro'o/_/rtogs 'gro phrag bcu la ni rtogs 'gro chen po'o/_/rtogs 'gro chen po phrag bcu la [#]'bying rdul lo/_/_
[\[158a.7\]]'bying rdul phrag bcu la ni 'bying rdul chen po'o/_/'bying rdul chen po phrag bcu la ni rgya rtags so/_/rgya rtags phrag bcu la ni rgya rtags chen po'o/_/rgya rtags chen po phrag bcu la ni stobs 'khor ro/_/stobs 'khor phrag bcu la ni stobs 'khor chen po'o/_/stobs 'khor chen
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]po phrag bcu la ni brda shes so/_/brda shes phrag bcu la ni brda shes chen po'o/_/brda shes chen po phrag bcu la ni rnam 'byung ngo /_/rnam 'byung phrag bcu la ni rnam 'byung chen po'o/_/rnam 'byung chen po phrag bcu la ni stobs mig go/_/stobs mig phrag bcu la ni stobs mig chen po'o/_/_
[\[158b.2\]]stobs mig chen po phrag bcu la ni grangs med pa ste/_bar gyi gnas [#]brgyad ni ma rnyed do/_/de ltar na gnas gzhan drug cur phyin pa de dag tu phyin pa'i bskal pa ni/_bskal pa grangs med pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas yang bzlog nas bgrang ste/_de ltar na grangs med pa gsum zhes bya ba'i rnam pa
[\[158b.3\]]thams cad du yongs su bgrang bar mi nus pas ni ma yin no/_/'o na yang [#]byang chub sems dpa' smon lam btab pa rnams dus ring po kho nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ram zhe na/_ci de [#]de ltar 'gyur ram/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams [#]ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum
[\[158b.4\]]du dka' ba brgya stong gis bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te thar pa'i go skabs gzhan de lta ma yin pa yang yod na go/_/de dag ci'i phyir 'bad pa 'di snyed cig rtsom par byed ce na/_de dag ni ji
[\[158b.5\]]ltar na gzhan dag kyang sdug bsngal gyi chu bo chen po las yongs su bskyab par nus par 'gyur snyam du gzhan gyi don du 'bad pa rtsom par byed do/_/'di dag gi gzhan gyi don gyis bdag gi don du 'gyur ba gang yin [#]zhe na/_de dag gi gzhan gyi don gang [#]yin pa de nyid bdag gi don te[#]/_de 'dod
[\[158b.6\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/da ni su zhig 'di la dad par 'gyur zhe na/_bdag gso bar byed pa'i snying rje med pa rnams kyis 'di la dad par dka' ba ni bden no/_/snying rje can [#]rnams kyis dad par byas zin pa yin te/_dper na 'di na snying rje med pa la goms pa kha cig rang gi don med bzhin
[\[158b.7\]]du yang gzhan nyon mongs pa la mngon par dga' ba dmigs pa de bzhin du snying rje la goms pa dag rang gi don med bzhin du yang gzhan la phan par bya ba la mngon par dga' ba yod do snyam du yid ches par bya'o/_/yang dper na 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid mngon par mi shes pa dag goms pa'i dbang gis
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]'dus byas bdag med par gyur pa dag la bdag tu chags pa bskyed nas rgyu des sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du goms pa'i dbang gis de dag las bdag tu chags pa bzlog nas/_gzhan dag la lta ba bskyed de/_rgyu des sdug bsngal dag myong bar
[\[159a.2\]]'gyur ro snyam du yid ches par bya'o/_/gang gzhan dag gi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing /_gzhan dag gi bde bas bde bar 'gyur gyi/_bdag nyid kyi ni ma yin pa de lta bu'i rigs gzhan kho na yang 'grub ste/_de lta ni rang gi don du mi blta'o/_/'dir smras pa/_dman pa de
[\[159a.3\]]dang de'i thabs kyis rang gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i bde ba don du gnyer/_'bring po sdug bsngal ldog pa kho na'o/_/bde min gang phyir de ni sdug bsngal gnas yin phyir/_/dam pa rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis gzhan dag la ni bde ba dang /_/sdug bsngal [#]gtan ldog kho na don
[\[159a.4\]]gnyer gang phyir de yi sdug bsngal gyis de sdug bsngal phyir/_/yang ci sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yar skye ba'i tshe 'byung ngam/_'on te mar 'grib pa'i tshe 'byung zhe na/_mar ni 'grib pa yi/_brgya yi bar la de dag 'byung /_/skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri ba mar [#]'grib pa
[\[159a.5\]]nas brtsams pa nas mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgya pa yin pa'i bar 'dir sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir yang skye ba'i dus su ni ma yin zhe na/_de'i tshe sems can rnams skyo bar dka' ba'i phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir brgya las mar 'grib pa'i tshe ma yin zhe na/_de'i tshe snyigs ma lnga
[\[159a.6\]]po 'di lta ste/_tshe'i snyigs ma dang /_dus kyi snyigs ma dang /_nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang /_lta ba'i snyigs ma dang /_sems can gyi snyigs ma shin tu lhag pa yin te/_mar 'grib pa'i 'og tu ni tshe la sogs pa tha chad yin no/_/ngan snyigs su gyur pa'i [#]phyir snyigs ma dag ces
[\[159a.7\]]bya'o/_/gnyis kyis ni go rims bzhin du srog dang yo byad rgud par byed do/_/gnyis kyis ni 'dod pa'i bsod nyams dang bdag ngal ba la sogs [#]pa'am/_yang na khyim pa'am [#]rab tu byung ba'i phyogs kyi dbang du byas nas dge ba'i phyogs rgud par byed do/_/gcig gis ni lus
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]rgud par byed do/_/[#]bong tshod dang /_gzugs dang /_nad med pa [#]dang /_stobs dang /_blo dang /_dran pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_brtan pa nyams pa'i phyir ro/_/yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dus gang du 'byung zhe na/_rang sangs rgyas rnams gnyi ga la/_yar skye ba la yang 'byung /_mar 'grib
[\[159b.2\]]pa na yang [#]'byung ngo /_/rang sangs rgyas rnams ni rnam pa gnyis te/_tshogs shing spyod pa rnams dang /_bse ru lta bu rnams so/_/de la tshogs shing spyod pa rnams ni nyan thos kyi rigs su gyur pa sngon du 'gro ba'i rang rgyal ba rnams zhes bya'o/_/gzhan dag na re so so'i skye bo sngon du 'gro ba dag
[\[159b.3\]]kyang yod de/_gang dag gzhan du nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams bskyed pa tshe 'di la bdag nyid kyis lam mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer zhing /_'di skad du re zhig ri la dka' thub can lnga brgya zhig dka' thub drag po dag gis gdung bar byas pa na rang sangs rgyas dang
[\[159b.4\]]lhan cig gnas gnas pa'i spre'u zhig dang phrad nas de'i spyod lam bstan pas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi [#]bar du grag go zhes sngon gyi gtam 'don par byed do[#]/_/'phags pa dag cig yin na ni dka' thub drag po dag gis gdung bar mi 'gyur ro zhe'o/_/_
[\[159b.5\]]bse ru lta bu rnams ni re re gnas pa dag yin no/_/rang sangs rgyas de dag las/_bse ru bskal pa brgya'i rgyus bskal pa chen po brgyar byang chub kyi tshogs dag la spyod pas bse ru lta bur 'gyur ro/_/lung med par bdag gcig pu'i phyir sangs rgyas pas rang sangs rgyas dag ste/_de
[\[159b.6\]]dag [#]ni bdag nyid 'dul bar byed kyi gzhan dag ni ma yin no/_/'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/_re zhig so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i phyir chos ston par mi spyod pa yang ma yin la/_de dag gis sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa rjes su dran nas yang chos ston par spyod do/_/thugs
